movies.title: Sex Drive
movies.details: Loveable virgin Ian meets Danielle online, and she offers to have sex with him. So Ian steals his brother’s car and together with his friends Lance and Felicia embark on a wild adventure driving across the country.

movies.title: What Just Happened
movies.details: A desperate movie producer tries to revive his dying career and maintain his dignity while struggling to get his picture made over a two-week period.

movies.title: Non-Stop
movies.details: During a flight from New York to London, a federal air marshal (Liam Neeson) receives a series of text messages informing him that a passenger will be killed every 20 minutes until the airline transfers $150 million to an offshore account.

movies.title: Eye In The Sky
movies.details: A general and a colonel order a drone missile strike to take out a group of terrorists.

movies.title: Halloween 5: The Revenge Of Michael Myers
movies.details: The citizens of Haddonfield, Illinois are about to endure the revenge of Michael Myers, as the presumed-dead killer returns to kill and kill again. Starring Donald Pleasance & Danielle Harris.

movies.title: Captain Phillips
movies.details: The gripping true story of Captain Richard Phillips, whose cargo ship and crew were hijacked by pirates off the coast of Somali in 2009.

movies.title: Dredd
movies.details: In a violent, futuristic metropolis, a law-enforcement officer and his rookie trainee become caught up in a high-stakes conflict with a vicious prostitute-turned-drug lord. Judgment is coming. Based on the comic.

movies.title: Ali
movies.details: A pivotal decade in the life of heavyweight boxing legend Muhammad Ali - his rise to the top of the sport, his refusal to go to Vietnam, and his comeback fights with Foreman and Frazier.

movies.title: Easy A
movies.details: When a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a high school student decides to ride the rumor mill and advance her social standing - until things start to get out of hand. With Stanley Tucci.

movies.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
movies.details: Madea, Bam, and Hattie venture to a haunted campground and the group must run for their lives when monsters, goblins, and the boogeyman are unleashed.

movies.title: A Wedding for Christmas
movies.details: Haley Foster escaped her small-town childhood in Pineridge and built a big city life in Los Angeles as a top wedding planner at an elite and powerful company run by Ms. Reynolds.

movies.title: The Witness For Prosecution
movies.details: The story is set in 1920s London, and centers on a murder, "brutal and bloodthirsty," which has "stained the plush carpets of a handsome London townhouse."

movies.title: P.S. I Love You
movies.details: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

movies.title: Knock Knock
movies.details: Two nubile, stranded women (Ana De Armas, Lorenza Izzo) reveal a sinister agenda after they spend the night with a married architect (Keanu Reeves). One night can cost you everything.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
movies.details: Bella (Kristen Stewart) must choose between Edward (Robert Pattinson) and Jacob (Taylor Lautner) amid a string of mysterious killings and a malicious vampire's quest for revenge. It all begins... with a choice. Based on the novel by Stephenie Meyer.

movies.title: Filth
movies.details: Scheming Bruce Robertson (James McAvoy), a bigoted and corrupt policeman, is in line for a promotion and will stop at nothing to get what he wants. Enlisted to solve a brutal murder and threatened by the aspirations of his colleagues, including Ray Lennox (Jamie Bell), Bruce sets about ensuring their ruin.

movies.title: Homecoming
movies.details: A jilted ex-girlfriend (Barton) has a plan in store for her former beau, who is coming back to his small town with a new lover.

movies.title: The Queen
movies.details: In the wake of Princess Diana's death, the British royal family and new prime minister Tony Blair struggle to find the proper way to honor the popular divorcee in this compelling story. Mirren awarded the Best Actress Oscar.

movies.title: Leprechaun 2
movies.details: Jennifer Aniston made her film debut in this horror comedy about a psychotic, six-centuries-old leprechaun who goes on a murder spree throughout North Dakota trying to recover his gold.

movies.title: 47 Ronin
movies.details: After a warlord banishes their kind, a band of 47 leaderless samurai must seek help from Kai (Keanu Reeves)—an enslaved half-breed—in their ultimate fight for vengeance and redemption.

movies.title: From Prada To Nada
movies.details: A Latina spin on Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility": two spoiled sisters who have been left penniless after their father's sudden death are forced to move in with their estranged aunt in East Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Dresser
movies.details: Set in London during World War II, a dedicated personal assistant to a deteriorating veteran actor struggles to get him through a difficult performance of Shakespeare's King Lear. A STARZ Original Movie.

movies.title: El Gringo
movies.details: A DEA agent survives a set-up in which his fellow officers are murdered and crosses the border into Mexico with a bag full of cash only to land in a sleepy little town where everyone takes an interest in him and his greenbacks.

movies.title: Crimson Peak
movies.details: A woman (Mia Wasikowska) investigates ghostly visions at a remote gothic mansion where she lives with her new husband (Tom Hiddleston) and mysterious sister-in-law (Jessica Chastain). Beware.

movies.title: Jigsaw
movies.details: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one man: John Kramer. But how can this be? The man known as Jigsaw has been dead for over a decade.

movies.title: Christmas Under Wraps
movies.details: Christmas Under Wraps features Candace Cameron Bure as Dr. Lauren Brunell, who accepts a position in Alaska after losing both her boyfriend and prestigious surgery fellowship, only to learn that it's a tiny hospital in a small town.

movies.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
movies.details: A séance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widow's (Elizabeth Reaser) youngest daughter (Lulu Wilson) in 1967 Los Angeles. When you talk to the other side, you never know who will be listening.

movies.title: Power Rangers
movies.details: Five ordinary teenagers must team together to become something extraordinary in order to save the world from being obliterated by an alien threat.

movies.title: The Contractor
movies.details: Elizabeth Chase is a loving, supporting wife and mother. Her work for one of Los Angeles’ leading children’s hospital has her quite busy these days. In addition, she is consumed raising her daughter McKenzie who is well into her teen rebellion phase.

movies.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
movies.details: The amazing web-slinger returns! While Peter Parker and Gwen Stacy's romance grows, Spider-Man must contend with supervillians Electro, Rhino and the Green Goblin! With Jamie Foxx.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.details: A skilled young drummer is promoted to his school's top-tier jazz band, where he clashes with an obsessive music teacher and his intense methods. Triple Oscar winner, including Best Supporting Actor J.K. Simmons.

movies.title: Traitor
movies.details: Conflicting evidence leads a federal agent (Guy Pearce) to question the motives behind a former Special Ops soldier's (Don Cheadle) apparent ties to terrorist groups. The truth is complicated.

movies.title: Grey Lady
movies.details: After the murder in Boston of his police partner and lover; homicide Detective James Doyle (Eric Dane) follows a clue embedded in her dying words to the remote island of Nantucket to hunt for her killer in the lonely off-season.

movies.title: The Karate Kid
movies.details: John Avildsen ("Rocky") directed this crowd-pleaser about a bullied teenager from New Jersey (Ralph Macchio), who moves to southern California with his mother (Randee Heller). He learns self-defense and self-confidence from a sage janitor (Pat Morita).

movies.title: Belly
movies.details: A pair of violent men have spiritual awakenings.

movies.title: Elite Squad
movies.details: Two friends struggle to survive, facing the daily challenges of dealing with pressure at home and fighting an unnamed war on the streets as members of the Rio de Janeiro Police Department.

movies.title: The Prince and Me
movies.details: At college Paige meets Eddie, a student from Denmark, who proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen then he follows her back to school with a plan.

movies.title: Get A Job
movies.details: Four college graduates discover that they may have set expectations too high.

movies.title: Dune
movies.details: Director David Lynch's controversial film version of Frank Herbert's sci-fi novel of political intrigue, giant sand worms and a gallery of bizarre scenes and grotesque characters.

movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
movies.details: Legendary hit man John Wick is forced out of retirement again by a former associate plotting to seize control of a shadowy international assassins' guild. Bound by a blood oath to help him, John travels to Rome, where he squares off against some of the world's deadliest killers.

movies.title: Never Back Down
movies.details: Jake, a frustrated and conflicted teenager, arrives at a new school only to be bullied by the local martial arts champion. Jake seeks out savvy trainer Jean Roqua to learn how defend himself and win in the underground fight club.

movies.title: Warm Bodies
movies.details: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world. He's still dead but he's getting warmer. Based on the novel by Isaac Marion.

movies.title: Father Figures
movies.details: Brothers Kyle and Peter Reynolds are shocked to discover that the father they never knew is still alive. As the siblings set out on an epic quest to find him, they start to learn more about their eccentric mom's past than they ever wanted to know.

movies.title: The Cold Light Of Day
movies.details: A young American (Cavill) uncovers a conspiracy during his attempt to save his family, who were kidnapped while on vacation in Spain.

movies.title: Summer Camp
movies.details: American counselors working at a European summer camp fight to survive when a rage-inducing virus infects the children.

movies.title: Letters To Juliet
movies.details: Finding a poignant love letter in a wall dedicated to Shakespeare's Juliet Capulet, a young woman (Amanda Seyfried) sets out to help its aged author find her long-lost beau. What if you had a second chance at true love?

movies.title: Casino
movies.details: Director Martin Scorsese's intense, violent tale of how organized crime controlled Las Vegas gambling in the 1970s is told via mob casino boss, his beautiful but unstable wife, and his hot-headed pal. With Joe Pesci.

movies.title: Escape Plan
movies.details: An expert (Sylvester Stallone) in prison security joins forces with an inmate (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to break out of a top-secret, high-tech facility. No one breaks out alone.

movies.title: Just Go With It
movies.details: An unmarried plastic surgeon tells his girlfriend he's divorcing his abusive wife. When she demands to meet the soon-to-be ex, the doc asks his single mom assistant to be his pretend wife - complications ensue!

movies.title: An Unfinished Life
movies.details: A grizzled rancher is trying to put his life back together when his former daughter-in-law - who was the driver in the car accident that killed his son - suddenly reappears with the granddaughter he never knew.

movies.title: Red 2
movies.details: Former CIA black-ops agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) and his team battle assassins, terrorists and power-hungry government officials as they try to retrieve a lethal device that could change the balance of world power. The best never rest.

movies.title: After Sex
movies.details: Meet eight couples – straight and gay; virgins and strangers; lovers, liars, cheaters and swingers – as they deal with the pleasure, anger, confusion, regret, laughter and other sensations that make physical intimacy an emotional ride.

movies.title: Down a Dark Hall
movies.details: Based on Lois Duncan's young adult thriller, story follows Kit Gordy, a new student at Blackwood Boarding School, who must unlock the mysteries of the school's tragic past.

movies.title: Step Up
movies.details: Tyler Gage is a street smart juvenile delinquent, with a reckless streak that lands him in a world of trouble after he and his friends trash an auditorium at a performing arts high school.

movies.title: Tyler Perry's Temptation: Confessions Of A Marriage Counselor
movies.details: Judith is a hard-working and driven woman who is in a loving but somewhat passionless marriage. Her life changes when she meets an attractive and extremely wealthy man, who seduces her into embarking on a steamy affair.

movies.title: Make Your Move
movies.details: A young guy and girl both with a passion for dance begin to fall for one another against the backdrop of the underground dance scene in New York. However, their romance could lead them both into danger due to their brothers' fierce rivalry.

movies.title: I Can Only Imagine
movies.details: The inspiring and unknown true story behind MercyMe’s beloved, chart topping song that brings ultimate hope to so many is a gripping reminder of the power of true forgiveness.

movies.title: Kin
movies.details: A recently released ex-con and his adopted younger brother are forced to go on the run. Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a cadre of otherworldly soldiers, their only protection is a found weapon of mysterious ancestry.

movies.title: I Spit On Your Grave
movies.details: This remake of the 1978 classic of the same name, tells the story of a woman who is brutally raped and assaulted by four men, survives, and takes the law into her own hands seeking revenge against her attackers.

movies.title: Hide
movies.details: In this movie based on Lisa Gardner's book, Carla Gugino plays Boston Police Detective D.D. Warren, who is called to the grounds of an abandoned mental hospital where a buried chamber is discovered.

movies.title: My Best Friend's Girl
movies.details: Tank faces the ultimate test of friendship when his best friend hires him to take his ex-girlfriend out on a lousy date in order to make her realize how great her former boyfriend is.

movies.title: Child 44
movies.details: At a grim outpost in 1950s Soviet Russia, a disgraced agent (Tom Hardy) and his wife (Noomi Rapace) join forces with a general (Gary Oldman) to capture a serial killer who preys on young boys. Those who seek the truth will be silenced.

movies.title: Divergent
movies.details: In the future, a teen girl learns that she is a 'Divergent'. When she learns of a plot by an evil leader to assassinate all Divergents she embarks on a frantic quest to learn the truth about herself and why the leader wants her kind killed.

movies.title: Gods of Egypt
movies.details: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.

movies.title: Daddy Day Care
movies.details: Two unemployed fathers decide staying at home can pay - so they open their own day care facility. But their unconventional approach to keeping the kids happy leads to hilarious complications!

movies.title: London Heist
movies.details: Four men. Four million in cash. One final job. But their haul is stolen, and one of their fathers is murdered.

movies.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
movies.details: Cate Blanchett and Geoffrey Rush star in this thrilling tale of a queen's crusade to control her love, destroy her enemies and secure her position as a beloved icon of the western world.

movies.title: Sabotage
movies.details: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
movies.details: After the abrupt departure of Edward (Robert Pattinson), Bella (Kristen Stewart) develops a deep friendship with Jacob (Taylor Lautner) and is drawn into the world of werewolves. Based on the book by Stephenie Meyer.

movies.title: Anna Karenina
movies.details: In late 19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky. Based on the classic novel.

movies.title: Halloween 4: The Return Of Michael Myers
movies.details: Ten years ago, he changed the face of Halloween. Tonight...he's back!

movies.title: Cook Off
movies.details: Yearning for a better life, a single mother with a passion for cooking gets a shot at greatness when her son enters her into a top reality cooking show.

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 2
movies.details: With the nation of Panem in a full scale war, Katniss confronts President Snow in the final showdown.

movies.title: Now You See Me
movies.details: Mystery thriller starring Mark Ruffalo and Woody Harrelson. Four talented magicians are plucked from obscurity to becomes the Four Horsemen - a group of stage illusionists who soon attract the attention of the FBI...is it magic, or crime?

movies.title: Open Water
movies.details: Dan and Susan are ecstatic to finally be on their much anticipated tropical holiday in the Caribbean. However, after a mistake by their boat staff the pair are left alone in the middle of the ocean, and their ordeal soon becomes a full blown nightmare when sharks start to appear. Inspired by a true story.

movies.title: American Hustle
movies.details: Critically-acclaimed comedy-drama centered on a pair of con-artists who run afoul of an increasing power-hungry FBI agent intent on setting a trap for bribe-taking politicians. With Amy Adams, Jennifer Lawrence.

movies.title: Sicario
movies.details: In the lawless border area stretching between the U.S. and Mexico, an idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by an elite government task force official to aid in the escalating war against drugs. Led by an enigmatic consultant with a questionable past, the team sets out on a clandestine journey forcing Kate to question everything that she believes in order to survive.

movies.title: Bad Santa
movies.details: The story of two con-men who go on a road trip to malls dressed as Santa and his elf. The duo's motive is to rob each establishment, a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter an 8-year-old who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

movies.title: Where's The Money
movies.details: A young man from South Central, Los Angeles plots to become the first black member of an all-white college fraternity in order to recover a stash of stolen money hidden in their house.

movies.title: Dark Places
movies.details: With no money or prospects for her future, a desperate woman who survived the brutal killing of her family as a child must relive that deadly day for a secret society in order to make some extra cash.

movies.title: Halloween
movies.details: John Carpenter's horror classic about a psychopath who strikes whenever the costumes come out.

movies.title: Dear Secret Santa
movies.details: Tatyana Ali leads an all-star cast including Jordin Sparks, Ernie Hudson and Della Reese in this heartwarming holiday romance!

movies.title: Best F(r)iends: Volume Two
movies.details: Leaving the mortician adrift, the drifter finds himself on an expedition across the Southwest encountering wild and crazy characters through a series of twisted and dark foibles.

movies.title: Lower Learning
movies.details: Welcome to Geraldine Ferraro Elementary, where the teachers are drunk, lazy, or psychotic, every child has been left behind, and burned-out Vice Principal Tom Willoman (Jason Biggs) is barely holding on.

movies.title: Sinister
movies.details: Washed-up true crime writer Ellison Oswalt finds a box of super 8 home movies in his new home that suggest the murder that he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose legacy dates back to the 1960s.

movies.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
movies.details: Kristin Cooper the pretty and talented assistant at a global PR firm, is put in charge of the annual Christmas Fashion Show and Auction for clothing entrepreneur, Mr. Carson. A young, handsome, Royal, Prince Patrick, is volunteered by his father, the King

movies.title: Dark Seduction
movies.details: A successful plastic surgeon embarks on a passionate fling with a male nurse, only to find he has a dark side to his persona that reaches terrifying heights when she is forced to end their relationship.

movies.title: Hellraiser: Judgement
movies.details: Three detectives attempt to solve a diabolical murder that sweeps them into the depths of hell in this next edition of the classic HELLRAISER series.

movies.title: American Pie
movies.details: At a high-school party, four friends find that losing their collective virginity isn't as easy as they had thought. But they still believe that they need to do so before college. To motivate themselves, they enter a pact to all "score" by their senior prom.

movies.title: XXX
movies.details: Xander Cage - extreme sports pro and maverick outlaw - goes to work for the government trying to stop an Eastern European villain who has dastardly plans. Blazing action from the director of The Fast And The Furious.

movies.title: Bangkok Dangerous
movies.details: As a hired assassin, Joe (Nicolas Cage) is the best in the business, but the years of stone-cold murder have taken their toll. Joe's plan to make this current assignment in Bangkok his last takes a wild turn when he violates one of the most important rules of the game. Now the hunter is the hunted in this hard-driving, action-packed thriller.

movies.title: Remember Me
movies.details: Emerging secrets threaten the budding romance between a troubled young man (Robert Pattinson) and the young woman (Emilie de Ravin) who helped him rediscover happiness. Live in the moments.

movies.title: Blindspotting
movies.details: Two childhood friends struggling to survive in a gentrifying Oakland are forced to redefine their friendship when one is placed on probation. Catch the original series inspired by this acclaimed film--only on STARZ.

movies.title: The Grudge 2
movies.details: A ghostly supernatural curse continues its murderous ways! The sister of a woman killed by the horrible haunted house is out to confront the spirits- now operating globally - that will not die!

movies.title: Crímenes de Lujuria
movies.details: Rebeca and Arturo find lust and perhaps even love in one another. But mostly, they find an opportunity: Rebeca wants to murder her husband and cash the insurance with her new lover, while Arturo stands to get the girl and her money.

movies.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
movies.details: Fugitives Tris (Shailene Woodley) and Four (Theo James) search for allies and answers among the ruins of Chicago while arduously trying to evade Jeanine (Kate Winslet), leader of the Erudites. Defy reality. Based on the novel by Veronica Roth.

movies.title: The Grudge 3
movies.details: A young Japanese woman who holds the key to stopping the evil spirit of Kayako, travels to the haunted Chicago apartment from the sequel, to stop the curse of Kayako once and for all.

movies.title: Deepwater Horizon
movies.details: On April 20th, 2010, the world’s largest man-made disaster occurred on the Deepwater Horizon in the Gulf of Mexico. Directed by Peter Berg (Lone Survivor), this story honors the brave men and women whose heroism would save many on board, and change everyone’s lives forever.

movies.title: Gone
movies.details: After escaping from an abductor a year earlier, a young woman (Amanda Seyfried) sets out to save her sister (Emily Wickersham), who has been kidnapped by the same serial killer. No one believes her. Nothing will stop her.

movies.title: Almost Christmas
movies.details: A new comedy from David E. Talbert that tells the festive story of a beloved patriarch who asks his family for one gift this holiday season: to get along.

movies.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
movies.details: A mechanic enlists an attorney to help get back his three daughters from his coniving ex-wife. The mechanic and attorney overcome different backgrounds and find love in the process.

movies.title: Crank
movies.details: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios’ life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

movies.title: Christmas Made to Order
movies.details: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

movies.title: Ranchero
movies.details: After the death of his parents, Jesse Torres leaves his childhood cattle ranch for the bright lights of Los Angeles. Reconnecting with his childhood friend Tom, he finds himself in a squalid neighborhood of drugs, gangs, and broken dreams. Struggling wit

movies.title: Knowing
movies.details: A professor (Nicolas Cage) and his son obtain an encoded time-capsule document that lists every major disaster over the past 50 years and predicts a future global calamity. What happens when the numbers run out?

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.details: Peter Parker (Tom Holland) navigates his way through high school while fighting crime as Spider-Man.

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
movies.details: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games. She senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as the next Hunger Games is prepared—a competition that could change Panem forever.

movies.title: Halloween II
movies.details: A killer follows his injured target (Jamie Lee Curtis) to the hospital on Oct. 31 in Haddonfield, Ill.

movies.title: Mamma Mia!
movies.details: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father is told in musical style using hit songs by the popular 1970s band ABBA.

movies.title: Wonder
movies.details: A 10-year-old boy with severe facial anomalies begins 5th grade at a new school where he tries to convince his peers to look behind his appearance to see all that they have in common.

movies.title: Tyler Perry's A Madea Christmas
movies.details: Madea gets coaxed into helping a friend pay her daughter a surprise visit in the country for Christmas, but the biggest surprise is what they'll find when they arrive. As the small, rural town prepares for its annual Christmas Carnival, new secrets are revealed and old relationships are tested while Madea dishes her own brand of Christmas Spirit to all.

movies.title: Grown Ups 2
movies.details: After a reunion three years ago, Lenny moves his family back to his old hometown - but bullies, crazy drivers and party crashers make it hilariously difficult! With David Spade, Chris Rock, Selma Hayek.

movies.title: Before I Fall
movies.details: Sam seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam’s life isn’t so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls w

movies.title: Call Me By Your Name
movies.details: A teenage boy becomes enamored with an American student who comes to stay with his family in Northern Italy. Together they share an unforgettable summer of discovery and romance.

movies.title: The Grudge
movies.details: A murderous supernatural curse passes like a virus in Tokyo, infecting and possessing its victims in unspeakable horrors - an American nurse frantically searches for a way to destroy the evil!

movies.title: Tyler Perry's The Single Moms Club
movies.details: When five struggling single moms put aside their differences to form a support group, they find inspiration and laughter in their new sisterhood, and help each other overcome the obstacles that stand in their way.

movies.title: Man On A Ledge
movies.details: While a man teetering on a 21st-floor ledge diverts attention, the world’s greatest diamond heist is underway. Hang on for thrills with Sam Worthington, Ed Harris and Elizabeth Banks.

movies.title: Ladrones
movies.details: Fernando Colunga and Eduardo Yáñez are modern-day Robin Hoods in this entertaining sequel to the smash hit LADRÓN QUE ROBA A LADRÓN. The two thieves join forces to reclaim land stolen from a humble community by a beautiful but lethal diva.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
movies.details: A chain of events, set off by Edward (Robert Pattinson) and Bella's (Kristen Stewart) marriage, honeymoon and birth of a child, yields a shocking development for Jacob (Taylor Lautner). Forever is only the beginning. Based on the book by Stephenie Meyer.

movies.title: The Messengers
movies.details: A family leave the bustle of Chicago in favor of a new life on an isolated sunflower farm. However, their fresh start soon turns into a nightmare when a series of strange occurrences lead them to believe they are not alone in their new home.

movies.title: An American Haunting
movies.details: Based on the true events of the only case in US History where a spirit caused the death of a man.

movies.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
movies.details: Four teenagers discover an old video game console and are literally drawn into the game's jungle setting - becoming the adult avatars they chose.

movies.title: Jerry Maguire
movies.details: A successful young sports agent awkwardly embarks on a new life when he jettisons his comfy agency job in this hilarious & touching romantic comedy. Cuba Gooding Jr. won an Oscar for Best Supporting Actor.

movies.title: The Raid: Redemption
movies.details: An elite SWAT team raids a tenement building run by a ruthless drug lord and his army of criminals - a bone-crunching, non-stop slugfest of hand-to-hand combat and pulse-pounding action! Subtitled.

movies.title: XXX: State Of The Union
movies.details: The Secretary of State and his private army are planning to take over the US government, and the latest XXX agent - Darius Stone - is called on to save the day. Explosive action, with Willem Dafoe.

movies.title: Twilight
movies.details: A high-school student (Kristen Stewart) is caught up in a romance with a vampire (Robert Pattinson), whose family has renounced the drinking of blood. When you can live forever, what do you live for? Based on the first book of a series by Stephenie Meyer.

movies.title: Grave Encounters 2
movies.details: Film students break into an abandoned insane asylum to do paranormal research and quickly discover ghosts are real.

movies.title: Halloween III: Season Of The Witch
movies.details: It's Halloween night and a series of murders leave the on-call doctor determined to uncover the truth behind the sinister events. He is lead to a sinister toymaker who is using black magic and strange masks to wreak havoc on the local community, with the aim of returning the holiday to its wicken origins.

movies.title: Faster
movies.details: An ex-con seeks to avenge the death of his brother fifteen years earlier in a botched heist. While being pursed by others, he hunts down those responsible for his brother's death.

movies.title: I Spit On Your Grave 2
movies.details: An aspiring model's biggest dreams turn into her worst nightmares.

movies.title: Patriots Day
movies.details: Mark Wahlberg shines in this all-star action-thriller that chronicles the courage and power of the people of Boston during the real-life manhunt for the Boston Marathon bombers.

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 1
movies.details: Katniss Everdeen (Jennifer Lawrence), is rescued by the rebels and brought to District 13 after she shatters the Hunger Games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin (Julianne Moore) and Plutarch Heavensbee (Philip Seymour Hoffman), Katniss spreads her wings and becomes Mockingjay, the symbolic leader of the rebellion. But President Snow has his own plans for her—and her loved ones.

movies.title: The Equalizer
movies.details: A man believes he has put his mysterious past behind him and has dedicated himself to beginning a new, quiet life. But when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters, he can't stand idly by - he has to help her.

movies.title: Gangs of New York
movies.details: Director Martin Scorsese's epic! A young man seeks revenge against the larger-than-life strongman who killed his father in the brutal, gang-dominated New York City of the 1840s. Co-starring Cameron Diaz.

movies.title: Marie Antoinette
movies.details: An electrifying yet intimate re-telling of the turbulent life of history's favorite villainess, Marie Antoinette, who married France's young and indifferent King Louis XVI.

movies.title: Red
movies.details: Retired CIA agents (Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich) reassemble for survival after the agency sends assassins to silence them and the secrets they carry. Still armed. Still dangerous. Still got it.

movies.title: Breathe In
movies.details: A music teacher falls under the spell of an exchange student and risks his profession and family to be with her.

movies.title: The Perks Of Being A Wallflower
movies.details: Drama starring Emma Watson and Ezra Miller, based on the novel by Stephen Chbosky. Charlie has always been an introvert, but he is forced out of the shadows when he meets carefree Sam and her adventure-loving stepbrother Patrick. Together the trio set off on a whirlwind journey of discovery as they explore love, sexuality, music and wild partying.

movies.title: The Holiday Tree
movies.details: When a big city girl (Lacey Chabert of MEAN GIRLS) returns to save her childhood Christmas Tree Farm from development she's confronted with the challenges of the life she chose to leave behind. But Christmas is a time for miracles and she may rediscover

movies.title: Next Day Air
movies.details: Two inept criminals mistakenly deliver a package of cocaine and think they've hit the jackpot, triggering an irreversible series of events.

movies.title: Dirty Dancing
movies.details: "Nobody puts Baby in the corner!" It's the classic romance between an ugly duckling teenybopper and a hunky dance instructor at a Catskills resort in the summer of 1963. You'll have the time of your life!

movies.title: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married?
movies.details: Four couples who have been friends since college take a therapeutic getaway to a Colorado bungalow, where they plan to take stock of their relationships. They are led by successful psychiatrist Patricia, who has a picturesque marriage to Gavin. Nothing is perfect, however, and secrets and old scars soon emerge, pitting friend against friend and spouse against spouse.

movies.title: Rudo Y Cursi
movies.details: As two brothers scraping by as laborers in rural Mexico, a scout spies their friendly game of soccer and signs them up as star athletes for rival teams.

movies.title: The Glass Castle
movies.details: Based on the worldwide best-selling memoir starring Academy Award® winner Brie Larson and Academy Award® nominees Woody Harrelson and Naomi Watts, THE GLASS CASTLE chronicles the adventures of an eccentric, resilient, tight-knit family.

movies.title: The Returned
movies.details: A couple (Emily Hampshire, Kris Holden-Ried) flee after supplies of a protein used to treat a zombie virus run low, and all those infected are ordered to report to a secure medical facility.

movies.title: LA LA Land
movies.details: Sebastian and Mia are drawn together by their common desire to do what they love. But as success builds, the dreams they worked so hard to maintain threaten to rip them apart.

movies.title: Best F(r)iends: Volume 1
movies.details: The dynamic duo behind THE ROOM and THE DISASTER ARTIST (Tommy Wiseau and Greg Sestero) are back together again after 15 years in this new Cult Classic in the making! When a drifter (Sestero) befriends a quirky mortician (Wiseau), an unlikely business partnership is formed. Paranoia soon develops, however, and both men are forced to come to terms with the fragility of friendship and loyalty.

movies.title: The Shack
movies.details: After a family tragedy, Mack Phillips spirals into a deep depression causing him to question his innermost beliefs. A mysterious letter urges him to an abandoned shack and encounters a trio of strangers led by a woman named Papa. Based on William Paul Young's novel.

Solar flares creating instability at the Earth's core lead to an apocalyptic series of spectacular natural disasters in this blockbuster special effects epic. Mega-earthquakes, toppling skyscrapers, massive tidal waves and more!

movies.title: Cube
movies.details: A group of people trapped in a maze of lethal rooms must pool their talents in order to survive and find a way out.

movies.title: Tsotsi
movies.details: Tsotsi is the young leader of a violent Johannesburg street gang - his name means 'thug' - whose world changes when an infant falls into his care. Gripping, ruthless and absorbing - Oscar winner for Best Foreign Language Film.

movies.title: Winchester
movies.details: Firearms heiress Sarah Winchester becomes convinced that she's haunted by the souls of those killed by guns. When skeptical psychiatrist Eric Price visits her estate, he soon discovers that her obsession may not be so far-fetched after all.

movies.title: The Impossible
movies.details: A couple (Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor) and their three sons encounter terror, courage and compassion following the December 2004 tsunami that devastated Thailand. Nothing is more powerful than the human spirit.

movies.title: The Ninth Gate
movies.details: A book broker discovers his latest find may summon Satan.

movies.title: Laws Of Attraction
movies.details: High-powered rival matrimonial lawyers must pretend to be married in order to salvage a case in which they are facing off - what if they wind up falling for each other?

movies.title: Nurse 3D
movies.details: Paz de la Huerta plays Abby, a seductive nurse who takes it upon herself to punish and kill cheating men. But when her friendship towards Danni, a fellow nurse, turns to obsession, Danni must dig into Abby’s past if she hopes to stop her.

movies.title: The Last Witch Hunter
movies.details: A queen witch rises from the dead, seeking revenge against the immortal warrior who slayed her.

movies.title: Stronger
movies.details: A victim of the Boston Marathon bombing in 2013 helps the police track down the killers while struggling to recover from devastating trauma.

movies.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
movies.details: When a group of vacationing friends fails to lower the ladder of their yacht, they find themselves stranded in the surrounding waters and begin a desperate struggle for survival.

movies.title: Rapture-Palooza
movies.details: Following a religious apocalypse, a young couple sets out to defeat the Antichrist (Craig Robinson).

movies.title: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married Too?
movies.details: When Terry Bobb (Perry) and his wife agree to meet three other couples for a tropical getaway, they have no clue how much emotional baggage is joining them. In no time, there's lots of trouble in paradise.

movies.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
movies.details: Their three kids, cousins and old friends reunite for the first time in years at the Chicago home of Eduardo and Anna for Christmas, setting the stage for a delightful tale of family bonds and dysfunctions.

movies.title: Draft Day
movies.details: At the NFL Draft, General Manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

movies.title: American Assassin
movies.details: Dylan O’Brien and Michael Keaton star in this explosive action-thriller about a CIA black-ops recruit who uses his lethal skills to try and stop a rogue operative with a deadly agenda.

movies.title: Empire State
movies.details: Two childhood friends plan to rob an armored car, but an NYPD officer stands in their way.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn, Part 2
movies.details: Bella (Kristen Stewart) and Edward (Robert Pattinson) gather werewolves, vampires and other allies to help them protect their daughter from the Volturi. The epic finale that will live forever. Based on the novel by Stephenie Meyer.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.details: Say hello to my little friend! Cuban-immigrant drug lord Tony Montana has become a cultural icon, and the story of his ultra-violent rise and fall is a contemporary crime classic. Directed by Brian DePalma.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - What Happened in Helmand
episodes.details: When soldier Shaun Emery is accused of a crime he denies, newly promoted DI Rachel Carey investigates.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Toy Soldier
episodes.details: A dramatic new development makes DI Carey begin to doubt the truth about Shaun’s crime.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Truffle Hog
episodes.details: The conspiracy escalates as Shaun’s quest to clear his name takes a devastating turn.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Blind Spots
episodes.details: As Carey strays further out of her depth, Shaun receives help from an unexpected source.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - A Pilgrim Of Justice
episodes.details: Secrets are revealed, while Shaun and Carey’s discovery of the truth places them both in grave danger.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Correction
episodes.details: Carey teams up with Shaun Emery to try and expose Correction. But Napier is one step ahead and traps Shaun with a blackmail deal surrounding footage of his daughter. Carey confronts Garland, Hart and Napier - who explain what is at stake and try to recruit her to their side. Shaun’s future, and that of the nation’s system of justice, lie with one person. Carey has a decision to make.

series.title: The Capture
series.details: From blockbuster executive producer David Heyman and NBCUniversal International Studios comes "The Capture," a timely conspiracy thriller exploring pressing questions about surveillance and misinformation.

episodes.title: We Are Kings
episodes.details: Liberty City Warriors co-founder, famous entertainer and political activist Luther "Uncle Luke" Campbell tours Liberty City and describes the origins of the Warriors program.

episodes.title: The West Is Back
episodes.details: Tutu Atwell and Miami Northwestern's quest to win a state championship is interrupted when everyone's focus is pulled from football as Hurricane Irma approaches, threatening historic destruction.

episodes.title: We're Still Here
episodes.details: Liberty City recovers from Hurricane Irma while upcoming games against archrival Overtown present challenges for the Warriors football teams. The lingering fallout from Hurricane Irma leaves the Dread family disrupted and struggling to overcome the new challenges. Herb celebrates his first big win as a head coach.

For 13-year-olds Destiny and Robert, growing up in Liberty City adds bigger and sometimes more dangerous stakes. A birthday party that gets out of hand provides a much-needed reality check. Meanwhile, the Dread family continues to struggle with the consequence of an unwelcome separation, and little George struggles with big feelings.

episodes.title: Girls Dream
episodes.details: The Dread family continues to struggle with their housing situation, while the pressure of football and coming fatherhood finally gets to Herb, affecting his coaching on the field.

episodes.title: Who We Do This For
episodes.details: For all of the players, teams and coaches, the end of the season means it's back to regular life in Liberty City and time to reflect on what the future holds on the field and off.

series.title: Warriors Of Liberty City
series.details: The series follows the Liberty City Warriors, a youth football program. Life, like football, is a contact sport, and for the kids, being a Warrior holds the key to both.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Night Work
episodes.details: London 1891. As the police investigate a series of gruesome murders, renowned explorer Sir Malcolm Murray and the strangely beautiful Vanessa Ives know there’s something darker at play. In search of someone close to them who has been lost, they recruit American sharp-shooter Ethan Chandler and Dr. Victor Frankenstein to help them on their journey.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Seance
episodes.details: In pursuit of answers, Vanessa and Sir Malcolm attend a party at the home of Egyptologist Sir Ferdinand Lyle, where they encounter the mysteriously beautiful Dorian Gray. The party takes a turn, however, when renowned medium Madame Kali hosts a séance. Meanwhile, Ethan befriends Brona Croft, a young Irish immigrant.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Resurrection
episodes.details: Dr. Frankenstein is confronted by the consequences of his past. Vanessa has a vision of Mina which leads her, Sir Malcolm, Ethan and Sembene to the London Zoo where they discover and capture Fenton – servant to a vampire master.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Demimonde
episodes.details: Vanessa’s infatuation with Dorian Gray continues to grow. Professor Abraham Van Helsing is hired by Sir Malcolm to work with Dr. Frankenstein to uncover a cure to the disease that might be affecting his daughter. Fenton draws his master to Sir Malcolm’s mansion.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Closer Than Sisters
episodes.details: Vanessa recalls her past and the events which ultimately lead to Mina’s disappearance.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - What Death Can Join Together
episodes.details: Vanessa’s latest vision leads Sir Malcolm, Ethan and Sembene to explore a plague ship in search of Mina. Professor Abraham Van Helsing reveals to Dr. Frankenstein more details about the creature that has taken Mina. Vanessa’s night with Dorian unlocks something dark within her.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Possession
episodes.details: Over the course of four harrowing weeks, Sir Malcolm, Ethan, Dr. Frankenstein and Sembene do everything they can to save Vanessa from the demons within her.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Grand Guignol
episodes.details: After having a vision of the Grand Guignol theater, Vanessa, Sir Malcolm, Ethan, Dr. Frankenstein and Sembene explore the empty theater and are confronted by their worst nightmares.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Fresh Hell
episodes.details: Sir Malcolm returns to find a new evil hunting Vanessa.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Verbis Diablo
episodes.details: Ferdinand Lyle reveals the disturbing backstory of the Verbis Diablo.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - The Nightcomers
episodes.details: In a flashback episode, Vanessa meets The Cut-Wife, who teaches her how to harness her powers. Isolated at her lonely cottage on the moors, the Cut-Wife quickly realizes the extent of Vanessa’s powers and warns her of the danger that lies ahead and the evil that pursues her.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Evil Spirits in Heavenly Places
episodes.details: Lyle reveals how the dark story of the Verbis Diablo affects Vanessa.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Above the Vaulted Sky
episodes.details: Vanessa, Ethan and Sir Malcolm protect the mansion from another attack.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Glorious Horrors
episodes.details: Sir Malcolm gets tragic news. A glorious night turns to horror for Vanessa.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - Little Scorpion
episodes.details: Vanessa and Ethan flee London for the Cut-Wife's cottage.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Memento Mori
episodes.details: The Creature unleashes his rage on Frankenstein over Lily. Inspector Rusk discovers Sir Malcolm’s connection to Ethan Chandler. Malcolm goes to confront Evelyn — but quickly finds himself assaulted by another one of her deadly enchantments.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - And Hell Itself My Only Foe
episodes.details: Back in London, Vanessa and Ethan learn that Sir Malcolm is in danger. Desperate to save him, Vanessa goes alone to battle Evelyn. Ethan heads out to Evelyn’s mansion with Frankenstein, Sembene and Lyle. Lily reveals her true self to Dorian.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - And They Were Enemies
episodes.details: Vanessa must rely on her profound strength to defeat the Demon in a titanic struggle. Meanwhile, Ethan leaves a tragic trail of blood in his wake. Sir Malcolm and Frankenstein must confront ghosts from their past while Lyle helps to rescue his friends. The Creature tries to escape the Putney’s. Vanessa faces an uncertain future.

episodes.title: Ep 301 - The Day Tennyson Died
episodes.details: Vanessa seeks the help of Dr. Seward to battle a new evil.

episodes.title: Ep 302 - Predators Far and Near
episodes.details: Lily and Dorian rescue a young woman. Sir Malcolm continues on his journey with the enigmatic Kaetenay. Meanwhile, Ethan gets some unexpected help from Hecate. Dr. Frankenstein and Dr. Jekyll hatch a plan. Vanessa’s relationship with Dr. Sweet grows but, unbeknownst to her, evil forces are tracking her every move.

episodes.title: Ep 303 - Good and Evil Braided Be
episodes.details: Vanessa is confronted by a familiar, who reveals a clue to her past.

episodes.title: Ep 304 - A Blade of Grass
episodes.details: After receiving a clue about a past experience, Vanessa convinces Dr. Seward to use a new form of therapy, hypnosis, to take her back in time.

episodes.title: Ep 305 - This World Is Our Hell
episodes.details: Hecate and Ethan struggle to survive the harsh wasteland of the New Mexico desert. Kaetenay reveals to Sir Malcolm the truth behind his connection to Ethan. Back in London, Frankenstein’s addition to Jekyll’s formula is a success.

episodes.title: Ep 306 - No Beast So Fierce
episodes.details: Vanessa turns to her old friend Ferdinand Lyle for help. Lyle introduces her to Catriona Hartdegen, a new ally. Lily, Dorian and Justine put their plan in motion. Ethan, Sir Malcolm and Hecate arrive at Jarod Talbot’s ranch.

episodes.title: Ep 307 - Ebb Tide
episodes.details: Kaetenay has a vision of impending doom. Frankenstein and Jekyll get help from an unlikely foe. The Creature finally gains courage. With the help of Catriona, Vanessa learns an awful truth.

episodes.title: Ep 308 - Perpetual Night
episodes.details: Ethan, Sir Malcolm and Kaetenay return to London. Dr. Seward discovers Renfield’s secret. Ethan heads out in search of Dr. Frankenstein. Lily reveals a heartbreaking story from Brona Croft’s past.

episodes.title: Ep 309 - The Blessed Dark
episodes.details: Ethan learns the shocking truth about Kaetenay. Dr. Seward uses hypnosis on Renfield. The Creature must make a moral decision that could affect his relationship. Sir Malcolm, Ethan, Kaetenay, Dr. Seward and Catriona battle to save Vanessa.

series.title: Penny Dreadful
series.details: Penny Dreadful is a psychological thriller filled with dark mystery and suspense, where personal demons from the past can be stronger than vampires, evil spirits and immortal beasts.

episodes.title: The New World
episodes.details: Catherine of Aragon arrives in England to wed Prince Arthur, heir to the English throne, in a marriage contract intended to forge an alliance between the two nations.

episodes.title: Fever Dream
episodes.details: Catherine is one step closer to the English throne with her marriage to Arthur but must navigate the challenges of a new relationship and a new court.

episodes.title: An Audacious Plan
episodes.details: Catherine remains determined to become England's future Queen and makes plans to marry Prince Harry. Lizzie has a troubling premonition following a complicated labor.

episodes.title: The Battle For Harry
episodes.details: As the nation mourns Lizzie's passing and Catherine works to secure her marriage to Harry, Henry shocks the family by announcing his intention to honor his wife's dying wish.

episodes.title: Heart Versus Duty
episodes.details: Catherine is faced with a dilemma - marry King Henry Tudor and immediately become Queen of England - or find a way to refuse and hold out for Harry.

episodes.title: A Polite Kidnapping
episodes.details: The English throne seems within Catherine's reach, but an unfortunate twist of fate means that her future now lies in the hands of her unstable older sister.

episodes.title: All is Lost
episodes.details: The whole country is suffering - Catherine is barely recognizable as the 'Spanish Princess' and Maggie is destitute, but Catherine is determined not to abandon her destiny.

episodes.title: Destiny
episodes.details: The fate of England hangs in the balance when the Tudor family is rocked by tragedy. Catherine risks everything to find out if Harry still loves her.

episodes.title: Camelot
episodes.details: With a powerful alliance with Spain and an heir sleeping in his crib, what could go wrong for glamorous royal couple Catherine and Henry?

episodes.title: Flodden
episodes.details: Henry invades France, leaving a pregnant Catherine to defend England from Scottish king, James IV. Let the Battle of Flodden commence…

episodes.title: The Other Woman
episodes.details: As Meg jeopardises everything for love, a pregnant Catherine wrestles with the sickening suspicion that Henry is being unfaithful.

episodes.title: Plague
episodes.details: When the plague hits London, the court flees to Hampton Court but Maggie and Thomas More remain in the empty – and surprisingly romantic - palace.

episodes.title: Field of Cloth of Gold
episodes.details: A grand meeting in France forms the backdrop for a political clash of wits between Catherine and Wolsey – while back in London, rioting erupts.

episodes.title: Faith
episodes.details: A new religion is on the rise, as is tension at court. Catherine must stop Henry’s dangerous paranoia from turning friends into enemies…

episodes.title: Peace
episodes.details: As Henry descends into madness, the stakes have never been higher for Catherine. Her husband has become a threat to her life.

episodes.title: Hero Trailer
episodes.details: The Spanish Princess returns to continue the story of Queen Catherine and Henry VIII. Despite proving herself in the court, Catherine battles to save her love with the King as she struggles to produce an heir and preserve the prosperity of their reign. New episodes 11 October.

series.title: The Spanish Princess
series.details: “The Spanish Princess” is the vivid and captivating reclaiming of Catherine of Aragon’s story, which has historically been overshadowed by her infamous marriage to King Henry VIII.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 101
episodes.details: A fractured family at the heart of politics and power is pulled together under catastrophic circumstances.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 102
episodes.details: With their son fighting for his life in the hospital, the story of Max and Kathryn's relationship and their battles for control over the future of their son are revealed.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 103
episodes.details: Kathryn dedicates herself to Caden's recovery, while Max grapples with the ramifications of his son's physical and mental changes.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 104
episodes.details: Max weighs the political candidates as the general election looms - but has his judgement been impaired by his son's illness?

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 105
episodes.details: Twenty years of family hurt and betrayal come to a head as the mother, the father and the son gather at a remote rural house near Caden's rehab facility.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 106
episodes.details: Having chosen their sides, everyone digs themselves in for the impending war. Caden finds Orla to warn her that she may be caught in the crossfire.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Episode 107
episodes.details: Max is under the spotlight as a nation stands on the brink. Kathryn must decide whether to make a huge sacrifice for the sake of exposing the truth and destroying Max.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Episode 108
episodes.details: Caden leaves the rehabilitation centre, returning to London and an uncertain future. Kathryn ponders the offer that Max has made to her. How will Caden react to the news? Can she ever trust Max to keep his word? And where will the nation find itself after the most divisive of election campaigns?

series.title: MotherFatherSon
series.details: Max owns one of the world's most influential media empires. Information is his trade: he holds dark secrets on everyone, and uses his power ruthlessly, including on his own family.

episodes.title: Salt
episodes.details: 22-year-old Tess moves to New York City for a blank slate, without friends or a specific ambition. After an intense interview at one of the city’s best restaurants, she’s invited to train to be a back-waiter. On her first day, she attempts to keep up with this fast-paced world of serving while observing the complicated dynamics among her new coworkers.

episodes.title: Now Your Tongue is Coded
episodes.details: Tess discovers after-hours shift drinks for staff, where she becomes enthralled with Simone. When Sasha recruits her to find his missing wife, Tess finds out where everyone goes after work.

episodes.title: Everyone is Soigné
episodes.details: Tess struggles with the three-plate carry, which leads to a romantic encounter. After meeting restaurant alumna Serena, Simone advises the impressed Tess not to believe everything she sees.

episodes.title: Simone's
episodes.details: Tess goes exploring on her day off and has an unsettling chance meeting. Tess visits Simone at home, but her abrupt exit from Simone’s place leaves Tess feeling lonelier than ever.

episodes.title: Weird Night
episodes.details: Following a chaotic, stressful night at the restaurant, Tess and Sasha embark on a drug-fueled night of dancing and adventure to unwind…but the night takes an unexpected and dangerous turn.

episodes.title: It's Mine
episodes.details: Tess faces final exam day at the restaurant, but the day’s events are fraught with revelations about coworkers, an injury to herself, and a mistake that may ruin her chances of being hired.

episodes.title: The Pork Special
episodes.details: Howard takes his staff to learn where their food comes from. Tess learns information that makes her wonder whom she can trust.

episodes.title: Equifax & Experian
episodes.details: Tess’ bad credit score reveals something about her past, and the gang tries to help. Sasha is accused when Santos’ new shoes go missing.

episodes.title: Last of the Season
episodes.details: Maddie Glover, the restaurant’s head chef, returns for a surprise menu tasting. Tess connects with a handsome guest. Will receives a surprising offer.

episodes.title: Sec or Demi-Sec
episodes.details: Tess has a mortifying sexual encounter with Omar. Sasha receives terrible news from home. A table makes a racist comment to Heather.

episodes.title: Entropy
episodes.details: There’s a retaliation when Howard decides to restructure the restaurant’s tip structure. Tess learns more about Simone and gets closer to Jake.

episodes.title: Truffles and Champagne
episodes.details: Simone’s ex-husband shows up in the restaurant and dredges up old feelings. Tess tries to figure out what, and whom, she really wants.

episodes.title: Peach Treats
episodes.details: Tess and Jake take their relationship to the next level, causing tension with Simone. Ari feels abandoned. Will uses his power for a questionable purpose.

episodes.title: Bodega Cat
episodes.details: Tess learns the truth about Jake and Simone’s past. She forms a plan to get everything she wants in the restaurant.

series.title: Sweetbitter
series.details: Tess begins working at NYC’s top restaurant, thinking it will be a temporary job, but is soon intoxicated by the restaurant’s workers, the nightlife, and the fast-paced lifestyle.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - The Ordeal
episodes.details: Carrying two bottles of champagne home, Ashley is ready to ring in the new year with Miles, her ride-or-die partner of 12 years and father of their son, Sean. But when she turns the corner and finds Miles being dragged out of their apartment and into the back of a squad car, her whole world is turned upside down.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Smashley Rose
episodes.details: It's sentencing day for Miles and tensions are high as Ashley, Rainey and Trish wait for the judge's decision. But when the gavel comes down, Ashley's day is set on a path towards destruction. Rainey goes shopping for Sean.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - The Rule of Three
episodes.details: With his dad gone, Sean is beginning to spiral out. When a tough parenting moment is upon Ashley, Rainey and the turner family try to introduce her to the "Rule of Three." Trish has a really, really bad day.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - The Four Hustlateers
episodes.details: Ashley and Rainey start bonding with some of Miles' old weed. Earl's parole officers pays him a visit and reveals a new parole requirement. Janelle's dates don't go so well.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Beaches Be Trippin'
episodes.details: Ashley bails on a visit with Miles. Convinced it will help Ashley through the emotional trauma of her situation, Janelle convinces Ashley to join her on a trip to the beach and Trish and Jacque invite themselves along. Oh, and Earl has his first job interview.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Ghost Dad
episodes.details: Ashley's struggle with how to tell Sean about Miles' incarceration is at a fever pitch, so she enlists the Miles in her head to figure out how to tell him.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Seannie Darko
episodes.details: Sean has a bad day, so the family goes bowling to try and cheer him up. Meanwhile, Trish and Jacque figure out how to finally be their own bosses. Earl finally gets his burrito.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Bride or Die
episodes.details: Ashley brings the whole family to visitation to see Miles. Earl heads off to start his first day of work at the ports but is hit with red light special when he gets back to the docks.

series.title: Blindspotting
series.details: “Blindspotting” centers on Ashley, who is living in Oakland until her partner and father of their son, is incarcerated, leaving her to navigate an existential crisis.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 1
episodes.details: Charlie, a fiery and brilliant young actress, meets a mysterious stranger on the beach in Greece and he draws her into a high-stakes international espionage operation.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 2
episodes.details: Charlie is recruited with the promise of the role of a lifetime to infiltrate a dangerous revolutionary cell. As a cover story, she and Becker must pose as lovers.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 3
episodes.details: Charlie drives a car laden with explosives to a drop-off in Austria, while Kurtz and Becker race to save her from a fatal misstep.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 4
episodes.details: Charlie awaits contact from Michel's network, but her performance may not hold up under scrutiny. She and Becker share a last moment together before she crosses the point of no return.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 5
episodes.details: Charlie joins a group of revolutionaries in Lebanon, with no one to save her if she is exposed as a spy. She works to earn the trust of Khalil and Michel's sister, Fatmeh.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 6
episodes.details: Charlie prepares for her part in Khalil's next strike.

series.title: The Little Drummer Girl
series.details: The Little Drummer Girl is a passionate love story and a deeply immersive thriller. As audacious now as when the book was first published, it portrays a world in which the lines between hero and villain, and between love and hate, are dangerously in flux.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Billabong
episodes.details: When American Eve Thorogood and her family take a vacation in the Australian Outback, they get more than they bargained for in the shape of a monster named Mick Taylor.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Kutyukutyu
episodes.details: Haunted by the violent deaths of her parents and brother, Eve sets out alone to cross the most remote country on earth on her quest for revenge.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Salt Lake
episodes.details: Realising Eve is hunting him, Mick Taylor puts into play a murderous game of cat and mouse. When push comes to shove Eve isn't sure she can kill him in cold blood.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Opalville
episodes.details: As Mick’s murder spree continues Eve investigates the cold case disappearance of a young girl, only to be captured by her predator… and barely makes it out alive.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Rome
episodes.details: Disguised as a waitress at a lingerie bar in a pit stop town, Eve lies in wait for Mick Taylor. Her thirst for revenge wont be quenched until he's dead.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Wolf Creek
episodes.details: Lured to Wolf Creek Crater, Eve comes face to face with her quarry – will she be the victor or the vanquished?

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Journey
episodes.details: A group of international tourists embark on an outback adventure of a life me, only to find their tour driver has disappeared and been replaced with a mysterious man named Mick Taylor.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Outback
episodes.details: Discovering that Mick has left them in the middle of nowhere, the group realise that their trip of a lifetime has turned into a desperate bid for survival.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Chase
episodes.details: Dealing with the traumatic turn of events and realising they are being targeted by Mick, the group make their way towards a hill in search of water and civilisation. But as they bicker and fight, Mick closes in.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Singing
episodes.details: Steve is rescued by two indigenous stockmen, only to find that they are hunted by Mick. Still reeling after Michelle’s death, the group struggle on as Nina gets bitten by a snake. Meanwhile, Kelly is finally able to confront Mick as he captures Steve.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Shelter
episodes.details: Brian, Rebecca, Nina and Oskar find a mothballed mine and a caretaker and his family, while Mick violently presses Kelly for information of their whereabouts.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Return
episodes.details: Rebecca and Brian make it to Mick’s lair in search for petrol and Danny, but Mick is hot on their heels and mad as hell.

series.title: Wolf Creek
series.details: Mick Taylor returns to wreak havoc in Wolf Creek. Except this time a victim fights back. The sole survivor of the massacre of her family, American college student Eve Thorogood vows to bring the killer to justice or die in the attempt.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - HOOKED
episodes.details: India Oxenberg, the 28-year-old daughter of actress Catherine Oxenberg, speaks out for the first time about her involvement in NXIVM and how she became a “branded sex slave.”

episodes.title: Ep 102 - INDOCTRINATED
episodes.details: The NXIVM curriculum gradually transforms India into a true believer. When actress Allison Mack approaches her about an elite, secret society of women, India hands over damaging personal “collateral” to join, not grasping that she is signing over her freedom and falling deeper into the clutches of the cult leader, manipulative sexual predator Keith Raniere.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - ENSLAVED
episodes.details: In the Albany suburb of Clifton Park, home to NXIVM’s insular inner circle and location of the cult’s darkest crimes and abuses, India, as a member of the secret slave master group known as DOS, is subjected to forced starvation, sleep deprivation, emotional abuse, physical punishments, separation from family, repeated sexual assault, and being branded without anesthesia.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - EXPOSED
episodes.details: Catherine begins the fight of her life to expose the cult and rescue her daughter.

series.title: SEDUCED: INSIDE THE NXIVM CULT
series.details: This four-part documentary series follows the story of India Oxenberg’s perilous journey through the dark and criminal world of the notorious self-help-group-turned-sex-slave-cult NXIVM.

episodes.title: Night 1
episodes.details: From humble beginnings at circus sideshows to sold out concert halls in Europe, night 1 of Houdini follows the rise of the boy Erich Weiss as he becomes the man Harry Houdini, master escapologist.

episodes.title: Night 2
episodes.details: Night 2 of Houdini follows Harry Houdini's epic battle against the spiritualists whose practices he found to be false and misleading. As the 20th century progresses, Houdini must come to terms with his new place in a fast-changing world.

series.title: Houdini
series.details: Starring Academy Award winner* Adrien Brody and Kristen Connolly, HOUDINI, follows the world-renowned master of escape's transformation from immigrant to superstar.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Not Exactly How We Planned
episodes.details: James "Ghost" St. Patrick opens Truth nightclub, hoping its success will let him leave his life as a NYC drug kingpin. But a run-in with a past love and a drug-related attack threaten him.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Whoever He Is
episodes.details: Ghost and Tommy respond to the attacks on the drug business, Ghost's wife Tasha laments his new club career, and Ghost rekindles his relationship with Angela - a US Attorney chasing Ghost's distributor.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - This Is Real
episodes.details: A model's near-death in Truth jeopardizes the club's future. The rift between Ghost and Tasha over the nightclub widens. Ghost is reminded that pursuing Angela - and a legit life - could endanger his family.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Who Are You?
episodes.details: Ghost and Tommy plan to gather their network of gang leaders while Angela plans surveillance for the same meeting. The mystery assailant strikes again. Ghost admits to Angela that he's married with children.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - I Gotta Go
episodes.details: Concerned over Ghost's attitude, Tasha interferes with club business. Ghost and Angela pursue their affair. Tommy dates a club employee. Ghost and Tommy agree that gang leader Ruiz is behind the attacks.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Who You With?
episodes.details: Tommy makes peace with Ruiz while Angela has one of Ruiz's gang wired. Ghost forgets Tasha's birthday. Ghost and Angela confront the reality of their affair. Ghost's driver speaks too candidly to Tasha.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Loyalty
episodes.details: Tasha sees Angela for the first time. Ghost learns a friend may be behind the hits while Angela races to stop the next attack. Ghost makes a commitment to Angela. The mastermind behind the attacks is revealed.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Best Laid Plans
episodes.details: Ghost plans a huge party at Think, hoping to expand out of NYC and the drug world. Pink Sneakers attempts to murder Ghost. Ghost makes a big decision in an attempt to achieve his dream of going legit.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Consequences
episodes.details: Ghost picks up the pieces at Truth after the botched murder attempt against him, while recommitting to the drug game. Tommy disappears after learning that Angela's with the feds.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - No Friends On The Street
episodes.details: Tommy agrees to help Ghost expand the drug business under one condition - Ghost uses Angela to discover what she knows about them. Kanan's release from jail is a surprise for Ghost.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Like We're Any Other Couple
episodes.details: Ghost finally takes Angela to Miami. They live the fantasy of being a couple, but the reality of her investigation destroys it. Back in New York, Tommy and Kanan become close.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - You're The Only Person I Can Trust
episodes.details: Ghost fights to retain control over everyone in his life: Tommy, Angela, Tasha and Simon Stern, who is making it impossible for him to win back his club.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Who You Are And Who You Want To Be
episodes.details: Ghost and Tommy work to sell all of the product in time to pay Lobos, unaware that Holly is being questioned by the FBI. With every passing hour, Angela grows closer to the truth.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Why Her?
episodes.details: After learning that Ghost and Jamie are the same man, Angela looks for proof. A new member joins the drug syndicate. Tasha makes a wife's ultimate sacrifice to protect her future.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - You're Not The Man
episodes.details: Tommy's on edge about Holly's disappearance after talking with the feds. Ghost and Tasha work to rein him in. Angela seems to believe Ghost when he explains his actions...or does she?

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Three Moves Ahead
episodes.details: Danger closes in on Ghost and Tommy as Lobos fends off a rival drug cartel and the feds. Ghost scrambles to get from underneath Lobos before Angela gets to him first.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - Time's Up
episodes.details: Tommy's locked up as Angela and the feds push him to flip on Lobos or spend his life in jail. Ghost works to do the right thing - but the consequences of his actions are steep.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - Ghost Is Dead
episodes.details: Bodies from Ghost's organization are dropping left and right, each death inching closer to Ghost and Tommy. Both the threat of Kanan and Angela's investigation are just as lethal.

episodes.title: Ep 301 - Call Me James
episodes.details: Out of the drug game, James is ready to leave "Ghost" behind. Angela must decide between love and honor. Tasha reels from the death of Shawn. Tommy is forced to make some bold moves.

episodes.title: Ep 302 - It's Never Over
episodes.details: Ghost scrambles to tie up loose ends while he deals with new nightlife competition. Tommy confronts Tasha, as she and Angela must learn to coexist. Tommy gains an advisor in his returned love, Holly.

episodes.title: Ep 303 - I Got This On Lock
episodes.details: Ghost is presented with an opportunity that could take the clubs to the next level, all while looking over his shoulder. Tommy reunites with Tasha in a scheme, while he also tries to keep a contact under control.

episodes.title: Ep 304 - Don't Worry, Baby
episodes.details: As the opportunity to expand the clubs evolves, Ghost is spread even thinner between Angela, the kids, business, and Tommy. Tommy struggles with a decision, Kanan gets back into the life, and Angela faces doubts.

episodes.title: Ep 305 - Help Me
episodes.details: Tommy searches for who made the attempt on his life. Greg leans on Ruiz to give up the true "Ghost", while Angela does all she can to keep them away. Proctor informs Ghost he may have a new problem.

episodes.title: Ep 306 - The Right Decision
episodes.details: Tommy and Ghost reunite to take out a dangerous foe, enlisting Tasha in a plan to escape detection by Angela and her team. While Tommy soldiers forward, Ghost loses control at a crucial moment.

episodes.title: Ep 307 - Don't Go
episodes.details: Angela reels after her breakup, but must face some difficult questions at work. Ghost must scramble to not lose the club deal, while he and Tommy are forced back into the game. Dre learns the meaning of the La Arana card.

episodes.title: Ep 308 - Trust Me
episodes.details: Mike and Angela hunt for the mole. Angela gets a lead, while she must solidify Tommy's alibi. Tasha receives a warning as Tariq makes a dangerous new friend. Milan issues an edict to push a new product.

episodes.title: Ep 309 - I Call The Shots
episodes.details: Angela takes action to find the mole, while Ghost makes a move to regain the club deal. Ghost and Tasha fall into a familiar role while Kanan has a dark influence on Tariq. Milan warns Tommy of the price of betrayal.

episodes.title: Ep 310 - In My Best Interest
episodes.details: Ghost races to retrieve evidence, while he throws the party of his career. Tasha forms an unlikely alliance in an attempt to save her family. But will Tommy make a move that will change everyone's life forever?

episodes.title: Ep 401 - When I Get Out
episodes.details: Having been arrested for the murder of Agent Knox, Ghost faces threats from all angles. The Feds begin to build their case and Tasha scrambles to get bail. Tommy navigates his new role and enlists help in recovering Tariq.

episodes.title: Ep 402 - Things Are Going To Get Worse
episodes.details: Proctor works to protect his client as Ghost faces harassment. The team discusses their strategy for taking down St. Patrick. Tommy struggles to let go of his old duties. Tasha talks to the kids about what's going on.

episodes.title: Ep 403 - The Kind Of Man You Are
episodes.details: The prosecutors turn up the heat, forcing Tommy to execute a plan that diverts their attention. Teresi learns information about Ghost and begins a blackmail scheme. And in his father's absence, Tariq seeks out Kanan.

episodes.title: Ep 404 - We're In This Together
episodes.details: Mak brings Angela back onto the prosecution team and gives her a task that brings her face-to-face with Tasha. Julio struggles to manage the primeras below him and Tommy's behavior. Tariq continues running with Kanan.

episodes.title: Ep 405 - Don't Thank Me
episodes.details: With tensions high, Silver warns Ghost that Tasha may have to testify. Meanwhile, now aware of Ghost's innocence, Angela struggles to find a way to stop the prosecution. And Teresi sets a plan in motion to eliminate Ghost.

episodes.title: Ep 406 - New Man
episodes.details: Returning to Truth - Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. And with Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq.

episodes.title: Ep 407 - You Lied To My Face
episodes.details: As Ghost moves forward with his new business, the St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye. Tasha seeks out Silver and their relationship deepens. When Tommy returns, Dre talks himself into a promotion.

episodes.title: Ep 408 - It's Done
episodes.details: When Ghost sees the location for the business is gang-infested, he re-teams with Tommy to clean it up. As Tommy threatens war, his organization starts to destabilize. And, unhappy, Tariq looks to some old friends.

episodes.title: Ep 409 - That Ain't Me
episodes.details: When Ghost realizes he's getting screwed, he starts playing dirty. After meeting the boss, Angela explores other options. Tommy gets proof that paints Kate in a new light. And with people after him, Tariq hatches a plan.

episodes.title: Ep 410 - You Can't Fix This
episodes.details: When tragedy befalls the St. Patrick family, Ghost and Tommy seek retribution. Tasha tries to keep things together at home. Meanwhile, Angela uses her own skills resources to figure out what Ghost is hiding.

episodes.title: Ep 501 - Everyone Is Implicated
episodes.details: James "Ghost" St. Patrick forms a dangerous alliance with his brother-in-arms, Tommy, and mortal enemy Kanan. Angela is implicated in murder and turns to an unlikely ally. Tasha enlists LaKeisha to protect Tariq.

episodes.title: Ep 502 - Damage Control
episodes.details: The St. Patrick family grieves Raina while the AUSA's office discusses taking down "Ghost" and ending Angela's career. Councilman Tate exploits Raina's death. Dre maintains order within his organization.
