episodes.title: Ep 503 - Are We On The Same Team?
episodes.details: Ghost and Tasha butt heads on how to grieve. Angela pursues the Jimenez Cartel while Kanan goes after Dre's organization. Tommy confides in LaKeisha about his relationship with Teresi, complicating everyone's lives.

episodes.title: Ep 504 - Second Chances
episodes.details: Tensions run high when Jason returns. Ghost warns Tommy about Teresi while he hatches a plan with Kanan to rid Tommy of his new family. Angela gets closer to arresting the Jimenez Cartel. Kanan forms an unlikely alliance.

episodes.title: Ep 505 - Happy Birthday
episodes.details: The St. Patricks celebrate Tariq's birthday without Raina. Ghost is on the outs with Tate and learns Dre is ready to replace him in the legitimate world. Kanan drops Tariq at school, bonding over their mistrust of Ghost.

episodes.title: Ep 506 - A Changed Man?
episodes.details: After his spiritual awakening with Rev. Macedon, Ghost confesses his sins to Angela. Angela preps Tasha for Federal questioning and Ghost must break his business deal with Tommy when Truth is audited by the IRS.

episodes.title: Ep 507 - The Devil Inside
episodes.details: Ghost, Tommy and Kanan move forward with their task to kill the heads of the Jimenez Cartel. Donovan warns Angela that her own office is after her. LaKeisha lets slip that Teresi is Tommy's father.

episodes.title: Ep 508 - A Friend of the Family
episodes.details: The AUSA turns up the heat on Ghost and implicates his inner circle in on a RICO. Ghost and Tommy plan to frame Dre for the murder of Raymond Jones, Raina's killer, while Angela and Tasha enact a plan of their own.

episodes.title: Ep 509 - There's A Snitch Among Us
episodes.details: When Angela's arrest of Jimenez gives her a solid win, she discovers plans that would undercut her career. Ghost tasks Tommy in killing a snitch, changing all of their lives. Tariq accepts the consequences of his choices.

episodes.title: Ep 510 - When This Is Over
episodes.details: When the RICO case comes crashing down, Angela breaks ranks to form her own A-team. LaKeisha takes a stand of her own while Ghost, Tommy, Tasha, and Angela race against the clock to prove their innocence...but to what end?

episodes.title: Ep 601 - Murderers
episodes.details: James “Ghost” St. Patrick seeks vengeance for the dreams and symbol of redemption he lost due to the ill will of his former drug partner and brother Tommy Egan. Tasha vows to get even with Ghost for the murder of Terry Silver. Tariq and Tommy have a peculiar moment to mourn an old friend, Kanan Stark. The AUSA’s Office is under new leadership.

episodes.title: Ep 602 - Whose Side Are You On?
episodes.details: Tommy lays low after his mustang is riddled with bullets. Tensions run high with Ghost and Jason. Tommy enlists LaKeisha to help with his business. Tasha confronts Ghost about Terry Silver.

episodes.title: Ep 603 - Forgot About Dre
episodes.details: After assisting Angela in the arrest of Alicia Jiminez, Dre remains in the custody of the Federal Government. Jason tasks Tommy and Ghost to kidnap Alicia Jimenez. Tommy teaches LaKeisha the drug game. Tariq’s new business venture begins to flourish. Tasha has a business plan of her own. The AUSAs turn the heat up on Dre.

episodes.title: Ep 604 - Why Is Tommy Still Alive?
episodes.details: Tasha gets her groove back when she sparks a new flame. Ghost utilizes all his resources in an attempt to kill Tommy. Tommy’s primeras get caught in the crossfire. Tariq’s in over his head with Tommy’s Italian family and Dre forms an unlikely alliance. Joe Proctor’s relationship with his ex-wife takes a turn when he hatches a plan to gain custody of their daughter.

episodes.title: Ep 605 - King's Gambit
episodes.details: A financially debilitated Tasha revisits old habits when she begins to recruit soldiers for her new empire. Tariq pulls a ruse on Vincent to fulfill his intractable drug demands. Proctor warns Tommy about a snitch while he is being squeezed by the AUSAs to inform on Tommy Egan. Ghost plans to take care of the snitch on his own terms.

episodes.title: Ep 606 - Inside Man
episodes.details: After being duped by Tariq with his counterfeit drugs, Vincent holds Tariq hostage. Ghost and Tommy call a temporary truce, forming a dangerous alliance in order to face a common enemy. Tasha agrees to put her differences to the side and turns to an unlikely ally for help.

episodes.title: Ep 607 - Like Father, Like Son
episodes.details: As the St. Patrick family is reunited, Ghost and Tasha butt heads on how to properly raise Tariq. Tommy teaches Tariq a lesson. Tate gets caught with his pants down, jeopardizing his political campaign. LaKeisha creates some new enemies within Tommy’s drug organization. The pressure is on when Jason tasks Ghost and Tommy to work together.

episodes.title: Ep 608 - Deal With The Devil
episodes.details: The Feds turn the heat up on Tommy and bend the rules to scare LaKeisha into cooperating. Ghost discontinues a relationship with an ally after learning their position is compromised by law enforcement. Tasha confronts a snitch, which hits a little too close to home.

episodes.title: Ep 609 - Scorched Earth
episodes.details: As Ghost and Tommy move forward with their plan to kill Jason Micic, Tommy enacts a plan of his own. Dre uses a cleverly devised ruse to force Tommy’s organization to rebel against him. Tommy gets his comeuppance when he is faced with battling for his life against the kin of one of his past victims.

episodes.title: Ep 610 - No One Can Stop Me
episodes.details: Ghost has the best day ever, he’s on top of the world. Meanwhile the Feds intensively work to prove James St. Patrick is guilty for the murder of Terry Silver. But when Ghost makes a political move, it triggers resentment from his many enemies.

episodes.title: Ep 611 - Still DRE
episodes.details: After being framed by Ghost for the murder of Jason Micic, Dre (with nowhere to run) plans on leaving New York. But first he needs to take care of unfinished business.

episodes.title: Ep 612 - He Always Wins
episodes.details: Paz, still grieving Angela’s death, seeks out allies in the pursuit of justice – or vengeance. She forms an alliance with U.S Attorney Warner. Together they hatch a devious plan to arrest James St. Patrick for the murder of Angela Valdes. But things don’t go as planned.

episodes.title: Ep 613 - It's All Your Fault
episodes.details: Tommy’s on a path to avenge LaKeisha’s murder and settle his ultimate score. Elisa Marie takes the USB stick given to her in confidence by her father and investigates what’s on the thumb drive. After Tommy learns the recording still exists, he is deterred from his mission of killing Ghost. Tommy must destroy the evidence and he might need Ghost’s help to retrieve it.

episodes.title: Ep 614 - Reversal of Fortune
episodes.details: Tensions run high when Tate tasks Dre to kill Ghost. Tate’s obsessive hatred toward St. Patrick motivates him to lie about Ghost during a Federal questioning. The Feds are in striking distance of convicting St. Patrick for Silver’s murder.

episodes.title: Ep 615 - Exactly How We Planned
episodes.details: When Ghost is announced as Lt. Governor it gives him a solid win and makes him one step closer to a fully legitimate world. He soon discovers one of his many enemies actively carrying out a plan that changes his life forever.

episodes.title: Ep 6009 - Power Universe
episodes.details: Get a new look at the next chapters of Power coming to STARZ. #PowerNeverEnds

episodes.title: Ep 6010 - Kanan Tease
episodes.details: Get ready for Raising Kanan, the next series in the Power Universe. Coming soon 2021.

episodes.title: Ep 6011 - Power Universe
episodes.details: Get an inside look at what’s to come in the next chapters of Power on STARZ. #PowerNeverEnds

series.title: Power
series.details: James "Ghost" St. Patrick has it all: a beautiful wife, a Manhattan penthouse, and New York's hottest nightclub. But he's also the kingpin of the city's most lucrative drug network, causing many problems. Once you're in, can you ever get out?

episodes.title: In Bed With The Enemy
episodes.details: England is in a fractious state as the victor of the Battle of Bosworth, Henry Tudor, is set to ascend the throne. Elizabeth of York (“Lizzie”) and her family, supporters of the former King, find themselves in grave danger. Lizzie must fulfill her promise to marry King Henry VII, in order to bring peace to the warring nation.

episodes.title: Hearts And Minds
episodes.details: King Henry VII sets out on Royal Progress, in an attempt to establish himself as the new sovereign, but finds a dangerous, deeply divided kingdom. Lizzie’s loyalties are further complicated by the child she is expecting.

episodes.title: Burgundy
episodes.details: Lizzie struggles through her labor while King Henry’s envoys embark on a diplomatic mission to Burgundy, a York stronghold abroad. Negotiations are jeopardized by a twist of fate, and Lizzie learns she has more in common with her husband than she first imagined.

episodes.title: The Pretender
episodes.details: The York princesses are strategically married off to strengthen the Tudor cause, but further political challenges are on the horizon. When King Henry finds himself back on the battlefield to protect his reign, Lizzie learns that the threats they face may be closer to home.

episodes.title: Traitors
episodes.details: Lizzie must deal with her mother’s defiant defense of the York cause, while the appearance of a boy in Burgundy claiming to be a young prince threatens to further destabilize King Henry’s rule. King Henry’s mother Lady Margaret Beaufort faces the consequences of harboring a dark secret.

episodes.title: English Blood On English Soil
episodes.details: King Henry VII and Lizzie travel to Spain in an attempt to secure their son’s betrothal, but news of their country’s instability has preceded them. Meanwhile, unrest has been growing in Burgundy and spills over into an English battle.

episodes.title: Two Kings
episodes.details: A pretender to the throne is held captive at court, confounding the Tudors, and creating a new rift in Lizzie and King Henry’s marriage. Lizzie faces an impossible choice, and makes a risky move to try to eliminate the threat to her family.

episodes.title: Old Curses
episodes.details: A final confrontation with the pretender exposes King Henry’s weaknesses, while Lizzie confronts new demons and old curses.

series.title: The White Princess
series.details: “The White Princess" charts one of the most tumultuous times in British history uniquely from the viewpoint of the women waging the battle for power.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.details: It has been two years since a stolen Mercedes Sedan intentionally drove into a large crowd of people, killing 16 and injuring dozens more. Bill Hodges could never let go of the case or the killer who was never caught.

episodes.title: On Your Mark
episodes.details: Hodges begins a game of cat-and-mouse with the Mercedes killer, roping in Jerome and Janey to assist him; meanwhile, Brady experiences some hardships at work.

episodes.title: Cloudy, With A Chance Of Mayhem
episodes.details: Hodges and Janey dig deeper into the circumstances surrounding Olivia's death. Hodges uses Debbie's Blue Umbrella to turns the tables on Brady. Jerome's father intervenes in his relationship with Hodges.

episodes.title: Gods Who Fall
episodes.details: Ida is hurt as Hodges and Janey's relationship intensifies. Lou is disturbed by an interaction with a customer. Deborah takes Brady to the cemetery and the two reflect on their difficult past.

episodes.title: The Suicide Hour
episodes.details: The cat and mouse game between Hodges and Brady escalates. Hodges has an upsetting conversation with Janey's mother. Deborah's drinking almost causes an accident at the Hartsfield home.

episodes.title: People In The Rain
episodes.details: Hodges struggles with the past as it concerns his daughter, Allie. As Deb attempts to make a change for the better, Brady interferes. Robi continues pressuring Brady to impress their bosses. Hodges connects with Janey's cousin, Holly.

episodes.title: Willow Lake
episodes.details: As Hodges helps Janey through a difficult time, their connection deepens. Realizing he still needs their help, Hodges brings Jerome and Holly back into the investigation. Deborah confronts Brady with her concerns.

episodes.title: From The Ashes
episodes.details: A critical error puts Brady in the center of a crisis of his own making. Holly and Jerome make a pivotal discovery. After a tragedy sends Hodges reeling, he goes to visit his daughter, Allie.

episodes.title: Ice Cream, You Scream, We All Scream
episodes.details: Jerome and Holly tell Hodges their concerns about the Mercedes Killer. Tensions continue to escalate between Brady and Robi. As details about the investigation emerge, Hodges, Pete, and Izzy close in on their suspect.

episodes.title: Jibber-jibber Chicken Dinner
episodes.details: When another murder victim is discovered, suspicions about Brady are confirmed. As the police prepare for another massacre, Hodges fears for the safety of those he loves.

episodes.title: Missed You
episodes.details: With Brady hospitalized, Hodges and Holly rebuild, opening the private investigative agency Finders Keepers; Brady's care falls to Dr. Babineau, an ambitious neurosurgeon, with input from his brilliant wife, Cora.

episodes.title: Let's Go Roaming
episodes.details: Hodges struggles with his cases at Finders Keepers, putting him at odds with a concerned Holly; Sadie senses a shift in Brady's medical state and informs Dr. Babineau; Jerome arrives home from Harvard for the summer.

episodes.title: You Can Go Home Now
episodes.details: Brady welcomes a visitor from his past. Sensing Holly's growing frustration, Hodges includes her in his unofficial investigation. Cora continues to apply pressure to Babineau.

episodes.title: Motherboard
episodes.details: Hodges is rattled by the unexpected death of a hospital staff member. Jerome offers much needed help in Hodges's quest to uncover the truth. Brady works to master the limitations of his newfound ability. Already struggling to cope, Lou suffers additional setbacks.

episodes.title: Ándale
episodes.details: Eager to prosecute Brady, Montez turns up the heat on Dr. Babineau. Holly feels betrayed when Hodges' meddling threatens the future of Finders Keepers. When violence hits close to home, Montez seeks help from Hodges.

episodes.title: Proximity
episodes.details: A visit from Lou elicits an unprecedented response from Brady, and Dr. Babineau pushes him to communicate. Holly begins to come around to Hodges' thinking about Brady. Armed with new intel, Hodges reaches out to Babineau and Cora.

episodes.title: Fell On Black Days
episodes.details: Hodges and Donna look toward a new future. Jerome contemplates his place in the world. Under pressure from Cora and Vitalta, Babineau performs brain surgery on Brady. Montez and Hodges effort to get Brady transferred out of Mercy General.

episodes.title: Nobody Puts Brady in a Crestmore
episodes.details: After Hodges suffers an attack, Ida, Holly, and Jerome rally around him, but Donna is reminded of her deepest fears. As support of Babineau's treatment methods dwindle, Babineau goes over Montez's head.

episodes.title: Walk Like a Man
episodes.details: Upon Brady's escape, people get nervous and he goes to an unpredictable place.

episodes.title: Fade to Blue
episodes.details: The community reels from recent news about Brady, and the Mercedes Killer's future lands in the hands of the few people who have survived him.

episodes.title: No Good Deed
episodes.details: The murder of iconic local author John Rothstein devastates Hodges. Lou will be tried for killing Brady Hartsfield. High schooler Peter Saubers makes an overwhelming discovery.

episodes.title: Madness
episodes.details: Hodges and Montez develop a theory about the Rothstein crime. Peter's parents grow suspicious of his behavior. Finkelstein navigates the complexities of Lou's upcoming trial. Morris teams up with Alma Lane, and together they plot to recover his spoils.

episodes.title: Love Lost
episodes.details: Holly visits Lou ahead of her psych evaluation. Jerome accesses Rothstein's records and uncovers an unexpected connection to Ida. Hodges and Montez look into the death of Stan McNair. Morris and Alma are caught in the act.

episodes.title: Trial and Terror
episodes.details: Alma and Morris zero in on a suspect. Jerome continues to make strides in the Rothstein case. Hodges shares his guilt over Lou's current situation with Ida. Lou's trial officially begins, and she has some suggestions for Finkelstein.

episodes.title: Great Balls of Fire
episodes.details: Morris can't make sense of Danielle's disappearance. Ida clocks Pete's growing appreciation for Rothstein's work. Alma approaches Marjorie Saubers. During Lou's trial, Pace calls Hodges and Montez to the stand. Holly and Finkelstein grow closer.

episodes.title: Bad to Worse
episodes.details: Alma gives Pete a scare and instructs Morris to do the same. Pete revisits the local bookstore. Hodges and Jerome fear for Holly ahead of her taking the stand. Finkelstein tells Lou that she must silence Brady. Holly and Lou deliver a powerful testimony.

episodes.title: The End of the Beginning
episodes.details: Jerome discovers a connection between Alma and Rothstein. After an attempt by Morris fails, Alma pays a visit to Second Story Books. Hodges visits the Saubers family and confirms their worst fears about Pete. Lou learns her fate.

episodes.title: Mommy Deadest
episodes.details: Holly takes on a questionable roommate. After receiving an unexpected visitor, Ida seeks advice from Hodges. Alma and Morris decide they need more leverage.

episodes.title: Crunch Time
episodes.details: Hodges and Jerome have a breakthrough in the Rothstein case. Holly gets a strange inheritance. Morris makes a frightening discovery.

episodes.title: Burning Man
episodes.details: Hodges gets an unexpected call. Pete has a plan. Morris starts to feel the heat.

series.title: Mr. Mercedes
series.details: Tells the story of a psychopathic killer who drives a stolen Mercedes into a crowd and a recently retired detective who tries to bring him down.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Pilot
episodes.details: After spending a childhood safely hidden away in a monastery, a teenage Mary Stuart arrives in France where she has been sent to secure Scotland’s strategic alliance by formalizing her arranged engagement to the French King’s dashing son, Prince Francis.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Snakes In The Garden
episodes.details: When Simon, an English envoy, tells Mary that the English are aware of her fragile engagement to Francis, Mary and Francis put on a show to protect their alliance.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Kissed
episodes.details: When England’s armies threaten Scotland’s borders, Mary asks King Henry for help, but he refuses. Tomas, the son of the King of Portugal, proposes marriage to Mary, promising her aid against England if she’ll abandon Francis and turn to Tomas instead.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Hearts And Minds
episodes.details: Mary has to decide if she is willing to lie and sentence a man to death in order to have King Henry let her out of her engagement to Prince Francis.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - A Chill In The Air
episodes.details: When Olivia, who is an ex-lover of Francis', arrives at the castle, she brings the dangers of the woods with her.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Chosen
episodes.details: An attempt to scare Mary causes Queen Catherine to take drastic measures to make sure the guilty party is caught. Francis, aware of Bash and Mary's growing attraction, turns to Olivia.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Left Behind
episodes.details: Mary and Francis are forced to rely on one another when the castle is taken hostage, and Catherine shocks everyone when she makes a surprising proposal to try to save their lives.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Fated
episodes.details: Nostradamus tells Mary of his prophecy that one among them will die soon, which causes Mary to make a decision that will forever change her relationship with Francis.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - For King And Country
episodes.details: When Mary and Bash are captured and forced to return to the castle, they discover Catherine waiting and even more determined to keep Mary and Francis apart.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - Sacrifice
episodes.details: When a plot to kill Bash goes wrong, Queen Catherine is suspected of orchestrating it. Mary offers to help free a wrongly imprisoned pregnant peasant named Isobel who has a mysterious tie to Bash.

episodes.title: Ep 111 - Inquisition
episodes.details: When King Henry accuses Queen Catherine of treason and adultery, she sets out to save her life by exposing Bash's dark past.

episodes.title: Ep 112 - Royal Blood
episodes.details: When Clarissa kidnaps the younger children of King Henry and Queen Catherine, Mary and Bash work with the Queen to find them, with tragic results.

episodes.title: Ep 113 - Consummation
episodes.details: With a forced marriage looming, Mary must consider both her heart and her nation when deciding whom she will wed – Francis or Bash – when Francis returns to court with Lola at his side.

episodes.title: Ep 114 - Dirty Laundry
episodes.details: Mary returns from her honeymoon and, suspicious of Lola’s strange behavior, uncovers a deception that changes everything. Bash encounters a confused and terrified Olivia, an escaped victim of the terrors of the woods, which causes him to enlist Nostradamus for help.

episodes.title: Ep 115 - The Darkness
episodes.details: The castle is abuzz with First Light, where the women of the castle mingle with potential suitors. Much to Mary’s dismay, Lola is reluctant to participate in the tradition.

episodes.title: Ep 116 - Monsters
episodes.details: When Francis reluctantly agrees to help Bash uncover the threat in the woods, he ends in grave danger, with only Bash to save him. Meanwhile, the King’s madness causes chaos when a servant wins “Queen for the Day,” and the King becomes obsessed with her.

episodes.title: Ep 117 - Liege Lord
episodes.details: When Mary learns of a secret clause in her marriage contract that her mother, Marie de Guise and Queen Catherine orchestrated, Mary and Francis embark on a dangerous plan to turn Scotland against her mother – and Mary gets her first taste of power as the Queen of Scots.

episodes.title: Ep 118 - No Exit
episodes.details: When Mary’s brother James arrives in France and convinces Mary to return to Scotland, Francis is suspicious and uncovers a plot that would destroy Mary, which causes a rift between them.

episodes.title: Ep 119 - Toy Soldiers
episodes.details: When Mary’s uncle, the Duke of Guise, arrives in France with devastating news about her mother, Mary and Francis realize they are torn between putting their own countries first or saving their marriage.

episodes.title: Ep 120 - Higher Ground
episodes.details: Mary enlists a mercenary to help her, which forces her to realize there are sacrifices and lives she is willing to risk to save her country. Francis embraces his role as Dauphin to lead France in a brutal battle against England, and finds a new ally in Leith.

episodes.title: Ep 121 - Long Live the King
episodes.details: Mary and Catherine form an unlikely alliance when deciding how to deal with the increasingly manic King Henry, which puts Francis in jeopardy. Bash finds a boy who lived to tell about his encounter with the Darkness, which makes Bash determined to end it for good.

episodes.title: Ep 122 - Slaughter of Innocence
episodes.details: When the King's madness and cruelty reaches a fevered pitch, Mary and Francis take action. Their choices could change the course of history, but an unforeseen terror brewing in the woods could cost them, and their friends, everything.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - The Plague
episodes.details: The new King and Queen of France, Francis and Mary are plummeted into chaos after the Black Plague ravages the land and creeps inside the castle, threatening lives and the stability of their new rule.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Drawn And Quartered
episodes.details: In the aftermath of the plague, a powerful lord discovers that Mary was responsible for the death of his son and demands vengeance, testing the loyalties of Mary, Francis and Catherine.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Coronation
episodes.details: With France in a state of famine, as well as religious and political unrest, Mary looks for a way to feed the people, risking the wrath of a vengeful Lord Narcisse. Francis is preoccupied by the harrowing suspicion that his dead father’s spirit can possess the living and is haunting Francis as revenge for his murder.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - The Lamb and the Slaughter
episodes.details: When a shepherd is attacked by shadowy riders in the night, Bash and Lord Condé investigate what may be the unrest of angry spirits or the beginnings of a religious war.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Blood For Blood
episodes.details: Tensions between Protestants and Catholics escalate when bloodshed at a Protestant service causes an already concerned Mary and Francis to intervene on the eve of Greer’s wedding.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Three Queens
episodes.details: Upon encountering a mob of angry peasants, Queens Mary and Catherine find themselves concealing their true identities after being forced to abandon their carriage and escape into the woods.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - The Prince of the Blood
episodes.details: Young, reckless and provocative Princess Claude (guest star Rose Williams) makes a surprise visit home, torturing her already haunted mother, Catherine.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Terror of the Faithful
episodes.details: Tensions escalate between Mary and Francis when Vatican inquisitors perform barbaric acts on anyone suspected of being a Protestant. After a brave proclamation, Lord Condé is abducted, resulting in a precarious situation with a surprising group of assailants.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - Acts of War
episodes.details: With a holiday celebration around the corner, Bash uncovers what could be the answer to Francis finally escaping the oppressive thumb of Lord Narcisse, and the two formulate a daring plan.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - Mercy
episodes.details: In the aftermath of an attack on the castle, a blood-thirsty Francis makes a startling decision that will forever change his rule as the King of France, causing him to track the missing Narcisse with a newfound lust for revenge.

episodes.title: Ep 211 - Getaway
episodes.details: Mary takes action to save Condé when she learns the Vatican is hunting him for bearing the branded mark of the Dark Riders. Francis devises a plan to put an end to the Dark Riders legend, which puts Bash at risk.

episodes.title: Ep 212 - Banished
episodes.details: Mary finds out the truth from Greer about rumors going around Court, forcing Mary to do something she never thought possible. Francis finds himself in a growing rivalry with Condé for Mary.

episodes.title: Ep 213 - Sins of the Past
episodes.details: As the castle prepares for the Winter’s Ease Feast, King Antoine (guest star Ben Aldridge) of Navarre reveals to Francis and Mary England's plan for revenge against France.

episodes.title: Ep 214 - The End of Mourning
episodes.details: As Mary and Francis investigate who was behind the poisoning of King Henry, they unearth secrets of the past which force Mary to confront her feelings for Condé as she attempts to move forward.

episodes.title: Ep 215 - Forbidden
episodes.details: Mary’s mother (guest star Amy Brenneman) returns to advise Mary that her throne is in jeopardy. Mary makes a shocking proposition to Condé (Sean Teale), along with a bold move to reclaim her throne.

episodes.title: Ep 216 - Tasting Revenge
episodes.details: When King Antoine (guest star Ben Aldridge) threatens to tell Francis of Mary and Condé’s evolving relationship, Francis makes a shocking move.

episodes.title: Ep 217 - Tempting Fate
episodes.details: When Catherine becomes suspicious that Mary and Condé are having an affair, Mary risks Catherine discovering just how deep her betrayal goes. Francis becomes gravely ill after he collapses and Bash’s life is in jeopardy when he leaves to work as the King’s Deputy.

episodes.title: Ep 218 - Reversal of Fortune
episodes.details: While Francis’ life hangs in the balance, Mary becomes the temporary leader of France, which makes her realize she can use her newfound power to save Scotland. Catherine, knowing about Mary’s indiscretion with Condé, enlists in Narcisse to help beat Mary at her own game.

episodes.title: Ep 219 - Abandoned
episodes.details: Mary, with the threat of England looming, aligns herself with France and thus, the ailing Francis. Condé makes a bold move that would tie him to England. With all of the turmoil, Catherine and Narcisse work to win favor in court.

episodes.title: Ep 220 - Fugitive
episodes.details: Mary goes to extremes to halt Francis from his quest to catch Condé at any cost. Catherine, jealous of Narcisse’s relationship with Lola, asks him to do something unforgiveable to prove himself.

episodes.title: Ep 221 - The Siege
episodes.details: As troops are about to descend on the castle, Mary and Francis must put aside their differences to determine the extent of Condé’s betrayal. Mary also learns of a bittersweet revelation that tears her apart and makes her question everything.

episodes.title: Ep 301 - Three Queens, Two Tigers
episodes.details: Queen Mary struggles to hold on to her power in Scotland amidst Queen Elizabeth's campaign to sabotage her. with the help of a new ally in Queen Catherine .

episodes.title: Ep 302 - Betrothed
episodes.details: Elizabeth must deal with the political backlash of harboring Catherine in England, while Catherine is imprisoned upon her return to France. Mary is forced to make some difficult decisions about securing Scotland's future.

episodes.title: Ep 303 - Extreme Measures
episodes.details: When King Antoine unexpectedly returns to Court, Mary must help Francis hide his weakening condition long enough to secure his family's future.

episodes.title: Ep 304 - The Price
episodes.details: After Mary receives an urgent message from her ailing mother about the dire situation in Scotland, she finds herself looking to Francis for aid.

episodes.title: Ep 305 - In a Clearing
episodes.details: Grateful for a future with a revived Francis, Mary considers signing away her claim to the English throne, and staying in France forever.

episodes.title: Ep 306 - Fight or Flight
episodes.details: Mary realizes she must help Catherine in her quest to become regent, even at the risk of hurting the alliance with Scotland. Claude is determined to help Leith marry while Elizabeth struggles with the prospect of losing Dudley.

episodes.title: Ep 307 - The Hound and the Hare
episodes.details: When Prince Don Carlos of Spain visits France, Mary uncovers a dark secret he is hiding and enlists in Catherine to advise her on how to handle.

episodes.title: Ep 308 - Our Undoing
episodes.details: As Mary and Catherine deal with the aftermath of Prince Don Carlos' accident, Mary realizes that she will have to marry for the good of her country and not follow her heart.

episodes.title: Ep 309 - Wedlock
episodes.details: Mary becomes suspicious of Prince Don Carlos' true condition and relies on Gideon to help her uncover the truth. Elizabeth makes a shocking discovery which could change the course of her reign over England.

episodes.title: Ep 310 - Bruises That Lie
episodes.details: Mary struggles to resist her feelings for Gideon as she works to align herself politically with potential allies. Elizabeth and Greer find themselves in similar heart-wrenching situations with the potential for very different outcomes.

episodes.title: Ep 311 - Succession
episodes.details: Mary must find a powerful suitor to align herself with as Charles' impending Coronation looms. Lola stumbles upon the identity of Elizabeth's poisoner, while Catherine becomes a new kind of victim for the castle's serial killer.

episodes.title: Ep 312 - No Way Out
episodes.details: Mary might have to sacrifice her cousin's life to save her own, as she and Gideon find themselves in unchartered emotional territory. Catherine's past returns to haunt her, while Lola and Elizabeth become unlikely allies.

episodes.title: Ep 313 - Strange Bedfellows
episodes.details: Mary, in order to protect Elizabeth, unknowingly puts Gideon's life in danger. To save him, Mary turns to another Englishman for help- Robert Dudley. Meanwhile, Bash is determined to track down the men behind the threats to Catherine .

episodes.title: Ep 314 - To The Death
episodes.details: Mary realizes her need to return to Scotland is becoming increasingly imminent and that along with the help of Bash, she must raise her own army to save her throne.

episodes.title: Ep 315 - Safe Passage
episodes.details: Mary learns from Lola that she has a chance to get to Scotland safely, but she must act quietly and quickly. When Catherine is framed for murder, Mary must decide if she should stay to protect her, which would jeopardize her safe passage to Scotland.

episodes.title: Ep 316 - Clans
episodes.details: When Mary arrives in Scotland, she is stunned by the treacherous world it has become and is forced her to keep her royal identity a secret until she learns who she can trust.

episodes.title: Ep 317 - Intruders
episodes.details: With Mary presumed dead, Elizabeth enlists Lola's help in taking the Scottish crown for herself, while Mary’s half-brother James ) must defend her throne from John Knox.

episodes.title: Ep 318 - Spiders in a Jar
episodes.details: Mary makes a bold move to defend her reign in Scotland, which results in a battle royale with her cousin, Elizabeth. Lola is accused of a heinous crime and suffers the drastic consequences.

episodes.title: Ep 401 - With Friends Like These
episodes.details: Queen Mary, unsure who to trust, tests her brother James to ensure his loyalty after hearing of his meeting with John Knox. Queen Elizabeth agrees to help Lord Darnley, in an attempt to sabotage the powerful suitor’s relationship with Mary.

episodes.title: Ep 402 - A Grain of Deception
episodes.details: Queen Mary discovers there is a leak amongst her advisors and sets out to uncover the traitor. Queen Elizabethenlists in Narcisse to further her quest for supremacy. Meanwhile, Catherine takes desperate measures to regain some of the power she has lost.

episodes.title: Ep 403 - Leaps of Faith
episodes.details: Gideon shows Mary what life could be like if she chose love over country. Catherine fights to cover King Charles' increasingly erratic behavior, while Claude finds an unlikely enemy in her sister Leeza (guest star Anastasia Phillips).

episodes.title: Ep 404 - Playing With Fire
episodes.details: When Lord Darnley surprises Mary with a visit in Scotland, Mary sees a glimmer of a union that could be more than just political. Elizabeth fights to gain allies in her favor and Catherine must work to get Claude back on track by finding her a new husband.

episodes.title: Ep 405 - Highland Games
episodes.details: In order to get Mary to agree to a marriage, Lord Darnley must demonstrate his loyalty when she voices her concerns about his true intentions. Catherine and Narcisse work to repair King Charles' reputation after rumors spread about his strange behavior and threaten the throne.

episodes.title: Ep 406 - Love and Death
episodes.details: Mary must deal with the political repercussions of a potential marriage to Lord Darnley and King Charles disappears, leaving Catherine to pick up the pieces. Elizabeth comes to Gideon’s aid, while Claude receives an interesting proposition.

episodes.title: Ep 407 - Hanging Swords
episodes.details: When Darnley gets a surprise visitor, his marriage to Mary hangs in the balance. Elizabeth learns her attempt to stop Mary backfired. Meanwhile, Catherine and Narcisse find King Charles and must convince him to return to the castle.

episodes.title: Ep 408 - Uncharted Waters
episodes.details: As Mary’s (Adelaide Kane) upcoming wedding looms, a terrible tragedy pushes Mary and Darnley (Will Kemp) apart, forcing Mary to enlist in Catherine’s (Megan Follows) help. Elizabeth (Rachel Skarsten) encounters a traitor to Spain, who petitions her to support an expedition to the New World.

episodes.title: Ep 409 - Pulling Strings
episodes.details: Mary (Adelaide Kane) and Darnley (Will Kemp) wed in a lavish affair, which proves to be a successful decision in regards to her political standing. James (Dan Jeannotte) makes an interesting discovery about Greer (Celina Sinden), while Elizabeth (Rachel Skarsten) frantically tries to salvage England’s power.

episodes.title: Ep 410 - A Better Man
episodes.details: As Mary (Adelaide Kane) strategizes ways to take over the English throne, Elizabeth (Rachel Skarsten) struggles to find an appropriate suitor to marry. Meanwhile, James (Dan Jeannotte) gets caught up in a scheme orchestrated by John Knox (Jonathan Goad) and has to deal with the tragic aftermath.

episodes.title: Ep 411 - Dead of Night
episodes.details: Mary and Darnley are at odds as they put their plan to seize England into action. Elizabeth is conflicted about her feelings for Gideon as she attempts to find a Catholic to marry.

episodes.title: Ep 412 - The Shakedown
episodes.details: After a tragic earthquake hits Scotland, Mary (Adelaide Kane) must face John Knox (Jonathan Goad) amidst claims that she isn’t coming to the aid of her people. Elizabeth (Rachel Skarsten) takes drastic measures after she is discovered with Gideon (Ben Geurens), while Charles (Spencer MacPherson) makes a decision that backfires.

episodes.title: Ep 413 - Coup de Grace
episodes.details: Darnley (Will Kemp) teams up with John Knox (Jonathan Goad) to strip Mary (Adelaide Kane) of her throne, which will leave a close friend of Mary’s dead. Elizabeth (Rachel Skarsten) must banish Gideon (Ben Geurens) from court at the request of her future husband (guest star Steve Byers), while Charles (Spencer MacPherson) takes a bold stance against his brother Henri (guest star Nick Slater).

episodes.title: Ep 414 - A Bride. A Box. A Body.
episodes.details: Mary (Adelaide Kane) pursues her quest for justice as she launches a counter attack on her conspirators. Elizabeth (Rachel Skarsten) suffers a major setback that turns her world upside down.

episodes.title: Ep 415 - Blood in the Water
episodes.details: Childbirth threatens to take Mary’s (Adelaide Kane) life, which leaves her and her unborn child’s safety in jeopardy. Elizabeth (Rachel Skarsten) discovers that someone in her inner circle was the cause of the death of someone close to her.

episodes.title: Ep 416 - All it Cost Her...
episodes.details: Mary makes a decision that will change the course of history -- forever shaping the fate of her nation, her crown, and her newborn son.

series.title: Reign
series.details: Hidden between the lines of the history books is the story of Mary Stuart, the young woman the world would come to know as Mary, Queen of Scots. The teenage Mary is already a headstrong monarch - beautiful, passionate and poised at the very beginning of her tumultuous rise to power.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 1
episodes.details: Heiress Lucy Savage arrives in Tangier, 1955 - one of the last outposts of colonial decadence, and a culture shock in more ways than one.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 2
episodes.details: Lucy gets herself an invitation to an exclusive wrap party, which she attends with Adham. Later, she is invited to lunch with the secretary without her husband.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 3
episodes.details: Hugo struggles with unfinished business that Lucy's father asked him to take care of, Adham finds his royal bearing is of little help in the interzone.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 4
episodes.details: After her discovery about Hugo and Adham, Lucy decamps to the home of the Contessa Mandrax, where she is consoled by Lili. Cherifa returns to Tangier.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 5
episodes.details: Lucy meets Bill, who claims to be an artist but is actually an undercover agent for the CIA. Meanwhile, Cherifa fails into the secretary's trap.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 6
episodes.details: Lucy decides to collaborate with the CIA in entrapping her father and is forced to work with Cherifa in order to free herself.

series.title: Little Birds
series.details: TV adaptation of Anais Nin's infamous collection of erotic short stories.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - I
episodes.details: The once powerful Captain Flint faces mutiny by his own pirate crew. John Silver joins Flint, hiding something of great value. On New Providence, Eleanor Guthrie keeps order in the face of a resurgent Royal Navy.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - II
episodes.details: Flint unmasks a thief on his crew. Rackham chases a score over Vane's objection. Silver hides with Max in the brothel. Eleanor faces an impossible choice.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - III
episodes.details: Flint and Gates seek a partner to hunt the Urca d'Lima. Silver helps Billy with a morale problem. Vane impresses Eleanor by being reasonable. Gates gets a promotion.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - IV
episodes.details: An undertaking by the Walrus crew ends in disaster. Silver warns Flint about Billy. Rackham and Bonny try to regain their livelihood. Eleanor needs help from her father. A figure from Vane's past pays a visit.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - V
episodes.details: Flint and the Walrus crew play a deadly chess match on the open sea. Richard forces Eleanor's hand. Rackham makes a career change. Bonny confesses to Max.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - VI
episodes.details: The costs of chasing the Andromache continue to mount. Eleanor needs Silver's help. Billy wants Gates to confront Flint. Bonny takes a stand.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - VII
episodes.details: Flint tells Gates the truth. Randall puts Silver in a bind. Eleanor suffers a loss. Max comes to Rackham's aid. Vane enters the fight of his life.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - VIII
episodes.details: The hunt for the Urca is on. Everything changes for Eleanor. Bonny and Rackham's sins come back to haunt them.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - IX
episodes.details: Flint and Silver face judgement before the crew. Vane enjoys his new position on the island. Max confronts Bonny. Eleanor faces a new threat.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - X
episodes.details: Flint gives Dufresne some advice. Silver must make himself indispensable. Eleanor is asked to depose a captain. Rackham gets ambitious.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - XI
episodes.details: Flint faces a dilemma upon his return to Nassau. Eleanor needs help from an unlikely source. Rackham seeks to repair his reputation. Vane uncovers an unexpected prize.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - XII
episodes.details: Flint threatens Vane. Eleanor chooses a side. Rackham learns what Max is capable of. Silver reunites with an old friend.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - XIII
episodes.details: Miranda embarks on a journey to save the island. Eleanor opens old wounds. Rackham sniffs around a big secret. Vane must take matters into his own hands.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - XIV
episodes.details: Eleanor brokers a peace. Rackham learns the hard way. Flint breaks a promise. Bonny loses control.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - XV
episodes.details: Max cleans up after a massacre. News from the outside world changes everything for Flint and Silver. Eleanor risks her life for the sake of her future. Bonny faces a crossroads. Dufresne pushes Billy to act.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - XVI
episodes.details: Flint and Miranda prepare for the worst. Silver has his eyes opened. Eleanor discovers Max's secret. Vane makes his move.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - XVII
episodes.details: Flint and Miranda confront their past. Bonny declares her intents to Rackham. Vane takes a massive prize. Eleanor declares war.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - XVIII
episodes.details: An unlikely ally comes to Flint's aid. Vane's crew wants a change. Silver makes a sacrifice.

episodes.title: Ep 301 - XIX
episodes.details: Flint and his crew wage war against the world. Eleanor receives an offer of clemency. Vane objects to Rackham's methods. One of Nassau's most notorious returns.

episodes.title: Ep 302 - XX
episodes.details: The Walrus crew battles the elements. Teach and Rackham have a disagreement. Rogers and Eleanor set terms for their partnership. Bonny fears for her future with Max.

episodes.title: Ep 303 - XXI
episodes.details: Stranded at sea, Flint pushes Silver to his limit. As Nassau prepares to repel an invasion, Rackham takes the reins, while Max gets her house in order. To stave off defeat, Vane makes a difficult choice.

episodes.title: Ep 304 - XXII
episodes.details: Civilization returns to Nassau, and sets its sights on Vane. Flint, Silver and Billy encounter a new enemy. Rackham takes a stand against his crew. Scott finds his place in the new regime.

episodes.title: Ep 305 - XXIII
episodes.details: Facing certain death, Silver pushes Flint to take action. Teach shows Vane a way forward. A new threat puts Eleanor and Rogers on notice. Max makes her play.

episodes.title: Ep 306 - XXIV
episodes.details: Flint challenges Teach over the future of piracy. Rogers makes an arrest. Rackham finds new purpose. Madi comes to Silver's aid.

episodes.title: Ep 307 - XXV
episodes.details: Flint and Silver return to Nassau, and a legend is born. A change in terms put Rackham and Bonny in jeopardy. Vane's mission evolves. Eleanor confides in Rogers.

episodes.title: Ep 308 - XXVI
episodes.details: Rogers comes under attack while moving a prisoner. Violence erupts on the Walrus. Silver and Madi are put to a test. Billy sees a new role for himself in the coming battle.

episodes.title: Ep 309 - XXVII
episodes.details: Eleanor puts everything on the line to save Rogers. Billy recruits allies. Flint and Silver prepare for war.

episodes.title: Ep 310 - XXVIII
episodes.details: Rogers and his forces come for the pirates. Rackham and Bonny face impossible odds. Silver demands answers from Flint. Billy crowns a king.

episodes.title: Ep 401 - XXIX
episodes.details: The invasion of Nassau meets with catastrophe. Teach and Rackham seek revenge for the death of Charles Vane. Eleanor adjusts to her new role.

episodes.title: Ep 402 - XXX
episodes.details: Flint accedes to Billy's authority. Eleanor has a plan for Rogers. Silver seeks help from an unlikely source. Max is put on notice.

episodes.title: Ep 403 - XXXI
episodes.details: Max runs afoul of the law. Rogers reckons with his past. Flint and Madi reach an understanding. Long John Silver makes his return.

episodes.title: Ep 404 - XXXII
episodes.details: Violence engulfs Nassau. Silver demands answers from Billy. Eleanor comes to Max's aid. Bonny and Rackham endure hell.

episodes.title: Ep 405 - XXXIII
episodes.details: Silver takes Flint's life in his hands. Billy drives a wedge. Eleanor risks everything. Rogers makes a stunning appeal.

episodes.title: Ep 406 - XXXIV
episodes.details: Nassau is delivered. Silver makes a painful amends. Flint and Madi are separated. Rogers searches for Eleanor.

episodes.title: Ep 407 - XXXV
episodes.details: Flint urges caution on an enraged Silver. Max leads Rackham and Bonny up river. Billy finds a survivor. Rogers learns the truth.

episodes.title: Ep 408 - XXXVI
episodes.details: A rescue plan threatens to divide Flint and Silver. Max learns the true price of freedom. Rackham seeks his prey. The Walrus enters uncharted territory.

episodes.title: Ep 409 - XXXVII
episodes.details: Silver and his men hunt for Flint on Skeleton Island. Madi is made an offer. Rogers struggles to hear Eleanor. Billy casts his lot.

episodes.title: Ep 410 - XXXVIII
episodes.details: Flint makes one last push to topple England. Silver seals his fate. Rackham confronts Rogers. Nassau is changed forever.

series.title: Black Sails
series.details: 1715. The Golden Age of Piracy. New Providence Island is a lawless territory, controlled by history's most notorious pirate captains, including the feared and brilliant Captain Flint. As the British Navy returns to redeem their land, he allies himself with Eleanor Guthrie - daughter of the local kingpin - to hunt the ultimate prize and ensure their survival.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Pilot
episodes.details: Six months after the business of their lives ended up in tragedy, the roads of Félix, Mariana and Ignacio cross again when they decide to create a company of medicinal cannabis with a seed that hides a secret within.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Green Gold
episodes.details: Kannalab is one of the few companies with a permit to grow medicinal cannabis, and after organizing an Open House to find investment, the three partners accept the offer from a mysterious young investor.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - The Sea Cures It All
episodes.details: The young entrepreneurs decide to leave the pharmaceutics behind and bet it all on New Soul Grass, a Canadian company of cannabis beverages. Lola digs deeper and finds out that behind the mysterious seed, Kannalab hides a secret.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - The Genetic From The Past
episodes.details: After a disastrous encounter with the owner of New Soul Grass, Ignacio finds a way to convince her to close a millionaire deal with Kannalab. Felix, desperate to pay his mom’s chemotherapy treatment, decides to steal cannabis to sell it in the illegal market.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - An Expected Visit
episodes.details: After discovering that Assaf’s body has been found in Tayrona, Felix faces his guilt and Lola is every step dangerously closer to the truth.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Everything Will Be All Right
episodes.details: Someone has stolen a cannabis mother plant, but in the search for the thief, they realize it’s all been a sabotage to destroy the crop. Meanwhile, Ignacio gets closer to Lola to decipher how deep she has gotten with her investigation.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - The First Year - Part 1
episodes.details: Mariana’s home crumbles when her husband finds out she has been keeping secrets from him. Unable to live with the guilt, Felix decides to turn himself in to the police as the only responsable for the murder of Assaf.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - The First Year - Part 2
episodes.details: During Mariana’s birthday celebration, both partners discover she has been keeping hidden some information of what truly happened that mysterious night in Tayrona.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - A Turning Page
episodes.details: The moment Kannalab becomes the first company to legally export cannabis, Mariana discovers that her dad was behind the sabotage to their crops. Meanwhile, Lola finds out that Assaf’s death still hides a mysterious secret.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - The Idiots
episodes.details: When Felix, Mariana and Ignacio are disputing about their personal interests, the three partners receive a millionaire offer to become New Soul Grass’ main cannabis supplier. The decision to close the deal or go on as an independent company comes at a time when Lola has unmasked what really happened that night in Tayrona.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - MalaYerba Official Trailer
episodes.details: Get ready for MalaYerba. Series Premiere October 31

series.title: MalaYerba
series.details: Medical cannabis is legalized in Colombia and three young entrepreneurs quickly make their way into the coveted market.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.details: Margaret Schlegel receives a letter from her sister Helen, who is visiting the Wilcox family at Howards End. A misunderstanding sets in motion events which intertwine the lives of the Schlegels, the Wilcoxes and the Basts.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.details: After the death of Mrs. Wilcox, her family is thrown by her final request Howards End. When Leonard Bast's wife Jacky appears on their doorstep, the Schlegel sisters take up the cause of her husband.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.details: Refusing to punish Henry for his past transgressions, Margaret resolves to uphold their engagement. Helen unexpectedly leaves for Europe. The Schlegels, the Wilcoxes and Leonard Bast have a final encounter.

series.title: Howards End
series.details: The Schlegel sisters are two independent and unconventional sisters seeking love and meaning as they navigate an ever-changing world.

episodes.title: Chapter 1
episodes.details: After waking up surrounded by dead bodies and no memory, Myfanwy Thomas is thrown into the world of the Checquy - a paranormal secret service where she’s a high-level operative known as a “Rook” - and no one can be trusted.

episodes.title: Chapter 2
episodes.details: While Myfanwy revisits the crime scene in search of her past, Monica discovers a dark truth about one of the victims - her lover and fellow agent. One of Myfanwy’s dead attackers disappears from the morgue.

episodes.title: Chapter 3
episodes.details: Myfanwy discovers a disturbing clue to her past, Farrier searches for a scapegoat for the bankside murders, and Monica goes undercover to attend an EVA auction.

episodes.title: Chapter 4
episodes.details: While Myfanwy uncovers a twisted relationship with her psychiatrist, Monica and Gestalt scour London for a missing EVA who escaped after auction. Farrier makes a connection with a mysterious prisoner with whom she’d made a deal.

episodes.title: Chapter 5
episodes.details: Myfanwy and Monica work to extricate a young EVA, while Gestalt’s suspicions of Myfanwy lead to a confrontation. Farrier is suspended, only to seek powerful revenge.

episodes.title: Chapter 6
episodes.details: While Myfanwy returns to her childhood home, Farrier faces consequences at the Checquy and Monica copes with the discovery that she was betrayed by Marcus.

episodes.title: Prologue
episodes.details: After a terrifying prophecy, Myfanwy’s desperation leads her to place her trust in a powerful enemy. But when her plans go awry, she is forced to run for life while her memory slips away.

episodes.title: Chapter 8
episodes.details: Myfanwy and Farrier quickly discover how dangerous life is outside of the Checquy, while Grantchester runs out of options. Myfanwy chooses between her freedom and Farrier’s life.

series.title: The Rook
series.details: When a woman wakes up surrounded by dead bodies with her memory erased, she must uncover her mysterious past to learn the truth.

episodes.title: Chapter One, Soldiers
episodes.details: Former Army Lt. Clint Lorance is serving a 19-year sentence for murder in the U.S. Army’s most notorious prison – Leavenworth. Exploring the challenging backstory, this chapter sets the stage for the incident in Afghanistan that irrevocably changed lives.

episodes.title: Chapter Two, Casualties
episodes.details: Lorance took command of the platoon in July 2012 and ordered fire on three local Afghans. Lorance, members of his platoon, and relatives of the victims give varied and conflicting accounts. Lorance’s new attorney seeks to overturn the conviction.

episodes.title: Chapter Three, Judgment
episodes.details: Lorance’s attorney revisits the court martial trial through an emotional meeting with the Lorance family. As he digs into overturning the conviction, he uncovers previously undisclosed evidence that could change the course of the case.

episodes.title: Chapter Four, Perspectives
episodes.details: Options begin to wane for Lorance, and his team seeks political support through conservative media. The platoon takes issue with how the case is covered, and a passionate debate ensues over the role that media is playing in its outcome.

episodes.title: Chapter Five, The Fight Continues
episodes.details: With no more options in the appellate process, Lorance’s team takes the case to civilian court. With a parole hearing and the possibility of a presidential pardon, there is hope, but his opponents dread the possibility of his release.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Leavenworth Series Update
episodes.details: Get an update on the status of Clint's case.

series.title: Leavenworth
series.details: “Leavenworth” is based on the controversial true story of Clint Lorance, a former lieutenant serving a 19-year sentence for murder at the United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 1
episodes.details: Avshalom and his family relocate to Paris. The dream soon turns into a nightmare.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 2
episodes.details: In the aftermath of the terrorist attack, Avshalom is scared to face the streets. Annabelle encourages him to adjust to their new lives, but discovers herself that’s easier said than done.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 3
episodes.details: Annabelle faces challenges in her new job at the embassy. Avshalom is unable to get back into writing and struggles to help Uri with a writing assignment for preschool.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 4
episodes.details: Annabelle is job-hunting for Avshalom. When his dad comes for a visit, he obsessively searches for a spare part for a blender while teaching Avshalom an important lesson about shame.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 5
episodes.details: Annabelle tries to persuade Avshalom to wear a suit for an upcoming event at the embassy. After getting in trouble with her boss, she meets a stranger at a bar.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 6
episodes.details: Annabelle invites an important author for a Shabbat dinner, during which suspicions are raised, secrets are revealed, and racism and hypocrisy arise.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Episode 7
episodes.details: Annabelle is offered an extension of her contract. She takes a pregnancy test which she hides from Avshalom, who hides a shameful incident of his own.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Episode 8
episodes.details: Avshalom celebrates Annabelle’s birthday by bringing the Israeli beach to Paris. Uri’s grandparents take him to a cabin in the forest, a trip that soon becomes less than idyllic.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Episode 9
episodes.details: Annabelle sets an ultimatum regarding her contract extension, making Avshalom choose whether they will remain in Paris, but he struggles with the decision.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - Episode 10
episodes.details: Avshalom returns from a visit in Israel and doesn’t know how to tell Annabelle he wants to go back there for good. Annabelle meets a friend from the past who gets her in trouble.

series.title: The Attaché
series.details: Avshalom, a successful musician, relocates to Paris when his wife Annabelle gets a job there. They’re greeted by terrorist attacks and the dream of a romantic year abroad turns nightmarish.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Getting Away With Murders
episodes.details: Best-selling author Jillian Lauren stumbles upon serial killer Sam Little while researching a new crime novel and quickly realizes that his decades-long murderous history may be linked to terrible systemic injustices. When she ends up face-to-face with the killer, he starts confessing to more crimes... throwing Jillian into the middle of the case.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Deal With The Devil
episodes.details: Jillian’s uneasy firstmeetings with killer Sam Little evolve into a bizarre deal with the devil. Jillian learns that to get inside the mind of the killer she has to delve into her own traumatic past, and in the process uncovers how systemic sexism and racial bias enabled Little to prey on marginalized women for years.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Behold The Monster
episodes.details: Sam Little’s new confessions are matched with cold cases across the United States. Two female law enforcement agents describe how they caught the killer by focusing on survivors who were ignored in the past. Jillian uncovers details about Little’s troubled childhood, and the stress of dealing with the case spills into her home life.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Restoring Their Names
episodes.details: Sam Little’s body count grows to 93 women, making him the most prolific serial killer in American history, but dozens of confessions remain unmatched. Jillian begins to investigate one particular case pertaining to a victim known only as “Alice.” Answers elude her until she finds a promising clue.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - No Longer Jane Doe
episodes.details: Dealing with a psychopath takes its toll on Jillian’s psyche and family. Jurisdictions in dozens of states close cases, laying bare the havoc Little wrought and triggering a long-overdue public reckoning. Jillian digs into Little’s “Alice” confession, discovering the scene of an unsolved murder that may be connected to the decades-old case.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Confronting a Serial Killer Official Trailer 1001
episodes.details: The astonishing story of the unprecedented relationship between acclaimed author and journalist Jillian Lauren and the most prolific serial killer in American history, Sam Little.

series.title: Confronting a Serial Killer
series.details: The astonishing story of the unprecedented relationship between acclaimed author and journalist Jillian Lauren and the most prolific serial killer in American history, Sam Little.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - BACK IN THE DAY
episodes.details: It's 1991 in South Jamaica, Queens, and 15-year-old Kanan Stark is eager to join his family’s growing drug business, led by his mother, Raquel "Raq" Thomas.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - REAPING AND SOWING
episodes.details: After a rival crewmember is killed, Raq does whatever is necessary to get the target off Kanan’s back.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - STICK AND MOVE
episodes.details: Still reeling from a shocking death, Kanan pushes his way into the drug game with Marvin’s help while Raq plots to take down her competition.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - DON'T SLEEP
episodes.details: All bets are off when a police raid clears out Raq’s competition. Promises are broken, secrets are revealed, and revenge is swift.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - CHOOSE YOUR BATTLES
episodes.details: Eager to transform and re-imagine her business after the stash house is hit, Raq overhauls her operation. Meanwhile, Kanan is detained after a fight with Scrappy, raising some serious questions for Detective Howard.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - LEVEL UP
episodes.details: Lou’s new artist showcase becomes the nexus of the rivalry between Raq and Unique. At the same time, Kanan cooks up a drug-selling scheme with Marvin.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - STAY IN YOUR LANE
episodes.details: Kanan and Marvin’s side hustle goes awry. Raq seeks revenge for the attack on Scrappy. Jukebox suffers a devastating blow.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - THE COST OF BUSINESS
episodes.details: Kanan struggles with a harsh truth after word gets back to Raq that he’s behind the bad crack on the streets.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - LOYAL TO THE END
episodes.details: As Marvin seeks revenge, Raq turns to Kanan for assistance only he can provide.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - PAID IN FULL
episodes.details: As the situation in the neighborhood turns dire, Raq scrambles to get Kanan out of harm’s way.

series.title: Power Book III: Raising Kanan
series.details: Set in South Jamaica, Queens, in 1991, “Raising Kanan” is a prequel to the original “Power” franchise. This family drama revolves around the coming of age of Kanan Stark, a cocaine distributor with an emerging network of dealers across NYC.

episodes.title: Evaristo Salas: The Letter
episodes.details: At just 16-years old, Evaristo Junior Salas was sent to prison for three decades for a crime he says he did not commit. A team comes together to investigate whether Salas was brought to justice or railroaded by the system.

episodes.title: Evaristo Salas: The Informant
episodes.details: Investigators Ira Todd and Joe Kennedy meet with the lead detective on the Salas case. He claims an informant implicated Evaristo, but when the informant comes forward, the team is shocked by what they learn.

episodes.title: Curtis Flowers: Trial and Error
episodes.details: On July 16, 1996, Bertha Tardy and three of her employees were murdered. Curtis Flowers was arrested and went on to be tried six times over 21 years; he faces a possible seventh trial, while maintaining his innocence.

episodes.title: Curtis Flowers: Death Again
episodes.details: Curtis Flowers is convicted of a quadruple murder. After 21 years of prosecutions, six trials, and questionable tactics by the State of Mississippi, is it possible to determine Flowers' guilt or innocence?

episodes.title: Christopher Tapp: The Confession
episodes.details: Wrong Man's team of experts and local Idaho investigator examine Christopher Tapp's claim that he was coerced into falsely confessing to the brutal murder of Angie Dodge on June 13th, 1996 in Idaho Falls.

episodes.title: Christopher Tapp: Flawed Freedom
episodes.details: Our investigation team looks for a killer on the loose, hoping to exonerate the man who is in prison for the crime. Then, after two decades, a surprise offer by the prosecution comes Christopher Tapp's way.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Season 1 Updates
episodes.details: In Season 1 of Wrong Man, the team of legal and investigative experts re-examined the evidence in three cases of possible wrongful conviction, and yielded incredible results. Get updated on the progress.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Vonda Smith: The Case Against Grandma
episodes.details: When 21-year old Jessie Morrison is brutally beaten to death, police zero in on Vonda Smith. The “Wrong Man” team explores whether Vonda may have been wrongfully convicted.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Patricia Rorrer: The Hang Up
episodes.details: Andy Katrinak comes home to find his wife and infant son gone, he tells police he believes they have been abducted, and he suspects his ex-girlfriend Patty Rorrer might be involved.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Patricia Rorrer: Under the Microscope
episodes.details: Patty Rorrer is convicted of the kidnapping and murder of her ex-boyfriend’s wife and infant son, but “Wrong Man” investigators discover that the case is not so clear cut.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Clair Hour 1: Black or White
episodes.details: Kenneth Clair, a homeless black man, is convicted and sentenced to death for the brutal murder of a babysitter in 1984. But a child eyewitness told police that he had seen a white man kill her.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Clair Hour 2: Wire Tapped
episodes.details: The “Wrong Man” team calls on experts to take a fresh look at the evidence that led to Kenneth Clair’s conviction in the brutal murder of Linda Rodgers.

series.title: Wrong Man
series.details: In "Wrong Man," a series by award-winning filmmaker Joe Berlinger, a team of esteemed experts re-investigate the cases of three inmates who have been locked up for decades and claim they're innocent.

episodes.title: What's the Big Deal About Oak Park?
episodes.details: The school year begins at OPRF for Grant, Tiara, Charles, Terrence and Ke'Shawn. Controversy over a Black Lives Matter assembly still reverberates as the school confronts years of racial inequities.

episodes.title: Stranger in a Room
episodes.details: Teacher Jess Stovall intervenes in Ke'Shawn's academic struggles. His mother shares her own troubled history at OPRF. Senior Kendale and junior Chanti grapple with identity. Homecoming Dance is very special for Grant.

episodes.title: There is No Pain That Compares to the Struggle
episodes.details: Kendale wrestles to become a starter, while Chanti wrestles with emotional trauma. Jess takes on the principal, and senior Jada takes on a teacher. OPRF's football team has a big game and a score to settle.

episodes.title: There's Nothing Funny About Race!
episodes.details: Jada's conflict with a teacher grows more intense. Ke'Shawn's run-in threatens his grade. Grant pursues love. Terrence loves Halloween much more than school. Charles and Chanti audition for the poetry slam team.

episodes.title: I Don't Have to Think About Being White
episodes.details: White students Caroline and Brendan join the story. Jada's film draws mixed reviews. Terrence's grade hangs in the balance. Christmas lights up Kendale's home, while Ke'Shaen's family may lose theirs.

episodes.title: Listen to the Poem!
episodes.details: Jada clashes with junior Diane over her new film. Brendan recalls a racially charged basketball past. Tiara and the cheerleading squad go for the gold. Charles' poetry slam team faces an epic challenge.

episodes.title: Tsunami of Privilege
episodes.details: Jess Stovall gives her all to engage Ke'Shawn, whose situation has turned dire. Kendale fights to advance in the playoffs, while star teammate Gabe faces unexpected challenges. Terrence rebounds with his mother's help.

episodes.title: Nobody Can Hold You Down
episodes.details: Chanti discovers a devastating truth about her grandparents. Brendan's parents make him an offer he can't refuse. Caroline's anxiety exacts a heavy toll. Kendale and his team pursue their dream for the ultimate victory.

episodes.title: The Invisible T-Shirt
episodes.details: Kendale goes on a college visit, while Terrence goes to court. Tiara and her mother fall out over grades. Jess pushes the administration to adopt her teacher support program. Prom arrives and Kendale's mother loves it.

episodes.title: America Will Be...
episodes.details: It's now or never for Tiara in chemistry. Terrence looks to the future. Caroline wrestles with perfection, while OPRF grapples with imperfect leadership. Kendale, Jada and Gabe celebrate graduation.

series.title: America To Me
series.details: Academy Award nominated filmmaker Steve James (Hoop Dreams, Life Itself) examines racial, economic and class issues in contemporary American education in the multipart unscripted documentary series "America to Me."

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Kayfabe
episodes.details: Jack Spade is the owner of the Duffy Wrestling League. While he controls everything that goes on inside of his wrestling ring, outside the ropes, he’s fighting to balance his family and professional life.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Dusty Finish
episodes.details: As the wrestlers at the DWL worry about the fallout from the previous show, Jack struggles with what direction to take the narrative and the league, especially after an enticing offer from the FWD’s Charlie Gully. After Ace’s humiliating breakdown in the ring, he goes into a tailspin and disappears, causing Jack and Crystal to scour Duffy before Ace does anything too regrettable.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Cheap Heat
episodes.details: In an attempt to drum up more heat, Jack enlists the help of wrestling veteran, Ricky Rabies, setting Ace up with a full house for his comeback match against Bobby Pin. While Jack tries to make amends with his brother, Ace struggles with the fact that his career as a Face might truly be over.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Cutting Promos
episodes.details: After a house fire forces Jack and his family to move in with Carol and Ace, the two brothers put their differences aside and their heads together to generate a DWL promo to further grow the league’s fan base. Wild Bill finds himself back in Duffy, managing the HR blowback from his misbehavior, and giving Ace lessons on how to embrace his inner Heel, inside and outside the ring.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Swerve
episodes.details: When the South Georgia State Fair shows interest in featuring the DWL at this year’s fair, it’s on Jack to close the deal with an electric night of matches. But chaos reigns as Bill, Ace, and Crystal each have their own ideas, none of which are in Jack’s script.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - House Show
episodes.details: It’s the day of Big Jim’s baby’s baptism and a new beginning for everyone in Duffy. Meanwhile, Jack’s running around town prepping and promoting the upcoming match at the fair, but also trying to make the time for those in his life who deserve it most.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - The Big Bad Fish Man
episodes.details: The South Georgia State Fair is only a couple of weeks away and Jack’s doing all he can to keep his professional and personal lives intact. Staci has suspicions that Jack played a role in Ace’s unexpected Heel-turn.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Double Turn
episodes.details: The culmination of all Jack’s efforts finally pays off as the DWL is featured on the biggest stage in its history, but when outside-the-ring drama enters the squared circle, there’s a lot more on the line than the championship belt.

series.title: Heels
series.details: Two brothers and rivals – one a villain, or "heel," in the ring; the other a hero, or "face" – war over their late father's wrestling promotion, vying for national attention in small-town Georgia.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 1
episodes.details: In modern, rural Ireland, Connell and Marianne, on different ends of the school’s social scene, begin an intense, secret affair.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 2
episodes.details: Marianne and Connell’s affair continues, but the pressures of the outside world start to take their toll.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 3
episodes.details: Connell betrays Marianne by making a cowardly choice. Marianne withdraws from school, causing Connell intense guilt.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 4
episodes.details: Connell finds college lonely; Marianne finds instant popularity. After running into each other they decide to try to be friends.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 5
episodes.details: Connell (Paul Mescal) and Marianne (Daisy Edgar-Jones) start socialising as friends in Dublin. She introduces Connell to her group and one of her friends, Teresa (Lauryn Canny) is interested in him. Marianne is still dating Gareth (Sebastian De Souza), but her interest in the relationship is starting to fade. Marianne eventually finishes things with Gareth and makes a drunken pass at Connell.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 6
episodes.details: Connell and Marianne are together, but when he loses his job and she has an upsetting trip home, they withdraw from each other.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Episode 7
episodes.details: Marianne and Connell are seeing other people and realise (too late) that their break-up was due to a misunderstanding.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Episode 8
episodes.details: Connell visits Marianne at her family’s summer home in Italy, where tensions between her and Jamie are at an all-time high.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Episode 9
episodes.details: Marianne, studying abroad, pursues an unhealthy relationship; in Dublin Connell enjoys an uncomplicated relationship with Helen.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - Episode 10
episodes.details: After the suicide of a schoolfriend, Connell struggles with severe depression. Marianne remains a lifeline for him from abroad.

episodes.title: Ep 111 - Episode 11
episodes.details: In Sligo, Marianne and Connell try to navigate friendship. A fight between Marianne and Alan causes a rift with her family.

episodes.title: Ep 112 - Episode 12
episodes.details: Their final year in Trinity, Marianne and Connell are fully together - but how it will endure after they graduate is uncertain.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: Sparks fly between two teenagers when a strange and indelible connection grows between the two– one they are determined to conceal from their peers. A compulsive modern love story, Normal People sees the pair weave in and out of each other’s lives over several years and explores just how complicated intimacy and young love can be.

series.title: Normal People
series.details: From school to college, Normal People follows Connell and Marianne as they weave in and out of each other’s lives in a show that explores how complicated young love can be.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 1
episodes.details: Hotel night manager Jonathan Pine receives a plea for help from a guest; he is drawn into the terrifying world of arms dealer Richard Roper.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 2
episodes.details: Roper experiences a disruption in his luxurious life on the Mediterranean island of Mallorca; six months eariler, Pine's recruitment continues as Burr sends him to Devon to build his cover story.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 3
episodes.details: While recuperating in Roper's villa, Pine starts to dig up secrets about other members of the household; Burr and Steadman recruit a new asset.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 4
episodes.details: Roper welcomes Pine into his inner circle, leaving Corky out in the cold; Burr worries for the safety of her source when she suspects key information has been leaked to the River House.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 5
episodes.details: A suspicious Roper gathers his entourage around him in an attempt to root out the traitor, forcing Pine to play a dangerous game; in London, Burr and Steadman face mounting opposition from Whitehall.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 6
episodes.details: Roper and his team return to Cairo for the deal, reuniting Pine with an old enemy. Pine risks it all to put his plan in motion. A discredited Burr makes one last stand.

series.title: The Night Manager
series.details: Former British soldier Jonathan Pine works to infiltrate the inner circle of an arms dealer.

episodes.title: This Is The Beginning of The End
episodes.details: Ulysses Zane is struggling in the dating scene until he goes on an out-of-this world date. His best friend, Carly, is striving to become an actress and works as a cam girl on the side.

episodes.title: Where Is My Mind?
episodes.details: Ulysses researches information about alien reptile conspiracies and gets ghosted by Gabriel. Ford catches his big break as a screenwriter. Carly attends acting class. Severine and Ford explore non-monogamy.

episodes.title: Rules of Attraction, The
episodes.details: Severine reconnects with her ex-lover Mustafa, who comes to town for a visit. Famous director Otto West convinces Ford to do a risqué photo shoot. Uly is haunted by Gabriel. Carly partakes in a private lesson from her acting teacher, Frank.

episodes.title: Downward Spiral, The
episodes.details: Ford is torn about his relationship with Severine and drags Ulysses with him to a men’s group, where he discovers how to be more in tune with his feelings. Carly interviews new roommates. Ulysses has an unsettling encounter with a homeless woman while on his security-guard rounds at an auto graveyard.

episodes.title: Stranger Than Paradise
episodes.details: Ford gets invited to a lavish party in Palm Springs and convinces Severine, Ulysses and Carly to come along. Ulysses has an encounter with renowned alien expert Mitchell Kent at a book signing. Carly meets artist Leif and is tempted to cheat on her boyfriend, Jethro.

episodes.title: She's Lost Control
episodes.details: It’s the hottest day of the year. Ulysses helps Carly with her new web series, “Sluts.” Ford finds out Severine’s true feelings about him. Carly and Jethro explore a new area of their relationship.

episodes.title: Anywhere Out Of The World
episodes.details: Ulysses meets social worker Isaac and falls for him fast. Severine surprises Ford by taking him to an “Eyes Wide Shut” party. Ford discovers that his photo shoot with Otto is on display for the whole world. Carly’s cam-girl adventures take an unexpected turn.

episodes.title: Unknown Pleasures
episodes.details: Carly takes Jethro to a BDSM sex dungeon. Severine wants Ford to make her sexual dreams come true. Uly and Isaac have an amazing first date. Ford feels ambivalent about his non-monogamous relationship with Severine.

episodes.title: Disappear Here
