episodes.details: Severine has to go on a business trip to Roswell for an indefinite period, and Ford is devastated. Uly’s relationship with Isaac intensifies. Carly runs into Leif, the artist she flirted with in Palm Springs. Jethro discovers the truth about Carly and her cam-girl “hobby.”

episodes.title: Everything Is Gone Forever
episodes.details: Uly and Isaac’s relationship disintegrates when Isaac learns about Gabriel. Carly fights with Jethro about her camming. Ford wants to know where he and Severine stand. Carly gets a big career break from the online popularity of her web series. Severine leaves for her business trip. Uly has a disturbing encounter with the homeless dude from his nightmares.

series.title: Now Apocalypse
series.details: “Now Apocalypse” centers on Ulysses and his friends pursuing love, sex and fame while trying to navigate LA. Ulysses dreams make him wonder if some kind of dark conspiracy is going on.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - See It... Touch It... Obtain It
episodes.details: Meech avoids a street war by moving his crew “The 50 Boyz” to a new location. He and his brother Terry cook up a more potent batch of drugs that creates enough demand to help their family overcome the economic crisis.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - RUMORS
episodes.details: Tensions rise between “The 50 Boyz” and their rivals, which creates repercussions. Lamar plants misinformation so he can actively step towards the throne.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Love All, Trust Few
episodes.details: Meech and Terry set up an undercover operation using a food truck to sell drugs to factory workers, while Detective Lopez investigates a murder at the center of the city's drug war.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - HEROES
episodes.details: Lamar's reign of terror continues, as he works overtime to shut down “The 50 Boyz” for good.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Secrets and Lies
episodes.details: Meech and Terry devise a multi-layered plan to reclaim what is rightfully theirs. Detective Lopez’s murder investigation begins to heat up when an account from an eyewitness brings some unexpected information to light.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Strictly Business
episodes.details: Meech and Terry create a new system for “The 50 Boyz” to operate more efficiently, while a secret within their ranks threatens to tear the crew apart.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - All In The Family
episodes.details: Blood spills into the streets when Meech devises a plan for revenge, forcing Lamar to seek shelter with someone close, which complicates matters even more.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - The King of Detroit
episodes.details: In an effort to expand into new territory, Meech discovers a disturbing alliance then hatches a plan to eliminate the threat. Terry is forced to make a life-altering decision.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Hero Trailer 1001
episodes.details: Get ready for BMF. Series Premiere September 26

series.title: BMF
series.details: “BMF” follows the story of two brothers who created the “Black Mafia Family,” the most prominent drug distribution network in American history.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 101
episodes.details: DCI John Luther returns to work after a spell of leave following the traumatic arrest of the serial killer Henry Madsen. Luther's first case is investigating the murder of the parents of child genius, Alice Morgan. He quickly deduces that Alice is responsible for the deaths, but the seemingly perfect crime leaves no evidence with which to convict her.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 102
episodes.details: Luther must out manoeuvre a trained sniper on a mission to kill police officers. But as the body count rises, he has to uncover the killer's true motives. Meanwhile, Alice has been investigating Luther and to his horror, seems to know what happened to Madsen during his arrest. She baits him further by asking what Zoe would think if she knew the truth.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 103
episodes.details: Kirsten Ross, a young mother, has been abducted. Luther realises that this is the work of Lucien Burgess, a collector and writer of the occult, who was suspected of the murder of another woman, Grace Allen, 10 years previously; but Burgess was never charged.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 104
episodes.details: When a serial killer goes on the rampage, Luther must put his personal life aside and delve inside the murderer's mind to discover what is driving him to kill so many girls, and why. Meanwhile, serial killer Henry Madsen, the man responsible for Luther's extended leave, has woken up from his coma. Because of Madsen, it's too dangerous for Luther to see Alice any more, but can she ever accept this?

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 105
episodes.details: When an art dealer's wife is taken hostage at gunpoint, Luther leads a tense investigation. The hostage takers want payment in diamonds so, stalling for time, Luther substitutes a bag of replacement diamonds from the Serious Crime Unit's evidence safe.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 106
episodes.details: Framed for murder, the only person DCI John Luther can turn to for help is Alice. DCI Reed remains at the heart of the police team, quietly shoring up the evidence against Luther from within.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Episode 201
episodes.details: Still plagued by the death of his ex-wife, Luther returns to work to face a surreal and nightmarish case of a masked murderer determined to enter into folklore. As the body count rises, Luther must use all his skills to stop the killer, at the same time trying to rescue an old acquaintance's daughter from the dangerous world of prostitution.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Episode 202
episodes.details: Luther must rescue Ripley, abducted by Cameron, in time to prevent Cameron's final murderous set piece. But Jenny's ruthless and vengeful boss is demanding compensation for stealing her protégé. Luther is torn. Will his visionary mind provide the team with the tools to save Ripley and the killer's intended victims, or will his focus be compromised?

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Episode 203
episodes.details: As Luther's affection for Jenny grows so does his determination to protect her and help her back on her feet. Baba, however, is determined to keep Luther on a tight leash. To add to Luther's difficulties, he is called in to investigate a man whose brutal and escalating murders seem to have no motive, leaving Jenny alone and vulnerable.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Episode 204
episodes.details: Luther's personal and professional life spirals out of control as he tries to cover up Toby's death and appease a suspicious Baba. He must also protect Jenny from any further harm. At work there's also a killer at large whose actions are ruled by his dice. How do you stop a man who sees life and death as a game and whose actions can't be predicted?

episodes.title: Ep 301 - Episode 301
episodes.details: A chance encounter means Luther might be on the verge of finding love. But nothing comes easily - not when a fetish killer is on the hunt, not when an internet tormentor has had the tables turned and not when his worst enemies are his own colleagues.

episodes.title: Ep 302 - Episode 302
episodes.details: Luther discovers the fetish killer is re-enacting the past. Can he stop him before he kills again? Meanwhile Ripley has to choose whether to turn a blind eye to Luther's unorthodox policing or betray him on record.

episodes.title: Ep 303 - Episode 303
episodes.details: Luther must confront his demons when a vigilante killer embarks on a crusade to punish past offenders. Meanwhile the campaign within the force to bring him down knows no bounds, threatening everything Luther holds dear and pushing him to his limits.

episodes.title: Ep 304 - Episode 304
episodes.details: Accused of crimes he hasn’t committed, Luther must work quickly to clear his name and stop the vigilante killer from becoming a martyr. But in becoming the killer’s target, it’s not just his own life he risks, but the lives of those he loves.

episodes.title: Ep 401 - Episode 401
episodes.details: On a leave of absence from the police force, Luther is laying low in a rundown cottage on the edge of England. But a visit from his old colleagues at the Met brings a shocking piece of news that draws him back to London in search of the truth.

episodes.title: Ep 402 - Episode 402
episodes.details: On the trail of a horrifying cannibalistic killer, Luther is dogged at every step by ghosts from his past. Isolated and on edge, it takes every fibre of Luther's being to keep it together.

episodes.title: Ep 501 - Episode 501
episodes.details: While the monstrous and seemingly indiscriminate killings become ever more audacious and public, Luther and new recruit D.S. Catherine Halliday are confounded by a complex tangle of leads and misdirection that seems designed to protect an untouchable corruption.

episodes.title: Ep 502 - Episode 502
episodes.details: The police and Cornelius converge on Luther's home. With Halliday convinced that the body in the morgue isn't their killer, can Luther put his own troubles to one side and find the true murderer before they strike again?

episodes.title: Ep 503 - Episode 503
episodes.details: With his friend in peril and a young woman kidnapped by the relentless serial killer, can Luther protect the innocent while preventing Cornelius' violent revenge from consuming him? Who is Luther willing to save, and who can't he bear to lose?

episodes.title: Ep 504 - Episode 504
episodes.details: With Luther's increasing absence from the case, Halliday leads the hunt for a monster on the loose - a killer determined to complete his final macabre masterpiece...

series.title: Luther
series.details: A dark psychological crime drama starring Idris Elba as Luther, a man struggling with his own terrible demons, who might be as dangerous as the depraved murderers he hunts.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 101
episodes.details: In war-torn France, Jean Valjean is released from prison after serving 19 years for a petty crime. The ambitious prison guard Javert is convinced he will reoffend. Life as an ex-convict is brutal, and his past continues to haunt him. Meanwhile in Paris, cheerful young seamstress Fantine meets the love of her life.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 102
episodes.details: An encounter with the wise bishop of Digne forces Jean Valjean to consider his own morality. Fantine leaves Paris with her little daughter Cosette. To find work she must make a heart-breaking decision on her way and leaves Cosette with the Thénardier family. Jean Valjean forges a new identity as manufacturer and mayor but still Javert is determined to catch him out.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 103
episodes.details: The Thénardiers demand more money for Cosette. Fantine is forced to take desperate measures to make ends meet. Manipulated by Javert, Jean Valjean is ready to give himself up to the law, but he makes a promise to Fantine that changes everything.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 104
episodes.details: Valjean has not forgotten his promise to Fantine. After he escaped from prison he finds Cosette beaten and abused at the Thénardiers’ inn. Valjean pays them money for Cosette and they make their escape towards Paris, but the obsessive Javert remains on their tail. They hide in a convent.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 105
episodes.details: Teenage Cosette begins to question her closeted life. She and Valjean leave the convent and start a new life in Paris, but Valjean worries when Cosette meets idealistic student Marius. Javert comes closer to catching his nemesis, and the Thénardiers are forced to start a new life of their own.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 106
episodes.details: Thénardier’s plot against Jean Valjean comes up against Javert. Paris is on the brink of revolt, but Javert can only think of finding the elusive Valjean. Marius leaves revolution aside as he and Cosette fall deeper in love. As the populace rises up and fighting begins, anxious Valjean makes a plan to take Cosette away to safety.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Episode 107
episodes.details: The revolutionaries fight. Javert is convinced he’ll find Valjean in the fray. Marius fears he’s lost Cosette, and so joins the battle. Conflicted over Marius’s love for Cosette, Jean Valjean seeks him out at the barricade.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Episode 108
episodes.details: Javert is in turmoil as he finally confronts Valjean. Marius is miraculously reunited with his love Cosette, and wonders who could have saved his life. Out of love for his adoptive daughter, Valjean makes a heart-breaking decision.

series.title: Les Miserables
series.details: Against the epic backdrop of France at a time of civil unrest, "Les Misérables" is the story of Jean Valjean, a former convict unable to escape the shadow of his past life

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Pilot
episodes.details: After their mothers arrest, twins Janelle and Tal are sent to live with their Uncle Al in Atlanta. Janelle learns about a performing arts school, High Water, in their new neighborhood, which may just change everything.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Solo
episodes.details: Janelle struggles at her High Water audition after she’s forced outside her comfort zone, while Tal confronts his bullies.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - The Running Man
episodes.details: Tal fights to keep up with his new classmates, Sage makes an unexpected announcement, and Davis is faced with a family issue that could derail his future.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Shuffle
episodes.details: Janelle and Dondre can’t seem to hide their true feelings, while alliances at High Water are challenged.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - …5.6.7.8
episodes.details: Sage’s troubles start trending, and Dondre discovers Janelle’s been keeping a secret from him.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Duets
episodes.details: Odalie finds out why Davis has been skipping class, King’s loyalties are torn, and Tal finally makes a move on his crush.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Dance Craze
episodes.details: Tensions flare at Dondre and Janelle’s over-the-top party, while Johnny forces Tal to face the truth about who he is.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Ensemble
episodes.details: Poppy and Janelle open up to one another, as Rigo and Dondre grapple with the events of the party.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Choreography
episodes.details: Rigo goes viral and King makes a big reveal to Poppy.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - Two-Step
episodes.details: Sage Odom’s tour auditions are underway, Uncle Al tries to save the twins, and Collette and East-O’s turbulent past comes to a head.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Precision
episodes.details: With Sage’s tour opening soon, Tal, Dondre, Poppy, and Odalie realize how hard they have to push themselves to become a professional dance squad. East-O’s death leaves Rigo with questions.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Splits
episodes.details: The budding rivalry between Tal and Zo comes to a head at Dondre’s Lit Luau. Odalie brings Davis to the suburbs to meet her parents. Rigo gets an offer from Uncle Matty that puts his relationship with Marquise in jeopardy.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Form
episodes.details: Nine and King develop plans to take Rigo’s music to the next level while Rigo’s ties to the streets continue to put a strain on his music and his relationship with Poppy. Meanwhile, Odalie and Davis hit hard times and tension between Tal and Zo grows as Sage heats things up in preparation for the tour.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Vogue
episodes.details: When the tour dancers are unable to let loose during an erotic dance routine, Sage demands that they go on a journey to find their sexy. Things start to get hot and heavy with Dondre and Poppy. Sage and Rigo go head-to-head.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Inversion
episodes.details: As Nine pushes Sage to tone down his ambitions, Collette takes him on a trip down memory lane to rediscover his artistic roots. Odalie struggles to find balance in both her love life and her dance. Zo takes Tal out for the night of his life... with unforeseen consequences.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Isolations
episodes.details: Tal learns a devastating family secret. Sage and the tour dancers build a risky new concept from the ground up. Nine helps Rigo deal with his feelings about Poppy through music, just as Poppy and Dondre confront their feelings for each other.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - Attitude
episodes.details: Odalie, with the help of Davis, attempts to work through a debilitating injury and preserve her spot on tour as Tal tries to assuage himself of his guilt and earn Odalie's forgiveness. As Rigo's star rises, he struggles to keep the peace amongst his friends and decipher who to trust. Meanwhile, Dondre finally meets the real Sage Odom.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Azonto
episodes.details: With Rigo's song about her going viral, Poppy is left with no choice but to respond. Collette takes full control of the tour while Sage is away. Davis helps Uncle Al outside of work.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - Improvisation
episodes.details: With the tour just four days away, the dancers make final preparations for their big opening night. Poppy’s mom visits High Water for the first time. Tal learns some shocking news from Zo. Rigo gets some help with his dance routine from an unlikely source. Odalie takes a last desperate step. Sage and Collette make a series of stunning final moves to assure the tour’s success.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - Hip-Hopera
episodes.details: The tour begins! Sage and the dancers take the stage on opening night in Atlanta. Dondre learns a secret that changes everything between him and Poppy. Rigo learns the truth about the death of his father. Odalie has her moment to shine. Uncle Al has a huge surprise for Davis and Justin. Sage has a dramatic proposal for Collette. A shocking return from his past astonishes Tal.

series.title: Step Up
series.details: Based on the fan favorite films, the Step Up series is a heart-pounding, sexy, music-filled drama about dancers in a contemporary performing arts school.

episodes.title: Severance
episodes.details: An anonymous phone call lures death-row attorney Henry Deaver back to his home town of Castle Rock, Maine.

episodes.title: Habeas Corpus
episodes.details: Henry gets a new client at Shawshank Prison.

episodes.title: Local Color
episodes.details: The past catches up with Molly Strand.

episodes.title: The Box
episodes.details: As Henry prepares for his day in court, a coffin arrives in Castle Rock.

episodes.title: Harvest
episodes.details: A stranger comes to town; Castle Rock honors Sheriff Pangborn.

episodes.title: Filter
episodes.details: Henry's son visits from Boston; and a funeral stirs up unsettling memories.

episodes.title: The Queen
episodes.details: Memories haunt Ruth Deaver .

episodes.title: Past Perfect
episodes.details: While newcomers set up shop in Castle Rock, Henry follows a clue.

episodes.title: Henry Deaver
episodes.details: A world beyond these walls.

episodes.title: Romans
episodes.details: Some birds can be caged in the season one finale.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Let The River Run
episodes.details: In the second season premiere, budding psychopath Annie Wilkes (series star Lizzy Caplan), Stephen King's nurse from hell, gets waylaid in Castle Rock, while a feud between warring clans comes to a boil.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - New Jerusalem
episodes.details: The Merrills – Reginald "Pop" Merrill (series star Tim Robbins), John "Ace" Merrill (series star Paul Sparks) and Chris Merrill (series star Matthew Alan) – search for answers.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Ties That Bind
episodes.details: Annie Wilkes (Lizzy Caplan) tastes her own medicine.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Restore Hope
episodes.details: Dr. Nadia Howlwadaag (series star Yusra Warsama) learns a dark truth about her past.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - The Laughing Place
episodes.details: A look back at Annie's past... in the beginning.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - The Mother
episodes.details: A familiar face arrives in Castle Rock.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - The Word
episodes.details: An Angel watches over this place.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Dirty
episodes.details: Annie sees things for what they are.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - Caveat Emptor
episodes.details: Pop confronts his old demons.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - Clean
episodes.details: Meet the opposite of Joy in the season two finale.

episodes.title: Ep 2001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: In the second season of the psychological-horror series set in the Stephen King multiverse, Castle Rock, a feud between warring clans comes to a boil, just as budding psychopath Annie Wilkes, Stephen King’s nurse from hell, gets waylaid in Castle Rock. Watch all episodes from 13 February with STARZPLAY, a Prime add-on subscription.

series.title: Castle Rock
series.details: "Castle Rock" takes viewers into the chilling world of acclaimed best-selling author Stephen King in this psychological horror series.

episodes.title: Listen
episodes.details: Mayor Tom Kane has just discovered he has a serious medical condition, but must focus on the upcoming gubernatorial primary while attempting to reconcile with his wife and estranged daughter.

episodes.title: Reflex
episodes.details: A new political force enters the race. Kane and his crew must flex their political muscles to stay on top, but some worrying news fuels Meredith's suspicions that Tom is keeping something from her.

episodes.title: Swallow
episodes.details: As Zajac's campaign gains momentum, Kane must adjust to his medical reality. Governor Cullen faces an embarrasing media storm while Miller stumbles upon a story that seeps deeper than he imagined.

episodes.title: Slip
episodes.details: Kane is losing control, politically and personally, as his supporters begin to question their confidence in him. Zajac ventures into uncharted territory while campaigning; Miller searches for answers.

episodes.title: Remembered
episodes.details: When long-buried information resurfaces, Kane and his camp battle the media to contain the situation. With the primary just around the corner, they'll pull out all the stops to keep the upper hand.

episodes.title: Spit
episodes.details: Kane takes a break from City Hall as his political image hits an all-time low. Kitty is at an emotional impasse, and Meredith, increasingly suspect of Kane's behavior, seeks opportunities of her own.

episodes.title: Stasis
episodes.details: Days before the election, Kane slowly regains control over City Hall. Though a swift political move will help reveal his adversaries, will doing the unthinkable improve his public image in time?

episodes.title: Choose
episodes.details: Election Day. The race is close, and Kane and Stone do their part to turn the gears of the political machine. Emma's world is upended while Meredith goes to great lengths to prove her loyalty to Kane.

episodes.title: Louder Than Words
episodes.details: Mayor Kane cements his legacy with a lavish groundbreaking of the modernized O'Hare terminals. While his political future seems bright, Kane continues to battle to control his disease.

episodes.title: Through And Through
episodes.details: Kane uses personal tragedy to further his agenda, poaches his nemesis's aide, Mona, and hires ambitious newcomer Ian - but will they be enough to fill the void that Stone left behind?

episodes.title: Ablution
episodes.details: Kane grows increasingly infatuated with his new aide Mona, allowing himself to get swept up in her passion for the redevelopment of a blighted housing project.

episodes.title: Redemption
episodes.details: Kane turns to a new way of doing things when he purges longtime members of his political machine. But reconnecting with his family proves more difficult when Meredith and Emma both reject him.

episodes.title: Mania
episodes.details: Kane's corruption sweep threatens his political hold over the City Council. And his mental symptoms begin to spiral out of control - Kane can no longer tell what is a hallucination and what is reality.

episodes.title: Backflash
episodes.details: Kane's moves with the housing project escalate tensions from unrest to rioting and looting. As Chicago burns, Kane secretly seeks treatment at an alternative clinic, where his past haunts him.

episodes.title: The Conversation
episodes.details: Kane's alternative treatment seems to have worked and he is back in control of his city. Now he must remedy his public perception, even if it means making an old friend collateral damage.

episodes.title: Consequence
episodes.details: Kane forms a tenuous alliance with longtime foe Alderman Ross of the City Council, but soon learns he must take even more extreme measures to stave off bankruptcy and maintain his hold over Chicago.

episodes.title: Clinch
episodes.details: Chicago faces bankruptcy and emergency managers prepare to take control. But losing his mayoral power isn't the biggest danger to Kane as enemies threaten to expose him - will he go down with his city?

episodes.title: True Enough
episodes.details: Miller publishes a story that could destroy Kane, but Kane's biggest threat is Kitty's alliance with Doyle. As Meredith forms a new relationship, Kane goes to the greatest lengths yet to stay on top.

series.title: Boss
series.details: Chicago Mayor Tom Kane knows what his city needs and isn't afraid to use any means necessary - but when a degenerative brain disorder starts ripping away his personality, he can no longer trust his memory, allies, or even himself.

episodes.title: La Maison du Bon Rêve
episodes.details: Doting mother Dee Dee Blanchard and her sweet daughter Gypsy arrive in a new town, where Gypsy feels lonely due to a barrage of medical issues and eager to make friends. But their new neighbors can be nosy, and Dee Dee and Gypsy have secrets to hide.

episodes.title: Teeth
episodes.details: Dee Dee’s on a high since Gypsy will be given the “Child of the Year Award,” which makes Dee Dee feel like Mother of the Year. But before the event, Gypsy has a dental problem that gets the attention of a skeptical doctor who could expose Dee Dee’s lies.

episodes.title: Two Wolverines
episodes.details: Dee Dee makes Gypsy dress up for a costume convention, where they each attract charming men who could dangerously complicate their insular relationship. Gypsy is starting to question the lies her mother tells her, especially about how old she really is.

episodes.title: Stay Inside
episodes.details: Gypsy’s getting older and Dee Dee is forced to new legal maneuvers to keep control of her “little girl.” But Dee Dee’s limited by her own health problems, and Gypsy goes to greater lengths than ever to connect with men and experience a sexual awakening.

episodes.title: Plan B
episodes.details: Gypsy and Nick scheme to meet in person and hope to win Dee Dee’s approval, but when their plan goes disastrously wrong, they’ll be pushed to make an extreme choice in order to be together.

episodes.title: A Whole New World
episodes.details: While Gypsy and Nick are on the run, flashbacks to a much younger Dee Dee reveal how trauma with her own mother set her up for conflict with Gypsy.

episodes.title: Bonnie & Clyde
episodes.details: Gypsy is excited to start over with Nick in Wisconsin, but their new life doesn’t match the happily ever after she imagined and her anxiety worsens as past transgressions begin to catch up with them.

episodes.title: Free
episodes.details: Gypsy fights for her life by defending her actions, while Mel & Lacey realize that behind closed doors things were not always as they seemed.

series.title: The Act
series.details: From writers Nick Antosca ("Channel Zero") and Michelle Dean comes "The Act," a character-driven true-crime anthology series that tells the shocking stories behind unbelievably real criminal acts.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Pilot
episodes.details: In the series premiere episode, J moves in with his estranged family in Oceanside, California after his mother dies of a heroin overdose. He finds himself drawn into a dark world funded by criminal activities that he’s been shielded from for years, as she and his uncles plan their upcoming heist. For the moment, he’s protected by Smurf, but J must prove his loyalty to stay alive.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - We Don't Hurt People
episodes.details: The Codys must deal with the aftermath of the heist as they discover all did not go as planned. Smurf dispatches her boys to tie up loose ends, but her efforts are complicated by Baz and Pope’s growing rivalry. As Pope gets increasingly volatile, J finds himself in the middle.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Stay Close, Stick Together
episodes.details: While Craig recovers from a wound, Baz and Craig deal with some old associates down in Mexico. Meanwhile, strapped for cash, Pope takes charge and ropes Deran and J into a job without Smurf’s knowledge. Threatened by J’s participation, Deran sends him a terrifying message.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Dead to Me
episodes.details: As the boys gear up for Pope's birthday, Smurf wants to know if they're playing by her rules. J learns more about his mother's estrangement from the family.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Flesh Is Weak
episodes.details: When Deran won’t come home Pope goes to extreme measures. Baz gets an idea for the Codys’ next job. J goes out with his teacher while Smurf confronts her past.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Child Care
episodes.details: When Pope tests positive for drugs Smurf does what it takes to keep the family intact. Baz gets his brothers to rob a house as part of his larger plan. J discovers the plan and faces a moral dilemma.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Goddamn Animals
episodes.details: While Smurf takes care of unfinished business Craig and Deran throw a party at the house. Forced to accelerate his timetable Baz takes the final step in his long con. J makes a dangerous mistake.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Man In
episodes.details: Tensions run high as the Codys prepare for their big heist. Catherine gets a shock and must decide what’s best for her family while J faces pressure from the cops.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Judas Kiss
episodes.details: While the Codys go after the biggest score of their lives the cops put J in an impossible position. Catherine triggers Smurf’s suspicions when she comes over to make amends so Smurf sends Pope to investigate.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - What Have You Done
episodes.details: Puzzled by Catherine’s disappearance Baz hunts down all leads. With J caught in the middle the cops close in on the Codys and threaten to take them all down in the season finale.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Eat What You Kill
episodes.details: After a risky heist misfires, the boys blame Smurf sending shock waves through the family. Baz copes with being a single parent and Deran makes plans for the future.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Karma
episodes.details: As Smurf adjusts to being sidelined the boys scope out their next job. When Deran needs some quick cash Pope and Craig lend him a hand. Meanwhile Baz investigates Catherine’s disappearance.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Bleed for It
episodes.details: Smurf takes J to the desert for an old friend’s wake. Meanwhile Baz visits Lucy (new series star Carolina Guerra) in Mexico and Pope bonds with Amy (guest star Jennifer Landon) from the MegaChurch while babysitting Lena (guest star Aamya Deva Keroles). And Deran considers what he’ll risk to get a liquor license for the bar.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Broken Boards
episodes.details: When the bar set to open Deran frets about telling Smurf about it. Meanwhile Pope and Amy go on a date while Nicky must choose between Craig and J.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Forgive Us Our Trespasses
episodes.details: As the boys put the MegaChurch heist in motion Craig has second thoughts. Meanwhile Javi (guest star Alex Meraz) surprises Smurf with a visit.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Cry Havoc
episodes.details: As Javi ratchets up the pressure on Smurf she enlists J to help her. Confronted by a secret Catherine kept from him Baz clashes with Pope in the wake of the MegaChurch job.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - Dig
episodes.details: The boys consider how far they’ll go to help Smurf eliminate Javi. Shaken by what’s happened Nicky and J get closer. Meanwhile Baz shares new information with Pope about Catherine’s disappearance.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Grace
episodes.details: As the cops press Amy about the church robbery Pope diverts their suspicions. And while Craig plans an unusual heist of his own Baz tails Smurf to find out what she’s really hiding.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - Custody
episodes.details: When Baz bows out of the yacht heist Craig and Deran consider their options. Meanwhile Baz recruits J for a more personal job.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - Treasure
episodes.details: As Craig leads the boys and Nicky in pirating the yacht Smurf tries to find out who robbed her. Meanwhile Baz considers what life would be like without Smurf calling all the shots.

episodes.title: Ep 211 - The Leopard
episodes.details: Baz puts his plan to take down Smurf in motion as Marco (guest star Joseph Julian Soria) cashes in a favor with Craig and Deran. Meanwhile Pope seeks the truth behind the reasons for Catherine’s death.

episodes.title: Ep 212 - You Will Be Gutted
episodes.details: With Smurf in jail Baz makes his move to run the family; but his brothers have other plans.

episodes.title: Ep 213 - Betrayal
episodes.details: When Smurf realizes she may be in jail a lot longer than expected she pits her sons against one another – the consequences be damned in the season finale episode.

episodes.title: Ep 301 - The Killing
episodes.details: In the third season premiere episode, Baz fights for his life as the Cody boys figure out what their next move is in the aftermath of the shooting. Meanwhile, Smurf gets some surprising news in jail and fields an offer from Pearce (guest star Gil Birmingham).

episodes.title: Ep 302 - In The Red
episodes.details: J struggles to keep the family business afloat after Smurf enlists him to make sure all the bills get paid. Deran makes his own moves independent of the family. Pope learns the ins and outs of parenting as he cares for Lena (recurring guest star Aamya Deva Keroles) and Craig makes enemies in Mexico.

episodes.title: Ep 303 - The Center Will Hold
episodes.details: Smurf navigates prison politics in pursuit of a potential job. J pulls the Cody boys together to keep the family enterprise going. Nicky gets into serious trouble when she tries to impress an old friend.

episodes.title: Ep 304 - Wolves
episodes.details: With the cops on their tail, the Cody boys try to pull off their first heist without Smurf and Baz. They return to find unexpected guests waiting at the house. Smurf demands that J get rid of them as she deals with a problem of her own in jail.

episodes.title: Ep 305 - Prey
episodes.details: Deran gets to know his father Billy and helps J with a dilemma as Pearce closes in on Smurf’s laundering operation. Craig uncovers a secret that sends him to Smurf; and Nicky must decide whether she belongs in the Cody family or not.

episodes.title: Ep 306 - Broke from the Box
episodes.details: J tries to make his relationship with Nicky work as he faces pressure from Smurf to clean up loose ends from Javi’s murder. Craig gathers the boys to defend to Codys’ reputation in town when outsiders move in on their territory. Billy gives Deran an idea for a job.

episodes.title: Ep 307 - Low Man
episodes.details: Deran leads the charge in planning the weed heist. Lucy (series star Carolina Guerra) calls Pope down to Mexico for some intel on Baz’s murder. J reaches a breaking point with Smurf. Craig learns more about Billy’s girlfriend Frankie (guest star Dichen Lachman).

episodes.title: Ep 308 - Incoming
episodes.details: The weed heist goes awry and leaves J and Deran stranded. Pope and Billy butt heads as Craig tries to keep the peace between them. Smurf learns about what J has been hiding from her since she’s been away.

episodes.title: Ep 309 - Libertad
episodes.details: A decision from Deran’s past comes back to haunt him. J works to get back into Smurf’s good graces as she tries to take away his control over the family business. As he learns more about the Cody dynamics, Billy uses his past with Smurf to his advantage.

episodes.title: Ep 310 - Off the Tit
episodes.details: Tensions run high as Billy pressures the family to give him what he’s owed. Craig has a surprise meeting that makes him reconsider his future. Smurf comes to the boys with a proposal and they struggle to hold onto the freedom they had when she was in jail.

episodes.title: Ep 311 - Jackpot
episodes.details: Smurf enlists the boys in a surprise job that results in devastating consequences. Pope is forced to confront the truth about Baz’s murder, as J steps up for the family in an unexpected way.

episodes.title: Ep 312 - Homecoming
episodes.details: While the Cody family picks up the pieces from their showdown with Lucy, Smurf is determined to reel Pope back into the fold at any cost. Meanwhile, J goes to extreme lengths to protect a secret.

episodes.title: Ep 313 - The Hyenas
episodes.details: In the season three finale episode, J realizes the danger of balancing his role in the family with his personal ambitions. Deran wants to take his relationship with Adrian to the next level, but it’s not as easy as he hoped. Frankie opens new doors for Craig. And Smurf offers to give the boys the independence they’re been asking for, but it doesn’t come for free.

episodes.title: Ep 401 - Janine
episodes.details: In the season premiere, the Codys pull off a risky robbery that results in a big realization for Craig, while the relationship between Smurf and Pope remains rocky.

episodes.title: Ep 402 - Angela
episodes.details: J reconsiders his relationship with Smurf after he gets bad news about Morgan's death. Frankie lures Craig with the promise of another big score. The arrival of an old family friend surprises Pope; and Deran questions if Adrian is really ready to accept him for who he is.

episodes.title: Ep 403 - Man Vs. Rock
episodes.details: As Craig feels the pressure of pulling off Frankie's increasingly complicated job, J grows frustrated with Mia. Deran tries to get Pope out of the house, and Smurf decides she needs answers.

episodes.title: Ep 404 - Tank
episodes.details: The Cody boys are thrown by Smurf's increasingly unnerving behavior as she shows up in unexpected places. J realizes he needs to set his own plans in motion if he wants to lead the family. Deran gets disturbing news from an old friend; and Pope struggles to resist the advances of Angela.

episodes.title: Ep 405 - Reap
episodes.details: Pope learns disturbing details about where Smurf has been, and the revelation puts Angela's spot in the house in jeopardy. Adrian's return to Oceanside leads to a confrontation with Deran, as J lays the groundwork for a new job.

episodes.title: Ep 406 - Into the Black
episodes.details: Suspicion grows when Smurf learns of a new threat to the family. Craig tracks down Frankie in the wake of her betrayal, and Deran makes a dangerous decision to try and protect his relationship with Adrian.

episodes.title: Ep 407 - Know Thy Enemy
episodes.details: J gains favor with Smurf as he puts together the plan for a new job, while Angela learns more about what Smurf's been hiding. Craig explores his new relationship with Renn and Pope struggles with his changing role in the family.

episodes.title: Ep 408 - Ambo
episodes.details: The Codys head out for a big job, even though Smurf is nowhere to be found. All eyes are on J as he assumes a leadership position in a risky heist.

episodes.title: Ep 409 - SHTF
episodes.details: J faces the consequences of his missteps with Mia. Pope worries about Smurf's disappearance, while Smurf visits someone from her past. Craig grows frustrated with Deran's secrecy after Deran recruits him for a dangerous assignment.

episodes.title: Ep 410 - Exit Strategy
episodes.details: Smurf orders the Cody boys to plan a dangerous job while she orchestrates an elaborate party at the house. J tries to ally himself with Pope but learns he's in way over his head. Craig responds to a challenge to his newly formed family with Renn.

episodes.title: Ep 411 - Julia
episodes.details: Pope grows suspicious of J when Angela reveals the circumstances of her disappearance. As the threats against Adrian loom larger, Deran scrambles to find a way out. Meanwhile, Craig navigates new complications in his relationship with Renn. And Janine takes on a different role in the crew's latest heist as she plans her future with Colin.

episodes.title: Ep 412 - Ghosts
episodes.details: The Cody family sets off on Smurf's mysterious heist, unaware of the surprises that await them.

episodes.title: Ep 413 - Smurf
episodes.details: In the aftermath of Smurf's heist, the Codys have to protect their reputation, while friends and enemies from the past close in. Meanwhile, Deran realizes there is only one way to keep Adrian safe, while Craig struggles to adapt to a new pace of life. Lastly, Pope and J's growing tension reaches a boiling point in the season four finale.

series.title: Animal Kingdom
series.details: Centers on a Southern California family, whose excessive lifestyle is fueled by their criminal activities.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - El Negocio Del Miedo
episodes.details: As express kidnappings grow rampant throughout Spain, Bárbara Vázquez becomes frustrated with the police force's inability to stop these crimes. She resigns from the police force and begins working at Zentral Risk, an insurance company whose star product is a policy with kidnapping coverage. The team conducts their first mission, which ends in an intense negotiation with one of the kidnappers.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Los Platillos Chinos
episodes.details: The police suspect they are dealing with a Latinx gang war for control over the kidnappings. An incident occurs during the first negotation that alters the team's future. Roldán's methods put the group in danger.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - S1 Trailer
episodes.details: Get ready for Express. Series Premiere January 16

series.title: Express
series.details: Bárbara Vázquez, a brilliant criminal psychologist, resigns from the Police Force and begins working at Zentral Risk, an insurance company whose star product is a policy with kidnapping coverage. Their mission is to wipe out this kind of crime.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Diplos
episodes.details: Two doctors investigate a series of botched operations at the hands of a fellow surgeon.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Ain't No Bum
episodes.details: Dr. Henderson and Dr. Kirby bring their fight to the Texas Medical Board as Duntsch's early years begin to reveal the man he is today.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Dock Ellis
episodes.details: Duntsch attempts to gain privileges at another local hospital as Henderson and Kirby travel to Tennessee to interview an important player in his education.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - An Occurrence at Randall Kirby's Bathroom
episodes.details: In flashback, Duntsch sets up his medical practice in Dallas for the first time as Henderson and Kirby take extreme measures to stop Duntsch permanently.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - The $?!& In The Bed
episodes.details: Assistant District Attorney Michelle Shughart joins Henderson and Kirby in exploring legal solutions while Duntsch is recruited by a prestigious medical center.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Occam's Razor
episodes.details: After a devastating week in the O.R., Duntsch has his privileges suspended pending a drug test. Shughart fights for an indictment.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Feet of Clay
episodes.details: Duntsch is taken into custody. Shughart builds her case while Henderson and Kirby dig deeper into Duntsch’s past

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Hard Wood Floors
episodes.details: Duntsch stands trial after maiming or killing thirty-three out of thirty-eight of his patients while Henderson and Kirby struggle with the failure of the medical system to stop him.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer 1001
episodes.details: Get ready for Dr. Death. Series Premiere September 12

series.title: Dr. Death
series.details: Based on the hit podcast from Wondery, Dr. Death tells the shocking true story of Dr. Christopher Duntsch (Joshua Jackson), a seemingly bright young neurosurgeon with a thriving medical practice. But all is not as it seems.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.details: One twenty-something’s life is about to change forever.

episodes.title: Help Wanted
episodes.details: April grapples with the revelation about her health while chasing a tough assignment at work.

episodes.title: Blood Cancer Sex Carrots
episodes.details: When April learns of Dominic's reputation as the office playboy, she questions the seriousness of their relationship and becomes all the more determined to hide her illness.

episodes.title: I'll Sleep When I'm Dead
episodes.details: April becomes overwhelmed by home and career responsibilities; Brenna bonds with a popular student.

episodes.title: The Family That Lies Together
episodes.details: April still struggles to tell Dominic about her cancer, but she opens up about the skeletons in the Carver family closet.

episodes.title: Clear Minds, Full Lives, Can't Eat!
episodes.details: With the start of her treatment looming, April finds herself with Leo on an eye-opening joyride

episodes.title: Unplanned Parenthood
episodes.details: April learns about fertility options prior to starting chemotherapy.

episodes.title: Death Becomes Her
episodes.details: April is surprised by Leo, and Brenna heads to Miami in search of answers.

episodes.title: What To Expect When You're Expecting Chemo
episodes.details: With only a few days left before April has to check herself into the hospital for aggressive chemotherapy, April is determined to live as normal a life as ever. But as she has to deal with Leo drama, Beth falling apart, and trying to live under the hovering eye of Sarah, April quickly learns that nothing will ever be “normal” for her. Meanwhile, Brenna tries to juggle time with Kieran and Greer.

episodes.title: Finding Chemo
episodes.details: April struggles coming to terms with her situation as she starts chemotherapy treatments.

episodes.title: Locks Of Love (Christmas Special)
episodes.details: April’s grandparents come to visit, The Carvers celebrate an early Christmas to cheer up April, and April gets a chemo makeover

episodes.title: Next April
episodes.details: April returns to work and learns there have been major changes at the paper during her absence.

episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming To Donate
episodes.details: The Carvers are thrilled to learn Natalie is a match for April, until Natalie has second thoughts.

episodes.title: Cancer Friends With Benefits
episodes.details: April and Leo attempt to make a new start while April and Dominic are unwillingly reunited to cover an event for the paper.

episodes.title: April Just Wants To Have Fun
episodes.details: April feels pressured to act her age, so she sets out to have some fun.

episodes.title: The Big Leagues
episodes.details: April must make a tough choice when she uncovers major news about baseball player Richie Miranda.

episodes.title: Model Behavior
episodes.details: April deals with the fallout from her latest article.

episodes.title: Rest In Peace
episodes.details: April's anxiety mounts when her cancer symptoms recur.

episodes.title: Life, Actually
episodes.details: April and Beth share their concerns about the shortcomings of each other’s boyfriends, which sparks tension in both relationships.

episodes.title: No News Is Bad News
episodes.details: The Post’s new Editor In Chief pressures April to put her career first, but April wonders if her priorities have changed.

episodes.title: One Day
episodes.details: April is blindsided by bad news but fights to maintain control over her destiny and to stay strong for her family. She also learns that The Post is cleaning house, but despite her determination to keep her job, extenuating circumstances keep her head on the chopping block. Meanwhile, Brenna learns she is a bone marrow match for an anonymous patient.

episodes.title: A View From The Ledge
episodes.details: April tries to live life in the moment.

episodes.title: The Age Of Consent
episodes.details: April struggles to take the reins of her life when she has to make a big decision about her life.

episodes.title: Life Of Brenna
episodes.details: As her last day at Charton approaches, Brenna struggles with always being in April’s shadow.

episodes.title: Truly Madly Deeply
episodes.details: Honesty is key in all relationships, especially for April and Leo.

episodes.title: The Domino Effect
episodes.details: April faces a series of “lasts” as her wedding date gets closer.

episodes.title: The Last W
episodes.details: It is the day they have all been waiting for – April and Leo’s wedding day.

episodes.title: As Long As We Both Shall Live
episodes.details: April and Leo try to settle into married life.

episodes.title: The Ghost in You
episodes.details: Not wanting to deal with the aftermath of the shocking loss, April wants to shut out the world and everyone in it. But only Leo can get her out of bed and out of her funk with a surprise he concocted for someone as special as she is. Meanwhile, Brenna gets good advice from Finn.

episodes.title: Wild Thing
episodes.details: April starts to use her inheritance money to mask her pain.

episodes.title: A Bottle of Secrets
episodes.details: April uses her reporter skills to discover a family secret.

episodes.title: First Person
episodes.details: Eager to get her book published, April meets with a literary agent who gives her advice she is reluctant to accept. It’s not until she meets a young friend at Camp Hendrie, who helps put things in perspective. But April is not the only one who will need a different point of view. Meanwhile, Brenna opens up about her feelings regarding her father.

episodes.title: Ready or Not
episodes.details: Ellie Pratt and April have a long-standing history of rivalry, despite being friends in college. Ready to put this behind her, April is delighted to spend time with Ellie during her visit to Boston – that is, until she discovers why Ellie is there to begin with. Meanwhile, Beth is faced with troubling news that threatens her career and relationship.

episodes.title: La Dolce Vita
episodes.details: Feeling uninspired back at home, April decides to take a trip to Italy.

series.title: Chasing Life
series.details: Chasing Life follows April, a twenty-something journalist whose life is finally coming together. When she is suddenly diagnosed with cancer, her world is turned upside-down and she must learn to keep chasing life.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.details: In the series premiere, Alfred Pennyworth (JACK BANNON) meets Thomas Wayne (BEN ALDRIDGE) and falls in love with Esme (EMMA CORRIN).

episodes.title: The Landlord's Daughter
episodes.details: After surviving the plot against the government, Alfred and Esme decide to get engaged. Meanwhile, Lord Harwood is tortured, and Bet Sykes is sentenced to be executed.

episodes.title: Martha Kane
episodes.details: Alfred accepts an assignment from American heiress Martha Kane (Emma Paetz) to transport a scientist out of the country.

episodes.title: Lady Penelope
episodes.details: Thomas meets Martha for the first time and assigns her and Alfred a dangerous mission – to uncover the new leader of the Raven Society. Later, tragedy strikes.

episodes.title: Shirley Bassey
episodes.details: John Ripper presents Alfred with an offer; meanwhile, Lord Harwood's fate takes a curious turn.

episodes.title: Cilla Black
episodes.details: Martha and Patricia Wayne attend a debauched party with famed magician Aleister Crowley.

episodes.title: Julie Christie
episodes.details: While Martha and Thomas confront Crowley over his strange party and the return of Patricia, Alfred and the lads track down the identity of a wanted killer.

episodes.title: Sandie Shaw
episodes.details: While Lord Harwood returns to take control of the Raven Society, Alfred, Dave Boy and Bazza form an unlikely alliance with the Sykes Sisters.

episodes.title: Alma Cogan
episodes.details: Alfred, Thomas and Martha become entangled in an assassination plot against Lord Harwood.

episodes.title: Marianne Faithful
episodes.details: When the Queen is abducted in the season finale, Alfred must take a side in the struggle. Meanwhile, Lord Harwood uses those closest to Alfred to remove him from the game.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: This DC origin story follows Bruce Wayne's legendary butler, Alfred Pennyworth, who forms a security company and goes to work with young billionaire Thomas Wayne in 1960s London.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - The Heavy Crown
episodes.details: In the season premiere, Alfred Pennyworth (JACK BANNON) tries to profit off a wartorn London that threatens to be overrun by the fascist Raven Union.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - The Burning Bridge
episodes.details: Alfred's plans for his departure to America are put on hold when someone close to him is put in danger. Thomas (BEN ALDRIDGE) enlists the help of an old foe, Aleister Crowley.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - The Belt and Welt
episodes.details: While Crowley enacts his plan with unintended results, Alfred, Bazza (HAINSLEY LLOYD BENNETT) and Daveboy (RYAN FLETCHER) set out to find out who had the nerve to steal from them.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - The Hunted Fox
episodes.details: Still haunted by tragedy, Alfred agrees to join Gully’s team on an upcoming job. Meanwhile, pressure begins to take its toll on Harwood and direct him toward Project Stormcloud.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - The Bleeding Heart
episodes.details: While Alfred and Daveboy run one last job for Gully in order to buy tickets to America, tensions ratchet up at Raven Union HQ between Harwood and his lieutenants.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - The Rose and Thorn
episodes.details: While Alfred is enlisted to help extract Lucius Fox from Raven headquarters, Prime Minister Aziz sets in motion a plan that pits Aleister Crowley against John Ripper.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - The Bloody Mary
episodes.details: While Alfred prepares to depart England for good, Bet and Peggy Sykes set out to rescue their old friend Lord Harwood from imminent danger.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - The Hangman's Noose
episodes.details: While Salt sits down with the League to discuss peace, Alfred confronts Gully to do the same. And Martha finally comes clean to Thomas about her dilemma.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - The Paradise Lost
episodes.details: With less than 48 hours, Alfred, Thomas & Martha concoct a plan to infiltrate Raven headquarters with Daveboy and Lucius to steal Project Stormcloud.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - The Lion and Lamb
episodes.details: In the season two finale, Salt is hell bent on releasing Project Stormcloud upon London… unless Alfred and his mates can stop it.

episodes.title: Ep 2001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: A year after the explosive events of last season, England finds itself embroiled in a devastating civil war, with the powerful, neo-fascist Raven Union, led by Lord Harwood threatening to control the entire country.

series.title: Pennyworth
series.details: This DC origin story follows Bruce Wayne's legendary butler, Alfred Pennyworth, a former British SAS soldier who forms a security company and goes to work with young billionaire Thomas Wayne, who's not yet Bruce's billionaire father, in 1960s London.

episodes.title: Birds of a Feather
episodes.details: A young boy wants to hire Harry because he believes that monsters are after him and his mom. Harry doesn't want to take the kid's money, but he also knows from his own experience that a child's monsters are often all too real.

episodes.title: The Boone Identity
episodes.details: A grieving father asks Harry to help put his daughter's spirit to rest. This should be easy. All Dresden has to do is track down the killer and make sure that justice has been done. There's only one catch: the killer died only hours after the murder.

episodes.title: Hair of the Dog
episodes.details: A series of ritualistic murders starts to look a lot like werewolves so Harry, of course, gets dragged in. Thing is, it looks like the lycanthropes aren't the killers... they're the victims.

episodes.title: Rules of Engagement
episodes.details: A beautiful young woman asks Harry to help her recover some stolen money. Before long, Dresden discovers a connection between this case and a dark, supernatural evil, and that his lovely client has been hiding something.

episodes.title: Bad Blood
episodes.details: After a failed hit on her life, Bianca, Chicago's most powerful vampire, calls upon Harry Dresden. In debt to her for saving his life years before, he agrees to help her find the mastermind behind the plan to take her down.

episodes.title: Soul Beneficiary
episodes.details: An otherwise healthy man experiencing premonitions of his own demise seeks Harry's help but ends up croaking right in his office. As the dark circumstances surrounding his death are revealed, Harry finds himself in the crosshairs of a dangerous magic-user; meanwhile, the crime that got Bob condemned to living in his own skull for all eternity finally comes to light.

episodes.title: Walls
episodes.details: Harry investigates the death of a college student which leads him to a most unusual ring of thieves. A group of students is using magic to commit a series of impossible thefts, and Harry must stop them quickly. Not only because what they are doing is wrong, but also because the magic will eventually kill them all.

episodes.title: Storm Front
episodes.details: Dresden runs up against the High Council when they suspect him in the deaths of a college coed and a local mobster from black magic.

episodes.title: The Other Dick
episodes.details: When Chicago PI Jim Brennan is murdered by supernatural means, Harry must team up with Brennan's assistant to find the murderer.

episodes.title: What About Bob?
episodes.details: Things seem to be going well between Harry and his new flame until she walks out on him... and takes Bob's skull. Now Dresden must find Bob and rescue him from the clutches of an old enemy. But will Bob want to be rescued?

episodes.title: Things That Go Bump
episodes.details: Morgan and Ancient Mai must come to Harry for protection and shelter from powerful enemies of Mai's. They make it to the relative safety of Dresden's place, but suddenly find that they are all trapped by a powerful spell. Now Harry must work with them to find a way out before the spell turns deadly.

episodes.title: Second City
episodes.details: Dresden and Murphy must work together to solve the mystery of a former gang member who drowns on dry land, miles from the nearest lake. Meanwhile, Murphy's father is in town, and he doesn't have a very high opinion of his daughter's freelance consultant.

series.title: The Dresden Files
series.details: Harry Dresden (Paul Blackthorne) is a regular-guy private detective with extraordinary abilities. Whether consulting for the police on seemingly inexplicable crimes or following his own cases, he battles dark forces with a wry sense of humor.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - The End
episodes.details: When the “Captain Trips” flu epidemic wipes out more than 99% of the population, the remaining few immune to the disease, including Stu Redman, Frannie Goldsmith, and Harold Lauder, set out in search of other survivors, all the while, experiencing visions of the nurturing Mother Abagail and the menacing figure of The Dark Man.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Pocket Savior
episodes.details: Musician Larry Underwood is on the cusp of his big break when “Captain Trips” strikes New York. Alone and wandering an empty city, he meets an alluring new acquaintance also desperate to escape. Meanwhile, an incarcerated Lloyd Henreid comes face-to-face with Randall Flagg, The Dark Man himself, who makes him an enticing offer.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Blank Page
episodes.details: Mother Abagail selects a surprising voice to be her conduit to her chosen Committee in Boulder: the young deaf man Nick Andros. The arrival of a disturbing visitor to the Boulder Free Zone, shakes the Committee and Boulder residents to their core. Elsewhere in the Free Zone, Nadine Cross is haunted by a childhood memory.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - The House of the Dead
episodes.details: The Boulder Free Zone Committee looks to solidify their leadership and bolster the community with a town hall meeting, but Flagg continues to make inroads as he plots to destroy the newly-forming society from within.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Fear and Loathing in New Vegas
episodes.details: Nadine and Harold’s dark intentions continue to take shape. Meanwhile, the Committee’s spies entrench themselves in New Vegas, where Flagg is building his own society, where officially-sanctioned sin and debauchery disguises a ruthlessly-enforced order. Back in Boulder, Frannie hatches a plan to confirm her suspicions of Harold while Mother Abagail seeks divine council.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - The Vigil
episodes.details: While all of Boulder fears for Mother Abagail’s safety, Stu organizes search parties to ensure her return, presenting an opportunity for Harold and Nadine. In New Vegas, Flagg recruits a dangerous new follower.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - The Walk
episodes.details: After tragedy strikes the Boulder Free Zone, Mother Abagail tasks members of her Committee with a dangerous mission. Meanwhile, Harold and Nadine begin their journey to New Vegas to unite with Flagg and claim their reward.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - The Stand
episodes.details: Risking everything, the Boulder travelers face off with Flagg’s followers in New Vegas, among them a very different - and pregnant - Nadine.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - The Circle Closes
episodes.details: Limited series finale written by Stephen King. After seeing both the light and the dark, Frannie makes her stand.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: When the “Captain Trips” flu epidemic wipes out more than 99% of the population, the remaining few immune to the disease, including Stu Redman, Frannie Goldsmith, and Harold Lauder, set out in search of other survivors, all the while, experiencing visions of the nurturing Mother Abagail and the menacing figure of The Dark Man.

series.title: The Stand
series.details: The Stand is Stephen King’s apocalyptic vision of a world decimated by plague and embroiled in an elemental struggle between good and evil. The fate of mankind rests on the frail shoulders of the 108-year-old Mother Abagail and a handful of survivors. Their worst nightmares are embodied in a man with a lethal smile and unspeakable powers: Randall Flagg, the Dark Man.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Love You Like A Sister
episodes.details: National Marine Fisheries Service agent Jackie Quiñones has a wrench thrown in her life when she uncovers a dead body on the beach, plunging her into an opioid ring investigation.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Severely Weatherbeaten
episodes.details: After discovering a lead on Sherry’s murder, Jackie becomes determined to solve the case. Junior finds himself trapped, and Ray is connecting with his CI in ways that are not professional.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Rebellion Dogs
episodes.details: Jackie returns to rehab, but only to help her investigation. Ray starts closing in on Osito at the same time he and Renee cross the line. Junior takes the first step to becoming a soldier.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - B.F.O.
episodes.details: Jackie finds out where Krista Collins is staying, but gets pulled back into her own life. Ray comes face to face with Osito. Junior tries to reconcile with Donna's family.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - The Best You'll Feel All Day
episodes.details: Jackie goes on a bender, threatening everything she has going for her, and putting Krista in danger like never before. Junior has to prove himself in a new way. Ray and Renee go on a date.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - The White Whale
episodes.details: Jackie and Junior struggle to cope in the wake of a traumatic event. Ray's investigation picks up speed. Ray is there for Renee when she really needs him.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Everybody's Got a Cousin in Miami
episodes.details: When Jackie realizes Junior’s involved with Sherry’s murder, she enlists Ray and the entire CCINU to track him down. Renee finds herself deeply questioning her budding relationship with Ray.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - #Blessed
episodes.details: Jackie and Ray both try to return to business as usual, without much success. Osito’s suspected to be back in the Dominican Republic, and Ray's case stalls out. Jackie’s back to her old tricks, drinking herself silly, sleeping with a new woman every night, all in an attempt to stuff down her own pain and guilt over Junior’s death.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: Set in the world of beautiful but bleak Cape Cod, “Hightown” follows one woman’s journey to sobriety, overshadowed by a murder investigation dragging her into its fold. Premieres on May 17th on STARZPLAY. New episode weekly.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Great White
episodes.details: Jackie is white-hot to prove herself as a cop and avenge the death of her best friend, Junior. Frankie teams up with ex-con, cousin Jorge while Ray’s off the force because of Renee’s betrayal. There’s a new deadly drug in trade during off-season Cape Cod, labeled “Great White.”

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Girl Power
episodes.details: Jackie’s new partner Leslie matches her ambition perfectly as their relationship deepens on and off the force. Frankie and Jorge continue to move forward but Charmaine, their New York connection, is a wild card. Jorge sows distrust between Frankie and Renee; as Alan turns to Frankie’s old right-hand man, Osito, to solve a case.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Fresh as a Daisy
episodes.details: Jackie abandons her stakeout for a fiery confrontation. Ray is once again humiliated, and does what he can to get back on the force.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Daddy Issues
episodes.details: Jackie and Leslie get deeper into the case, and with each other. Someone will make a decision they will regret.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Dot Dot Dot
episodes.details: Jackie and Ray both realize a distressing truth. Frankie feels threatened and Renee proves herself to be ruthless.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Behind Every Skirt is a Slip
episodes.details: It’s the day before Thanksgiving on the Cape: things are looking up for Ray, and looking grim for Jackie. Frankie is filled with anxiety over his business with Jorge.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - Crack is Wack
episodes.details: It’s Thanksgiving but the drugs and despair don’t let up. Frankie, riding an ocean of anxiety, takes Renee to the point of no return. Ray is going all in on a case no one wants him on, and Alan’s holiday dinner is interrupted.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Houston, We Have a Problem
episodes.details: Ray is so close to getting everything he’s wanted, but he will have to maneuver things just right. Jackie’s met with a crossroad and must choose how to move forward.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - Small Craft Warning
episodes.details: Renee risks everything to change her world around. Alan sets a trap that covers the entire Cape.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - Fool Me Twice
episodes.details: The whole “Great White” operation is cracked open, but a few mysteries remain. Ray’s plan to get his job back has a complicated ending. Jackie goes from feeling like a hero after an important discovery to the zero who let something critical get away.

series.title: Hightown
series.details: Set in the world of beautiful but bleak Cape Cod, “Hightown” follows one woman’s journey to sobriety, overshadowed by a murder investigation dragging her into its fold.

episodes.title: Part 1
episodes.details: Rosemary (Zoe Saldana) and Guy (Patrick J. Adams) start a new life in Paris, where a good deed leads to friendship with a rich and powerful couple who may be hiding a dark secret.

episodes.title: Part 2
episodes.details: Plagued by anxiety and illness, Rosemary (Zoe Saldana) becomes increasingly suspicious that her husband and neighbors have ulterior motives for her unborn son.

series.title: Rosemary's Baby
series.details: Based on the best-selling novel by Ira Levin, "Rosemary's Baby" centers on a young married couple who move to Paris in hopes of leaving their past behind. After a series of unfortunate events, Rosemary and Guy Woodhouse are presented with an offer they can't refuse - an apartment at the most prestigious address in the city. They soon realize it comes with a haunted past and an immeasurable price.

episodes.title: Stand and Unfold Yourself
episodes.details: In the series premiere, following the abrupt death of their older brother and heir to the throne, Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor struggle with their new roles, Queen Helena works to maintain the family's image and King Simon questions the monarchy's future.

episodes.title: Infants of the Spring
episodes.details: At the annual garden party, Prince Liam is reunited with his ex, Gemma. The Queen and Cyrus work to counteract King Simon's wishes.

episodes.title: We Are Pictures or Mere Beasts
episodes.details: The Queen and Princess Eleanor throw competing fashion shows during London's fashion week while Prince Liam narrowly avoids a catastrophe.

episodes.title: Sweet, Not Lasting
episodes.details: Prince Liam does his first PR tour as heir to the throne while Queen Helena forces Princess Eleanor to take a PR tour in London.

episodes.title: Unmask Her Beauty to the Moon
episodes.details: The true nature of Prince Liam, Princess Eleanor and Queen Helena’s romances become clear at the Queen’s annual masquerade ball.

episodes.title: The Slings and Arrows of Outrageous Fortune
episodes.details: During a trip to Monaco, Prince Liam and Ophelia’s relationship flourishes and a different side of Princess Eleanor is revealed, but the trip becomes marred by scandal and public scrutiny.

episodes.title: Your Sovereignty of Reason
episodes.details: The king makes a decision that impacts the rest of the family while Ophelia struggles with the PR fallout from Monaco.

episodes.title: The Great Man Down
episodes.details: An assassination attempt puts the Royal Family on lockdown inside the palace safe room.

episodes.title: In My Heart There Was a Kind of Fighting
episodes.details: When someone from Prince Robert’s past pays them a visit, Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor must face their own personal demons.

episodes.title: Our Wills and Fates Do So Contrary Run
episodes.details: Secrets are revealed as Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor investigate Prince Robert’s death and the attack on the throne.

episodes.title: It Is Not, nor It Cannot Come to Good
episodes.details: In the wake of King Simon’s death, King Cyrus’ new look monarchy is on full display at the Royal polo match, Prince Liam is hell-bent on revenge and receives some unexpected help, and Queen Helena maneuvers for power.

episodes.title: Welcome is Fashion and Ceremony
episodes.details: In Prince Liam’s search for vengeance, a secret is exposed that affects the monarchy’s future while Princess Eleanor rekindles an old flame.

episodes.title: Is Not This Something More Than Fantasy
episodes.details: Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor both take trips that don’t end as they expected, while at home Queen Helena meets a new rival and King Cyrus receives some bad news.

episodes.title: What, Has This Thing Appear'd Again Tonight?
episodes.details: King Cyrus makes a stand against Queen Helena and Prince Liam to eliminate King Simon’s legacy. Princess Eleanor makes a friend as a new wrinkle in the King’s murder is potentially revealed.

episodes.title: The Spirit That I Have Seen
episodes.details: Princess Eleanor’s new relationship makes waves in and outside of the palace as King Cyrus uses a public ceremony to solidify his image and Queen Helena learns of betrayal.

episodes.title: Doubt Truth To Be A Liar
episodes.details: The twins have a birthday party in the palace and things get out of hand. Queen Helena and Prince Liam look to the past for answers about the future.

episodes.title: Taint Not Thy Mind, Nor Let Thy Soul Contrive Against ThyMother
episodes.details: Queen Helena and Princess Eleanor share some unexpected bonding time as Prince Liam investigates Domino.

episodes.title: Be All My Sins Remembered
episodes.details: Relationships are forever changed when The Royals’ family history is called in to question.

episodes.title: And Then It Started Like a Guilty Thing
episodes.details: Uncertainty abounds as questions of the King's killer come to the forefront and the monarchy's structure is challenged.

episodes.title: The Serpent That Did Sting Thy Father's Life
episodes.details: Princess Eleanor and Prince Liam finally learn who killed King Simon, while Queen Helena works to right her wrongs.

episodes.title: Together With Remembrance of Ourselves
episodes.details: In the wake of the death of King Simon’s murderer, the royal family returns with a fresh perspective. Liam seeks solace in disreputable places, while Prince Robert is revealed to be alive, but is he well?

episodes.title: Passing Through Nature to Eternity
episodes.details: Queen Helena, along with her new Lord Chamberlain, devises a plan to secure proof of Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor’s paternity. Liam begins a new but complicated relationship, while Jasper and Eleanor look to the past to inspire their future together.

episodes.title: Aye, There's the Rub
episodes.details: While under the weather, Helena gets hooked on a reality television program. The true paternity of Liam and Eleanor is revealed at a time when the prince and princess are each focusing on passionate relationships.

episodes.title: Our (Late) Dear Brother's Death
episodes.details: Jasper and Eleanor immerse themselves in their relationship while Liam is forced to reappraise his latest tryst. Enduring his cancer, King Cyrus is visited by his past, while the palace arranges a press conference to announce earth shattering news.

episodes.title: Born To Set It Right
episodes.details: On the eve of a very public appearance, the family’s private turmoil threatens to go public. Beck returns to the palace with his sights set on Eleanor, and a confrontation with Jasper ensues.

episodes.title: More Than Kin, And Less Than Kind
episodes.details: Christmas comes to the palace - or does it? Wanting to honor his father, Liam impulsively releases the staff, forcing the family to fend for themselves during the holiday.

episodes.title: The Counterfeit Presentment of Two Brothers
episodes.details: The royals prepare for the People’s Gala - an annual charity weekend. Each member of the family is auctioned off for charity, resulting in surprising pairings, for better and worse.

episodes.title: In The Same Figure, Like The King That's Dead
episodes.details: Jasper tries to strike a bargain to protect his past and secure his future with Eleanor, while Helena slips away for a romantic trip to Paris, much to the chagrin of her staff and family.

episodes.title: O, Farewell, Honest Soldier
episodes.details: Eleanor and Queen Helena consider romantic invitations as a Privy Council meets to determine who will reign as the one true King Of England. At great risk and consequences, Jasper reveals to Liam information that presents a new mystery for the monarchy.

episodes.title: To Show My Duty In Your Coronation
episodes.details: Liam finds himself in unexpected places while looking to validate or dismiss the latest palace scandal. Helena is heartbroken over a recent loss, while Jasper makes a final play for Eleanor’s heart.

episodes.title: How Prodigal the Soul
episodes.details: Robert gains popularity on his coronation tour, while Jasper and Liam have information that could end his reign. Eleanor chooses between returning to Jasper or working abroad with Sebastian.

episodes.title: Confess Yourself to Heaven
episodes.details: Cyrus helps Liam gather intel on Robert, while a new contender emerges as Helena and Willow assess possible brides for Robert and Jasper goes rogue at a press conference.

episodes.title: Seek for thy Noble Father in the Dust
episodes.details: Liam makes a big move with the evidence he has on Robert while Eleanor uses her status to help others and Helena finds herself at the center of a new scandal.

episodes.title: Black as His Purpose did the Night Resemble
episodes.details: A total blackout in London sparks chaos. Willow’s feelings for Robert grow stronger. Eleanor opens the palace to the public and Jasper finds himself in the middle of a riot

episodes.title: There's Daggers in Men's Smiles
episodes.details: Robert extends his power further than ever before and exiles a disloyal Cyrus. Eleanor undertakes a covert mission and Helena explores her romantic options.

episodes.title: My News Shall Be The Fruit To That Great Feast
episodes.details: Tensions rise at a family dinner celebrating the Queen’s birthday, as Liam brings a surprising guest and Jasper finds out the identity of the man who shot him.

episodes.title: Forgive Me This My Virtue
episodes.details: Eleanor enlists Jasper’s help for one of her covert missions. Helena begins a new chapter at a royal event where the press attacks Willow. Cyrus meets an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: In The Dead Vast and Middle of the Night
episodes.details: Eleanor throws Willow a party that spirals out of control, while Robert forms a sinister alliance. Liam proves his loyalty to his brother, but at what cost?

episodes.title: Foul Deeds Will Rise
episodes.details: Liam’s true intentions are revealed and the family come together to try and navigate the hard path that has been set for them. Jasper helps Liam with a plan and Willow and Robert hit a rough patch.

episodes.title: With Mirth in Funeral and With Dirge in Marriage
episodes.details: The finale ends in a day that will change the family and nation forever. A growing uprising has Robert suspicious of everyone, as the rest of the family unites to combat a formidable foe.

series.title: The Royals
series.details: The Royals follows the lives of a fictional British Royal family that inhabits a world of opulence, lust, sizzling scandal, and regal tradition - a world that also comes with a price tag of duty, destiny and intense public scrutiny.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Phenomenal Women
episodes.details: Failed novelist Ella McFair starts her first day at HotTeaDigest.com and enlists her friends to help her cover her first assignment.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Because... ADOS
episodes.details: Renee summons Ella and Sondi to update them on the status of her marriage with Jason. As they engage in a day drinking session that turns into night, Renee confesses her relationship may have come to a breaking point. Whitney feels torn between work demands and her wedding-planning obligations. Ella flirts with the idea of her first interracial sexual encounter.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - What a Co-inky-dick
episodes.details: The girls throw Ella a karaoke party for her 32nd birthday where uninvited guests cause Whitney and Ella to spiral.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - I Love Harlem
episodes.details: Whitney, Ella, Sondi and Renee brunch, shop, drink and dance in Harlem on a perfect uptown Saturday.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Plus Ones
episodes.details: Sondi and Matthew host a party for their academic peers. Chaos ensues at Whitney’s final bridal dress fitting.
