episodes.title: Ep 106 - My Therapist Says...
episodes.details: Whitney, Sondi, Ella and Renee attend therapy with a savvy, blunt, upper-west side therapist, Dr. Nancy Josephson.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - What You Wish For
episodes.details: Ella makes a career choice that has startling repercussions in her personal life. Renee makes a big decision for her career.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Almost, Lady, Almost!
episodes.details: Ella, Renee, Sondi and Hope get wild and crazy at Whitney’s bachelorette party, but the bride is nowhere to be found.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: “Run the World” is an eight-episode, half-hour series that tells the story of a group of Black women – vibrant, fiercely loyal best friends – who work, live, and play in Harlem as they strive for world domination. At its core, it’s an unapologetically female show about enviable friendship and not only surviving – but thriving together.

series.title: Run The World
series.details: “Run the World” is an eight-episode, half-hour series that tells the story of a group of Black women – vibrant, fiercely loyal best friends – who work, live, and play in Harlem as they strive for world domination. At its core, it’s an unapologetically female show about enviable friendship and not only surviving – but thriving together.

episodes.title: In Love With The King
episodes.details: In 1463, the lust between a Lancastrian commoner and Yorkist King turns into a secret wedding and a new Queen of England. But two women not so smitten with the arrangement vow to take her down.

episodes.title: The Price Of Power
episodes.details: Beautiful Elizabeth goes from the glory of being crowned Queen, to the ugly reality of life on the throne when Warwick seeks revenge against her for seducing King Edward.

episodes.title: The Storm
episodes.details: A grieving Queen Elizabeth conjures up the perfect storm to get King Edward home. But more danger awaits as her jealous detractors plot to end his reign.

episodes.title: The Bad Queen
episodes.details: Old enemies make new alliances as Lord Warwick's quest for power reaches desperate levels.

episodes.title: War At First Hand
episodes.details: Warring women become even more bitter enemies when Queen Elizabeth, Anne Neville and Margaret Beaufort each experience the brutality of the battlefield up close.

episodes.title: Love And Death
episodes.details: One marries for love, the other for political gain as Anne and Margaret tie the knot, while Queen Elizabeth experiences a double dose of heartbreak.

episodes.title: Poison And Malmsey Wine
episodes.details: Anne Neville takes center stage as paranoia starts to implode her family. Fear and a deadly concoction threaten to make them all start dropping like flies.

episodes.title: Long Live The King
episodes.details: Dark days could be ahead for King Edward as all the key players look to connive and even kill their way into being named "His or Her Majesty."

episodes.title: The Princes In The Tower
episodes.details: A dangerous chess match begins as Margaret and Queen Elizabeth plot to overpower the other and determine the fate of Prince Edward and Richard.

episodes.title: The Final Battle
episodes.details: Reaching a climactic end to their respective journeys, Anne, Queen Elizabeth and Margaret give rise to a new generation looking to scheme, manipulate, and seduce their way onto the English throne.

series.title: The White Queen
series.details: "The White Queen" is a riveting tale of three different, yet equally relentless women who will scheme, manipulate and seduce their way onto the English throne.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - The Poisoned Chalice
episodes.details: In the season one premiere, Rodrigo successfully bribes and intimidates his way into an election as Pope Alexander VI, making him the new leader of the Catholic Church.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - The Assassin
episodes.details: The new Pope elevates his children to high office, installing Juan as head of the papal armies, Cesare as a cardinal and Lucrezia as a potential wife for a political ally.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - The Moor
episodes.details: Rodrigo seeks funds through a profitable marriage for Lucrezia that will ally him with Milan. Micheletto is ordered to rid his patrons of the ongoing threat posed by Della Rovere.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Lucrezia's Wedding
episodes.details: Lucrezia's financially and politically motivated wedding to Milanese nobleman Giovanni Sforza is a disaster thanks to Juan's inappropriately bawdy play in his sister's honor, Cesare's brazen flirting with a married baroness, and the arrival of the Borgia children's illegitimate mother.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - The Borgias in Love
episodes.details: The abused Lucrezia has an affair with a handsome stable boy; Cesare strikes a bargain with Machiavelli to thwart Della Rovere's invasion scheme, and ensures the baroness Ursual becomes a widow.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - The French King
episodes.details: Della Rovere reaches France and strikes a bargain with its ruler to invade Italy and install him on the Papal throne in exchange for control of Naples. Rodrigo attempts to thwart the invasion through an alliance.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Death, on a Pale Horse
episodes.details: The invasion by King Charles of France and Della Rovere proceeds with victory seemingly inevitable as the French sack the city of Lucca and the Italian powers flee to their banner.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - The Art of War
episodes.details: The invaders capture a fleeing and pregnant Lucrezia as they march on Rome, but she charms King Charles and is allowed to persuade her brother Juan to withdraw his hopelessly outmatched defensive troops.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Nessuno (Nobody)
episodes.details: Abandoned by even his cardinals, Alexander meets King Charles with humility and saves his throne. Della Rovere despairs as Charles abandons him. Lucrezia safely gives birth to a son in a convent as the Borgias secure an annulment of her marriage and plot revenge on their enemies.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - The Borgia Bull
episodes.details: Pope Alexander VI takes a new lover and hosts a grand celebration; the rivalry between Cesare and Juan spills into the streets; Lucrezia tends to her newborn child; Della Rovere escapes assassination.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Paolo
episodes.details: The father of Lucrezia's child travels to Rome but suffers an unfortunate fate at the hands of Juan; the Pope's lovers take him in disguise on a tour of Rome's indigent.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - The Beautiful Deception
episodes.details: Lucrezia embarks on a hunger strike over her father's refusal to allow a Catholic burial for her lover; the French turn back toward Rome; Della Rovere slips back into the city.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Stray Dogs
episodes.details: Cesare recruits a band of mercenaries to seek revenge on the retreating French troops; the Pope forges more strategic alliances; Lucrezia joins Giulia's quest to aid Rome's poor.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - The Choice
episodes.details: Cesare deals with the cunning Sforzas decisively; Alexander travels to Florence in disguise to hear the fiery preacher Savonarola.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Day of Ashes
episodes.details: Alexander fasts after a lightning strike on St. Peter's Basilica; Cesare tries to prove his worth as a military commander; the Pope pressures Lucrezia to enter another political marriage.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - The Siege at Forli
episodes.details: Juan's triumph in Spain is short-lived; Lucrezia scuttles a scheme to marry her off to a rich merchant; Savonarola conducts the infamous Bonfire of the Vanities.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Truth and Lies
episodes.details: Back in Rome, Juan flaunts a wounded leg and spins a yarn about his valiant conduct at his army’s defeat at Forli. Lucrezia, Giulia and Vanozza discover that the improvements to an orphanage they demanded from the Cardinals have not been begun.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - World of Wonders
episodes.details: A new taster is recruited, and Antonello gets the job – Della Rovere’s assassin is ready to strike. In Florence, Cesare challenges Savonarola to a trial by fire.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - The Confession
episodes.details: Cesare, determined to destroy his legacy as well as his body, fakes a confession and Savonarola is burned as a heretic. Meanwhile, a new suitor for Lucrezia’s hand – Alfonso of Aragon – arrives in Rome.

episodes.title: Ep 301 - The Face of Death
episodes.details: As Pope Alexande fights for his life after being poisoned, the Cardinals jockey for position to take over the Papacy.

episodes.title: Ep 302 - The Purge
episodes.details: Now fully recovered, Alexander tasks Cardinal Sforza with instigating an “inquisition” among the Cardinals who were politicking against him when his life lay in the balance.

episodes.title: Ep 303 - Siblings
episodes.details: As the purged Cardinals are dismissed and stripped of their titles and wealth, one of them – Cardinal Versucci – angrily sets the Vatican Treasury ablaze after stealing a large sum.

episodes.title: Ep 304 - The Banquet of Chestnuts
episodes.details: Newly appointed Cardinal Farnese – promoted at the request of his sister Giulia – is placed in the Treasury and quickly discovers Versucci’s theft.

episodes.title: Ep 305 - The Wolf and the Lamb
episodes.details: Cesare’s diplomatic mission to France is a success: guided through the complexities of the French court by his old advisor Machiavelli; Cesare makes an ally of Archbishop d’Amboise.

episodes.title: Ep 306 - Relics
episodes.details: When Cesare lands in northern Italy with a French army, Alexander is furious at what he sees as a challenge to his authority, but reluctantly accedes to Cesare’s plan to destroy the Sforza dynasty, starting with Ludovico, Duke of Milan.

episodes.title: Ep 307 - Lucrezia's Gambit
episodes.details: Cesare burns Constanzo’s palace – and the Cardinal with it – in order to contain the plague, while Micheletto is love struck with the beautiful young Pascal.

episodes.title: Ep 308 - Tears of Blood
episodes.details: Catherina Sforza has a plan to frustrate Alexander’s lucrative festival. Meanwhile, Lucrezia senses a change in newly crowned Frederigo, and realizes that she is under constant watch from the royal guard.

episodes.title: Ep 309 - The Gunpowder Plot
episodes.details: Devastated by his betrayal by Pascal, Micheletto kills his lover and subsequently disappears. Devastated by the loss of his loyal lieutenant, Cesare races to Naples to rescue Lucrezia, only to learn she has already escaped her captors.

episodes.title: Ep 310 - The Prince
episodes.details: Alexander and Cesare are reconciled at last, and the Pope reveals that the Papal Armies have been strengthened and re-equipped with the money saved from the Crusade and the proceeds of the Jubilee.

series.title: The Borgias
series.details: Jeremy Irons stars in the saga of history's most infamous crime family.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - New Paths
episodes.details: During the Autumn of 1942, in the unrelenting deep ocean waters, U-boat Captain Ulrich Wrangel and his men are caught in battle with a US Frigate.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Secret Missions
episodes.details: Aboard U-612, the men are adjusting to their new lives and settling into their own roles within the crew.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Casualties
episodes.details: As U-612 completes the first part of their mission, the crew is reeling from Willy’s tragic death.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Doubts
episodes.details: Following the explosion at La Rochelle, the Mayor is ordered to make some harsh decisions under the watchful eye of Gluck and Forster and a dismayed Duval.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Loyalty
episodes.details: The crew welcomes the departure of Greenwood, but their new guest comes as a surprise.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Nick of Time
episodes.details: Trapped below the angry, ominous rumble of a destroyer, the outlook is bleak for the crew of U-612.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Damned
episodes.details: Details of the U-612 losing control and sending for help reaches the shore and Forster has the task of breaking the news to Simone.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Reckoning
episodes.details: As U-612 prepares to return home, they have the chance to reflect on the events that occurred underwater for the first time.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Exit Strategies
episodes.details: Renowned U-boat commander Johannes Von Reinhartz is assigned a crucial new mission. But this star of Germany’s Kriegsmarine is hiding an increasing disgust with the war – could this be his way out? Margot and Simone team up to help the Goldblatts escape La Rochelle. In New York, Hoffmann longs for one thing only: to get home and clear his name. But then he meets jazz singer Cassandra.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Uneasy Alliances
episodes.details: Ehrenberg’s revelation has severe consequences for Wrangel and the crew of U-612. But when Johannes’ plan emerges, Gluck knows only one man is capable of stopping him. In New York, shady lawyer Berger, who has promised to help Hoffmann, gets a chance to prove his value to the Führer. Meanwhile, in La Rochelle, Forster calls in help to find the Goldblatts, leaving Margot in a desperate situation

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Sabotage
episodes.details: Suspicions run high on U-822 as Frank tries to recruit more defectors. Close behind on U-612, Wrangel’s frustration builds as he attempts to lead an increasingly dysfunctional crew. Sam takes drastic measures to obtain vital information in New York, before making his intentions clear to Cassandra. Margot leads the Goldblatts out of La Rochelle - but are they heading toward safety or danger?

episodes.title: Ep 204 - The Die Is Cast
episodes.details: Johannes takes U-822 to the surface, inviting his crew for a swim in an attempt to get them on side. But the decision leaves them all in serious jeopardy. Under pressure following his deal with Berger and feeling alienated by those around him, Hoffmann grows closer to Cassandra. Margot finds a vital ally as Forster and his new deputy Anatole make their presence felt in St. Rémy.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Shoot to Kill
episodes.details: Keen to impress his superiors, Forster cracks down on Anatole’s wayward behaviour in St. Rémy, while Margot desperately tries to save Elias. In need of urgent repairs to U-822, Johannes reluctantly approaches a supply vessel. With his arch-rival finally in sight, Wrangel pushes U-612 to the limit, and Johannes makes a decision that splits his crew apart.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Decision Time
episodes.details: Both Johannes and Wrangel try to bring their crews into line. At the jazz club in New York, Cassandra only has eyes for Hoffmann - but his situation is becoming ever more perilous as an infuriated Sam delivers an ultimatum and Berger receives shocking instructions from Germany. With the captured Jews in La Rochelle facing imminent transportation to Poland, Margot and Camille formulate a plan.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - Head to Head
episodes.details: Wrangel’s pursuit of Johannes culminates in a dramatic showdown out in the Atlantic. Amid the battle, the saboteurs on U-822 seek a way out. Margot is appalled by a shocking betrayal, while Forster instructs Anatole to use whatever means necessary to extract information. Hoffmann, injured during his tussle with Berger, faces up to the truth as he asks Cassandra to leave the city with him.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - The Other Side
episodes.details: A U-boat heads toward the US shoreline. On land, Hoffmann waits in his motel room. He has lost a lot of blood but, if he is to make it home, he must hang on until the rendezvous time. In La Rochelle, Duval has disappeared, and Margot fears the worst. With the final prisoners being loaded onto the train, the Resistance cell members decide to put their plan into action.

series.title: Das Boot
series.details: During 1942, in occupied France, U-612 is now ready for its maiden voyage, preparing to head into the increasingly brutal warfare with its young crewmen and the new captain, Klaus Hoffmann.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Top Five Heartbreaks
episodes.details: Record store owner Rob Brooks recounts her Top Five Heartbreaks.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Track 2
episodes.details: At a concert, Rob meets musician Liam, who might be a welcome diversion.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - What Fucking Lily Girl?
episodes.details: Rob obsesses over news from Cameron and realizes she’s stuck in a pattern.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Good Luck And Goodbye
episodes.details: Rob tracks down her Top Five Heartbreaks.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Uptown
episodes.details: Rob takes her one-nightstand Clyde on an adventure in Manhattan.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Weird…but Warm
episodes.details: Rob is caught between dating a musician and what Clyde is offering.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Me Time
episodes.details: Rob goes to Cameron’s “Last Hurrah” party.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Ballad Of The Lonesome Loser
episodes.details: It’s Simon’s turn to recount his All-Time Top Five Most Memorable Heartbreaks. We follow Simon back through the good and bad of his dating life since he came out, all of which might explain why he is so nervous around his Barista crush, and how he became so jaded about love. But is he able to get the closure he needs to move on?

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Fun Rob
episodes.details: We learn what really caused Mac and Rob’s relationship to fail.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - The Other Side Of The Rock
episodes.details: Rob’s run in with Mac has a surprising effect on her love life.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: A reimagining of both Nick Hornby’s novel and the 2000 hit romantic comedy, “High Fidelity” centers on Rob, (Zoë Kravtiz) a record store owner who revisits past relationships through music and pop culture.

series.title: High Fidelity
series.details: A reimagining of Nick Hornby’s 1995 novel, “High Fidelity” centers on Rob, a female record store owner who revisits past relationships through music and pop culture.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Bulling Through
episodes.details: Claire leaves behind her troubled past and gains entry into New York City's prestigious American Ballet Company.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Cannon Fodder
episodes.details: Claire attempts to sever ties with her brother once and for all in order to embrace the city and her new life, but unwanted male attention is forced upon her at every turn.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Reconnaissance
episodes.details: In the wake of the Board Chairman's sudden departure as a result of a disastrous evening with Claire, Paul and Jessica are left scrambling to pick up the pieces.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Boogie Dark
episodes.details: To Bryan's dismay, Claire tries to expunge him from her New York City life. At the company Claire is challenged by the emotional vulnerability of Toni's choreography, sending her deeper into the strip club world.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - M.I.A.
episodes.details: Claire and Kiira are pitted against each other and vie to become the face of the ABC season, while Trey attempts to remedy the rift between Paul and Ross, or so it appears.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - F.U.B.A.R
episodes.details: Thanksgiving arrives, and with it Paul's neuroses, fraying the dancers' nerves. He punishes the company for their simple desire to go home for the holidays and drives them to exhaustion. Claire ventures home.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Full Dress
episodes.details: With opening night of the season fast approaching, Paul faces setbacks that he blames on Toni. Paul vents his rage on Claire and wins the argument with alarming news.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Scorched Earth
episodes.details: Kiira's decision throws the company into disarray on the precipice of opening night. Daphne finds herself in the spotlight. At the pre-show gala, worlds collide as Paul meets an unlikely patron, thanks to Jessica.

series.title: Flesh And Bone
series.details: This dark and gritty series follows young dancer, Claire, as she joins a prestigious New York City ballet company, and encounters the glamour and dysfunction of the ballet world.

episodes.title: It's Called Hazing;Look It Up
episodes.details: Three incoming freshmen attending college football powerhouse Blue Mountain State University must quickly adapt to college life while juggling football, girls and nonstop hazing.

episodes.title: Craig Loses His Promise Ring in a Stripper
episodes.details: The team throws Craig a promise ring bachelor party, and the next morning he notices his ring is gone.

episodes.title: Pocket Pussy
episodes.details: Thad brags that he doesn’t need to get laid because of his Pocket Pussy. One of the players steals Thad’s PP and the team all take turns using it, not knowing that it is carrying syphilis.

episodes.title: Rivalry Weekend
episodes.details: Billy the goat mascot and Sammy are kidnapped by a rival school.

episodes.title: There's Only One Second Best
episodes.details: After too much slacking, Alex gets demoted to third string. He is ecstatic at first, but then realizes that the third stringers are a bunch of freaks.

episodes.title: The Drug Olympics
episodes.details: After losing two games in a row, the team participates in a Drug Olympics to exorcise their demons.

episodes.title: The Legend of Golden Arm
episodes.details: Recruitment week starts at BMS, and Alex tries to get the #1 quarterback recruit, Golden Arm, to commit to BMS so Alex won’t ever have to start.

episodes.title: LAX
episodes.details: Alex unknowingly breaks a years-long truce between the football team and lacrosse team by hooking up with a lacrosse player’s girlfriend, and a war ensues.

episodes.title: Midterms
episodes.details: Alex, Thad and some other players learn that they are failing and have to pass an upcoming test so they don’t lose their eligibility.

episodes.title: Marathon Monday
episodes.details: Sammy, Alex and Craig participate (along with the rest of the school) in the Marathon Monday tradition of drinking for a full 24 hours.

episodes.title: Ransom
episodes.details: Alex gets fan mail from a guy who wants Alex to date his daughter.

episodes.title: Piss Test
episodes.details: The team finds out that they have to be drug tested, so they try to stay sober for three days but can’t function normally.

episodes.title: Bowl Game
episodes.details: The team gets a bowl bid and heads to Louisiana for the game. Thad warns everyone of the tactics that the other team may use to sabotage BMS, including poisoning their food and sending their cheerleaders to seduce them.

episodes.title: Controversy
episodes.details: In response to last season's dismal, Coach Daniels brings in a new star QB who turns out to be a loose cannon, taking Alex on an increasingly dangerous adventure. Sammy's sister, Mary Jo, arrives at BMS and joins the cheerleading squad after some hazing.

episodes.title: The Fingering
episodes.details: After being sodomized in a fumble pile during practice, Thad sets off on an investigation into who violated him, with each teammate's version of the story conflicting with the next.

episodes.title: Born Again
episodes.details: The team becomes celibate in order to boost their performance on the field, but it backfires when Mary Jo, out of frustration, stirs them into a frenzy.

episodes.title: Pay for Play
episodes.details: The team begins accepting increasingly ostentatious gifts from agents, while Coach Daniels fends off pressure to play the annoying, Rudy-like son of a local booster.

episodes.title: Pregnant
episodes.details: Alex, Thad, and Radon receive a message from an unknown woman. Sammy must decide between staying with a girl out of his league at a price or go back to being single while Coach Daniels attempts to rekindle his relationship with his son.

episodes.title: Nerds
episodes.details: The campus nerds revolt, leaving the jocks unable to function academically and causing an identity crisis in Sammy.

episodes.title: Debra
episodes.details: Alex unwittingly sleeps with Coach Daniels' ex-wife and gets used as a pawn in their bitter relationship, while Sammy struggles to end Mary Jo's new fascination with a guitar-toting heartthrob.

episodes.title: Vision Quest
episodes.details: After the campus is vacated, Thad goes on a vision quest to help him decide between staying at BMS next year and going pro.

episodes.title: The Badger
episodes.details: During rivalry weekend, Overland's mascot gets loose, and Alex and Thad set out to find it so Alex can tailgate and Thad can eat its balls.

episodes.title: Hockey
episodes.details: Alex decides that becoming the backup goalie for BMS' hockey team is the perfect way to avoid his conditioning obligations and Radon quickly follows suit. Meanwhile, Mary Jo becomes Thad's personal cheerleader.

episodes.title: Drunk Tank
episodes.details: Alex and his teammates end up in the local drunk tank, where they must stay until they blow a .06 on the breathalyzer. Sammy attempts to get drunk enough to join them so he can break them out from the inside, a la Prison Break.

episodes.title: Trap Game
episodes.details: The team is one game away from an undefeated season when Radon is tackled in practice by Thad creating a confidence struggle that takes him out of the game. Daniels suffers a heart attack as the pressure of a potential perfect season in jeopardy mounts.

episodes.title: Riot
episodes.details: When a riot breaks out on campus after the team goes undefeated, Alex and the players must cross the frenzied campus to the Goat House to save Sammy from being torn apart by rabid fans.

episodes.title: Episode 301
episodes.details: While Alex adjusts to becoming the starting quarterback and team captain, Thad awaits word on his future with the team after his drug related arrest following BMS' loss in last season's championship game.

episodes.title: Dic Pics
episodes.details: Alex and Thad deal with the ramifications of a pornographic photo that Thad sent from Alex's phone after it makes its way around campus. Meanwhile, Harmon debates how he will respond to some suggestive photos that Daniels and Debra inadvertently sent him.

episodes.title: Thad's Back
episodes.details: Alex takes on Thad's persona as he struggles to pull Thad out of a post-suspension slump while Sammy meets the perfect girl only to realize he will soon lose her.

episodes.title: The Peak
episodes.details: Alex and Sammy have a falling out when Alex plays the best game in his career and accepts it as the peak of his life. Meanwhile, Daniels and Jon Jon have mixed feelings about a job offer that Jon Jon received.

episodes.title: Training Day
episodes.details: Thad offers to teach Alex what it is to be a local celebrity, but he has ulterior motives. Mary Jo goes to extreme lengths to impress a Coach Daniels' wife, who herself is trying to revive her sex life with her husband.

episodes.title: Blackout
episodes.details: A blackout on campus has postponed the following day's game against Buckingham. Alex uses it as an opportunity to settle the score with one of Buckingham's cheerleaders who humiliated him in high school.

episodes.title: Superstition
episodes.details: When his pre-game rituals start to betray his game-time performance, Harmon goes on a quest to find new mystical superstitions that will restore his kicking abilities. orth.

episodes.title: Fun Facts
episodes.details: As Coach Daniels prepares to be inducted into the College Hall of Fame, Thad comes to terms with some troubling secrets from Daniels' past while Alex connects with Marty on a new level.

episodes.title: The C-Word
episodes.details: Thad's behavior takes a turn for the worse after he suffers a concussion making it difficult for Daniels to hide the injury from both Gilday and, the NCAA. Meanwhile, Sammy, trapped in the Goat House basement, reevaluates his masturbation habits.

episodes.title: One Week
episodes.details: One Week, a Hard Knocks-esque television series, is at BMS following the team and its coaches both on and off the field. While documenting the franchise's struggle to return to its former glory, highlights the growing feud between Gilday and Alex.

episodes.title: Death Penalty
episodes.details: BMS rejoices when they find they will be playing Blackwell for the Bowl Championship. The celebration is cut short however when the NCAA comes at them with 3 years of dirt on the team - enough to bring the axe down on the football program.

episodes.title: The Corn Field, Part I
episodes.details: BMS loses the Bowl Game to Blackwell when their starters are benched from play due to breaking NCAA rules. Feeling robbed, the BMS starters challenge the Blackwell starters to an unofficial Bowl Game in a local corn field.

episodes.title: The Corn Field, Part II
episodes.details: The battle continues as the BMS and Blackwell teams fight it out on the corn field for bragging rights as to who the real champion is.

series.title: Blue Mountain State
series.details: At Blue Mountain State, the rowdiest college campus in the nation, the athletes learn the extreme highs—and lows—of being one of the chosen few who are worshiped around campus.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 1
episodes.details: Antoine believes he’s discovered that his dead sister is actually alive and fighting against ISIS.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 2
episodes.details: Antoine is interrogated. A volunteer recognizes Anna from a picture, claiming she’s in Syria.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 3
episodes.details: Antoine joins a mission and is attacked by ISIS troops. The British Jihadists aren’t all they seem.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 4
episodes.details: ISIS assaults the village where Antoine and Sarya are. Antoine meets Shamaran and gets a shock.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 5
episodes.details: After a shocking discovery, Antoine decides to leave Syria. Nasser realizes he’s been manipulated.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 6
episodes.details: Anna’s story during her journey and involvement in the ISIS crisis is revealed—from her separation from Antoine and her parents to starting her lonely job in Cairo, and her the eventual manipulation she suffers by Stanley. Things take a worse turn when the Mossad assassinates Iranian nuclear scientists and Anna is exfiltrated by Stanley. As a result, Anna decides to take drastic measures.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Episode 7
episodes.details: Antoine cannot leave and volunteers to fight, only to be confronted by a face from his past.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Episode 8
episodes.details: Sarya is injured and must be transferred to a Western hospital. Paul discovers Nasser’s betrayal.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: Antoine's sister has been declared dead for several years, but he is convinced she is alive. He travels to Syria, where female Kurdish fighters battle ISIS.

series.title: No Man's Land
series.details: Antoine's sister has been declared dead for several years, but he is convinced she is alive. He travels to Syria, where female Kurdish fighters battle ISIS.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.details: Circumstances force estranged sisters Lyn and Emma to return to their old neighborhood where they are confronted by their past and surprised by family revelations.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.details: Eddy struggles to connect with the two sisters as Lyn falls into old neighborhood patterns and Emma searches for a way out.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.details: Emma tries to get a handle on the family business while Lyn creates chaos for them. Eddy withdraws into herself as she mourns Vidalia, and Mari’s weakness is revealed.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.details: Lyn escapes the Eastside while market research in the neighborhood leads Emma to open an old wound. Mari is publicly humiliated by someone she trusted.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.details: Still wound up from her encounter with Cruz, Emma struggles to find relief. Luckily, Lyn shows up for her when she needs it most. Mari refuses to be a victim and confronts Tlaloc.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.details: Lyn finally realizes she’s messing up Johnny’s life, and Emma learns the true value of the bar, but is it too late for Eddy?

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.details: The bar prepares to host a fundraiser for Eddy's hospital expenses while Emma and Lyn learn the truth behind Vida and Eddy's marriage. Mari questions her life, and an unexpected event in the building leaves everyone stunned.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.details: The Vigilantes protest a local real estate agent whom Emma considers using to advertise an available unit in the building, which neighborhood handyman Baco agrees to repair. Lyn faces her personal demons while Mari has an unexpected crossing with Tlaloc.

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.details: Emma accompanies Cruz to an event where Emma meets a charming stranger. Emma gives Mari an opportunity while Lyn meets local councilman Rudy at the gym before hosting the bar's first Lotería night.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.details: Emma monitors Baco's progress with the building repairs while Lyn is forced to confront her past. Mari settles into her new job, and Nico makes a surprise visit to the bar.

episodes.title: Episode 11
episodes.details: The bar hosts a yard sale. Marcos moves in as a new tenant. Lyn's friendship with Rudy builds as Nelson becomes a threat to the bar.

episodes.title: Episode 12
episodes.details: Lyn is preparing for Music Night at the bar when a relic she had discovered at Don Fulgencio's apartment reveals more information about Vida. Mari questions her future. Nico discovers theft at the bar as Emma discovers the difficult truth about Lyn.

episodes.title: Episode 13
episodes.details: Mari's worlds collide, and Lyn and Marcos devise a plan to get back at Nelson. Emma considers alternative sources of income for the bar.

episodes.title: Episode 14
episodes.details: Emma and Nico head to an after-party to check out a new musical act, and Lyn and Marcos will not be left out. Lyn and Emma's conflict comes to a head.

episodes.title: Episode 15
episodes.details: Nico's past comes back to haunt her. Lyn has a nice—and short—day with Johnny. Rocky convinces Eddy to get a handle on her situation. Emma’s frustrations build.

episodes.title: Episode 16
episodes.details: In the season finale, Lyn rises to the occasion, while Emma remains in her funk. Mari's loyalties are conflicted. Eddy makes a discovery about Vida's past. The sisters unexpectedly stand united.

episodes.title: Episode 17
episodes.details: Emma and Lyn take their romantic relationships to new heights, and a looming figure from the sisters’ past returns.

episodes.title: Episode 18
episodes.details: Emma and Nico hit a rough patch as Lyn and Mari deal, in their own particular ways, with their daddy issues.

episodes.title: Episode 19
episodes.details: Eddy returns to the bar, Emma tries to move on, and Lyn struggles to be the perfect girlfriend, daughter and sister.

episodes.title: Episode 20
episodes.details: Lyn throws Marcos an epic, Vida-style, double-30 Queerceañera, and Emma goes on a psychedelic journey of self-exploration.

episodes.title: Episode 21
episodes.details: Lyn is MIA, playing politician’s wife, as Emma is left to run Drag King Night at the bar on her own.

episodes.title: Episode 22
episodes.details: With the weight of their mother’s legacy on their shoulders, the sisters are forced to decide whether they will ultimately stay together or go their separate ways.

episodes.title: Ep 3001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: “Vida” returns with Hernandez sisters Emma and Lyn riding on the heels of success. The bar is booming, and their love lives are flourishing — until they discover a long-buried family secret. Can they continue together as a family or should each move on alone?

series.title: Vida
series.details: "Vida" is a half-hour drama series focusing on two Mexican-American sisters from the Eastside of Los Angeles who couldn't be more different or distanced from each other. Circumstances force them to return to their old neighborhood, where they are confronted by the past and surprising truth about their mother's identity.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Centbomb
episodes.details: Security guard Richard Jewell saves hundreds of lives when he discovers a bomb at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics. But Jewell quickly becomes the focus of FBI investigators who suspect his guilt.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Unabubba
episodes.details: FBI agents investigate Jewell as a "hero-bomber" and leak his name to the press, kicking off an international trial-by-media. Meanwhile, ATF agents raise doubts as bombings continue.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Bombingham
episodes.details: While Richard Jewell fights back against the FBI and the media, ATF Agent Embry investigates a serial bomber and discovers a crucial link to the Olympic bomb.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Run Rudolph Run
episodes.details: The FBI identifies serial bomber Eric Rudolph and gives chase, but Rudolph escapes into the wilderness. Richard Jewell proves his innocence and decides to appeal to the press for help.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Land of the Noonday Sun
episodes.details: The FBI search for Rudolph spins out of control as antigovernment locals and Rudolph's family push back. Meanwhile, Richard confronts inner demons and calls a dramatic press conference.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - Army of God
episodes.details: Local militias rally around Eric Rudolph and attack the FBI. The FBI militarizes, and escalates to the brink of war. Meanwhile, Embry investigates and learns that Eric is not who he seems.

episodes.title: Ep 207 - Eric
episodes.details: Richard Jewell appears on 60 MINUTES and is dramatically vindicated on national TV. Meanwhile, Eric Rudolph manipulates locals, militia, and FBI alike as he plans a major counterattack.

episodes.title: Ep 208 - Join or Die
episodes.details: FBI agent Brennan realizes he needs to change course radically to catch Rudolph, and allies with Embry to do so. Meanwhile, the journalist who broke the Jewell story confronts her wrongdoing.

episodes.title: Ep 209 - Don't Tread on Me
episodes.details: FBI agent Brennan appeals to the militia leader with the truth about Eric, and a call for unity and moral courage. The militiamen join forces with the FBI to hunt Eric Rudolph down.

episodes.title: Ep 210 - Open Season
episodes.details: Eric Rudolph, starving and bereft of allies, is captured dumpster-diving. He pleads guilty to the Olympic Bombing and three others, finally proving Richard Jewell's innocence to the world.

series.title: Manhunt: Deadly Games
series.details: After a deadly terrorist attack at the 1996 Olympic Games, FBI agents hunt for an elusive serial bomber, while a wrongly-accused innocent man fights to clear his name.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 1
episodes.details: When Finn Wallace is assassinated, his son Sean puts a stop to all criminal business in London until he finds out who killed him. Meanwhile unknown Wallace henchman Elliot rises through the ranks when he recovers Finn’s missing driver.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 2
episodes.details: The taps are off for all gangs in London except Asif Afridi, so frustrated Kurdish gang leader Lale decides to hit a shipment of his cows that are being used to smuggle heroin. Elliot makes a connection with a key member of the Dumani family.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 3
episodes.details: Lale is asked to make an impossible decision. Will she choose her homeland or her family? Sean enacts a dangerous plan. Elliot takes on a new foe. Ed is confronted with shocking evidence of Finn’s deal with Luan.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 4
episodes.details: Elliot’s loyalty is tested by an increasingly suspicious Ed Dumani. Sean throws a dinner in an attempt to unite the two families. Alexander is asked to meet with some of Finn’s old contacts.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 5
episodes.details: Hidden safely away in a farmhouse in the middle of nowhere, Darren wrestles with the chaos he has unleashed. But when a mysterious group of mercenaries set their sights upon him, will Kinney be able to get there in time to prevent bloodshed?

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 6
episodes.details: With the Wallaces retreating to a safehouse, Marian puts the pressure on Sean to uncover Finn’s killer – and Sean wrestles with who he has become. Meanwhile, Elliot’s recuperation is interrupted by a new danger.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Episode 7
episodes.details: The truth about Finn’s murder is revealed - and The Wallaces and The Dumanis will never be the same again. Meanwhile, Luan is forced to confront the deadly consequences of his actions. Elliot provides Vicky with enough information to make her move.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Episode 8
episodes.details: With the stakes higher than ever, the Wallaces are forced to go into hiding. Luan risks his life to rid himself of Mosi. Floriana seizes an opportunity. Elliot attempts to save the life of a colleague.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Episode 9
episodes.details: Old scores are settled. New alliances are forged. Lives are lost. Elliot is forced to make a choice that will define his entire future. And Sean makes a discovery about a traitor who has been in his midst all along.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: When the head of a criminal organisation is assassinated, the sudden power vacuum his death creates threatens the fragile peace between the intricate web of gangs operating on the streets of London.

series.title: Gangs of London
series.details: When the head of a criminal organisation is assassinated, the sudden power vacuum his death creates threatens the fragile peace between the intricate web of gangs operating on the streets of London.

episodes.title: Who's Afraid of Mr. Wolf: Part 1
episodes.details: After a botched bank robbery attempt results in a hostage standoff, Captain Horst Cali and his team helm negotiations.

episodes.title: Who's Afraid of Mr. Wolf: Part 2
episodes.details: Horst demands a teenage boy's release, cutting the electricity in the bank until he's freed.

episodes.title: No Meringue
episodes.details: Rebuked for giving Mr. Wolf the upper hand, Captain Horst Cali is replaced by a FBI negotiator and placed on the sidelines.

episodes.title: Pro Patria
episodes.details: One of the hostages is accidentally shot, forcing Horst to reevaluate his strategy and his trust in Wolf.

episodes.title: Visiting Hours
episodes.details: Wolf and Horst each get a surprise visit from a loved one.

episodes.title: The Great Ape Escape
episodes.details: After implementing a wire transfer from the bank, Wolf sets out to enact Deke's extraction plan. Suspicious of Wolf's platoon-mate Leon, Horst continues to probe and makes a dramatic discovery.

episodes.title: Episode 107
episodes.details: After one of Wolf's men is compromised, Rabbit takes advantage of Wolf's vulnerability and takes over operations.

episodes.title: The Devil's Zoo: Part 2
episodes.details: After the hostages emerge safely from what seems like a successful breach, Horst and the hostage takers are nowhere to be found.

series.title: The Kill Point
series.details: This testosterone-fueled drama finds a group of hardened war veterans in a botched bank heist facing off against a hostage negotiator who refuses to back down.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Part 1
episodes.details: Set in 1939 while Europe teeters on the brink of war, this two-part Lifetime Original Movie follows ten strangers with dubious pasts who are lured to Soldier Island, an isolated rock near the Devon coast in southern England.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Part 2
episodes.details: With the guests on Soldier Island continuing to die, one by one, according to the rules of the nursery rhyme "Ten Little Soldier Boys," the surviving guests are in danger of losing their minds.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Part 3
episodes.details: Five of the original ten are left. Tempers fray as night falls and Judge Wargrave explains the reason for his being brought to the island. Next day there is another soldier missing and hysteria and suspicion take hold, relieved by drunken partying.

series.title: And Then There Were None
series.details: Based on the best-selling crime novel of all time by Agatha Christie. England, 1939. Eight strangers are lured to an isolated island off the Devon coast, where it soon becomes clear that they?ve been summoned to atone for their past crimes.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 101
episodes.details: Dr. Duntsch seems to be a brilliant neurosurgeon. Instead, he leaves a trail of maimed and dying patients.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 102
episodes.details: Duntsch's victim count continues to grow during three horrific days at a Dallas hospital.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 103
episodes.details: After the system fails to protect patients, doctors fight to remove Dr. Duntsch from medicine.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 104
episodes.details: While his private life spirals, Duntsch must face his accusers in an unprecedented landmark case.

series.title: Dr. Death: The Undoctored Story
series.details: "Dr. Death: The Undoctored Story" is the first docuseries about Dr. Christopher Duntsch, the notorious neurosurgeon whose shocking story has captivated the world.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - The Name of the Rose 101
episodes.details: Adso, a young soldier and son of a German general befriends William of Baskerville, a learned and intelligent English Franciscan friar.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - The Name of the Rose 102
episodes.details: With the Pope’s delegation on their way to the Abbey, William and Adso investigate the mysterious deaths and conclude they are the work of a serial killer.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - The Name of the Rose 103
episodes.details: William and Adso manage to escape the library and begin to decipher Venantius’ message, suspecting a connection to Dolcino.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - The Name of the Rose 104
episodes.details: Everyone’s anxiety increases as they search for the missing Berengar. Remigio shares his suspicions of Benno with William, claiming a connection between him and Berengar and Venantius.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - The Name of the Rose 105
episodes.details: With both parties finally present at the monastery, the meeting is ready to commence. William and Adso sneak into the library once again.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - The Name of the Rose 106
episodes.details: The second session of the summit is about to begin when another corpse is found.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - The Name of the Rose 107
episodes.details: After an intense witch-hunt and trial, Bernard is convinced he has found the killer. However, the death of another monk may prove him wrong.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - The Name of the Rose 108
episodes.details: With the murderer still on the loose and the summit coming to a close, William and Adso are in a race against time to find the real culprit.

series.title: The Name of the Rose
series.details: In 1327, a brilliant English Franciscan friar, William of Baskerville, is sent by the Holy Roman Emperor to an isolated abbey in the North of Italy for a dramatic, pivotal summit.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - The Red Serpent
episodes.details: A Thracian warrior, enlisted by the Romans to fight, has his destiny sealed by an act of rebellious violence. As punishment he faces death by being forced to fight in the gladiatorial arena.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Sacramentum Gladiatorum
episodes.details: Enslaved in gladiatorial school, the newly christened Spartacus must try to suppress his desire for vengeance when his new master promises to reunite him with his wife.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Legends
episodes.details: Though Spartacus proved himself during training and now wears the attire of a gladiator, his coarse attitude and relentless quest to see his wife isolates him from his fellow gladiators and Doctore.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - The Thing In The Pit
episodes.details: Having performed shamefully in the arena against Crixus, Spartacus is forced to fight in the Pits. Batiatus, determined to profit from Spartacus, may be at risk if his debts aren't repaid.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Shadow Games
episodes.details: Batiatus is presented with a gladiatorial opportunity of a lifetime. Spartacus and Crixus must overcome their mutual hostility to fight as a team against a legendary and unbeaten opponent.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Delicate Things
episodes.details: With the glory and riches reaped by Spartacus' victory in the arena, it appears that his long-desired reward will be granted when Batiatus informs him that he will be reunited with his wife.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Great And Unfortunate Things
episodes.details: Overcome by the pressure of Batiatus' control, Spartacus must make a choice: Leave his past behind and assume the mantle of a champion gladiator, or die.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Mark Of The Brotherhood
episodes.details: Batiatus purchases a fresh lot of slaves during an auction to be trained as gladiators and ponders the idea of selling Crixus.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Whore
episodes.details: Batiatus breaks the news that Spartacus is to service the richest woman in Rome.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - Party Favors
episodes.details: Spartacus and Crixus are set up to fight in an exhibition match for Numerius' birthday, but Crixus is intent on blood.

episodes.title: Ep 111 - Old Wounds
episodes.details: Spartacus hovers on the brink. Meanwhile, Batiatus plots revenge against his enemies.

episodes.title: Ep 112 - Revelations
episodes.details: Lucretia and Batiatus await the arrival of Glaber with the intentions to receive his patronage, while Spartacus focuses his attention on his plan for revenge.

episodes.title: Ep 113 - Kill Them All
episodes.details: Spartacus' fury culminates in the stunning season finale.

episodes.title: Past Transgressions
episodes.details: A younger Batiatus finds himself newly in control of his father's gladiator school. He uses his most skilled fighter to win favor with a cunning nobleman behind the building of the new arena.

episodes.title: Missio
episodes.details: Batiatus conjures up a devious plan and enlists Lucretia, Gaia and a clutch of gladiator recruits to see it through. Oenomaus longs to reclaim the top gladiator rank, but new challenges cross his path.

episodes.title: Paterfamilias
episodes.details: Just as his fortunes are on the rise, his future clear before him, Batiatus is stunned by the return of his father which puts his attempts to gain rank by exploiting those above his class at risk.

episodes.title: Beneath The Mask
episodes.details: The House of Batiatus is caught in the power struggle between the younger and elder Batiatus. Lucretia reluctantly agrees to her husband's risky plan. Gannicus finds himself on unstable ground.

episodes.title: Reckoning
episodes.details: Batiatus' father announces a tournament to determine the worth of the men that make up his stable of gladiators. Crixus, dedicated to proving himself, is drawn into the power play within the house.

episodes.title: The Bitter End
episodes.details: Batiatus seeks vengeance for all that has befallen him and recruits his gladiators and Solonius to the cause. The opening of the new arena arrives, promising a spectacle of combat and blood.

episodes.title: Fugitivus
episodes.details: Spartacus discovers the grave responsibilities and costs involved in his new role as a leader of freed slaves. Claudius Glaber's arrival in Capua forces Spartacus to keep his rebellious band intact.

episodes.title: A Place In This World
episodes.details: Spartacus and his men liberate a Roman villa, but its slaves are wary. Oenomaus throws himself into the brutal Pits, and Glaber supports Lucretia's prophecies, despite Ilithyia's protests.

episodes.title: The Greater Good
episodes.details: Spartacus must navigate a divide that opens up among the gladiators after news of Naevia's fate. Lucretia reveals a long-held secret to gain information, and an attack puts the rebels at risk.

episodes.title: Empty Hands
episodes.details: Spartacus leads survivors through the woods, but Crixus gets separated and returns to a place of past suffering. Lucretia pries into Ilithyia's affairs, seeking influence with a powerful Roman.

episodes.title: Libertus
episodes.details: Spartacus leads a bold mission to free Crixus from Roman captivity, but a storied gladiator from the House of Batiatus complicates matters. Ilithyia's scheming puts her marriage to Glaber at risk.

episodes.title: Chosen Path
episodes.details: Spartacus urges his restless rebels to train for the defense of their new sanctuary. Lucretia and Ilithyia seek comfort from each other, while Glaber's forces swell with some deadly new recruits.

episodes.title: Sacramentum
episodes.details: Spartacus and his rebels try to increase their numbers by freeing fighters enslaved in foreign wars. Lucretia seeks to recruit one of her husband's former gladiators to outmaneuver powerful Romans.

episodes.title: Balance
episodes.details: Spartacus gets a chance for vengeance when a prominent Roman is captured, but will he satisfy desire at the cost of the greater good? The intrigue amongst Glaber and the women surrounding him heats up.

episodes.title: Monsters
episodes.details: Spartacus must convince his people to unite against the imminent Roman assault. Lucretia struggles to be free from the commands of men who threaten her fate, and Glaber's ruthlessness has consequences.

episodes.title: Wrath Of The Gods
episodes.details: Dwindling supplies and a superior Roman enemy brings the rebellion to its knees. Spartacus must restore hope to his people, as they careen towards their final confrontation with Glaber's army.

episodes.title: Enemies Of Rome
episodes.details: Spartacus continues to assemble a formidable army and outwit Rome's finest commanders. The desperate powers of Rome are forced to turn to the wealthy and ambitious Marcus Crassus to aid in the campaign against the rebellion.

episodes.title: Wolves At The Gate
episodes.details: Spartacus leads a daring assault to provide food and shelter for his people. Crassus builds a fearsome army and receives an unexpected visitor.

episodes.title: Men Of Honor
episodes.details: Spartacus considers striking a deal with a band of marauders to ensure his people stay supplied and fed. Crassus' son Tiberius makes a bold and fateful decision.

episodes.title: Decimation
episodes.details: The possible infiltration of a Roman spy causes tension to mount between Spartacus and the men under his command. Crassus resurrects a long abandoned form of Roman punishment to teach his soldiers a brutal lesson.

episodes.title: Blood Brothers
episodes.details: Spartacus puts a plan in motion to weaken Crassus' forces and gain the upper hand. Betrayal threatens to foil the plan.

episodes.title: Spoils Of War
episodes.details: As Crassus leads an onslaught against the rebel-occupied city, Gannicus finds himself trapped behind enemy lines. Tiberius is tasked by Crassus to hold a celebration in honor of a man he despises.

episodes.title: Mors Indecepta
episodes.details: Their forces pinned in on a snowbound, impassable ridge, Spartacus and Crixus come into conflict over the method of escape. Crassus discovers it increasingly difficult to control the actions of those closest to him.

episodes.title: Separate Paths
episodes.details: Spartacus and the rebels arrive at a crossroads. With the relentless Crassus driving his men hard in the pursuit of Spartacus, the conflict between Tiberius and Caesar escalates.

episodes.title: The Dead And The Dying
episodes.details: Crassus learns that a fellow prominent Roman is attempting to steal the glory of defeating Spartacus he feels is rightfully his. Spartacus aims to secure a bargaining chip he can use against the Romans and celebrates the memory of a fallen brother.

episodes.title: Victory
episodes.details: Spartacus and his outnumbered rebels make one last attempt to win freedom in an epic final battle against the Romans led by Marcus Crassus.

series.title: Spartacus
series.details: Betrayed by the Romans. Forced into slavery. Reborn as a Gladiator. Torn from his homeland and the woman he loves, Spartacus is condemned to the brutal world of the arena where blood and death are primetime entertainment.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Shell
episodes.details: Julien is searching for missing sex worker Natalie Rose. He meets Edward, Natalie’s uncle, and the two men delve into the criminal underworld of Amsterdam’s red light district.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Measure of a Man
episodes.details: Natalie reveals the full shocking truth about Edward and Julien has to tread carefully. When tragedy strikes Julien becomes determined to uncover Edward’s true motives.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - For Blood
episodes.details: Julien’s confronts Edward and has to take drastic action to protect his family. A personal bombshell however forces Julien to face some secrets from his own past.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Vertrouwen
episodes.details: Julien goes in pursuit of the money whilst Genevieve coerces Edward to meet Constantin. However, Edward makes a reckless move that puts the entire case in jeopardy.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Lucy
episodes.details: The hunt is on for Edward who has fled to England with the money. Meanwhile Julien and Genevieve plot an audacious move to try and turn Constantin and take down the Brigada.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Into the Sand
episodes.details: As Julien and Genevieve outmanoeuvre Constantin the Brigada make their own move and as Julien uncovers their inside source things lead to a dramatic conclusion.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Baptiste 201
episodes.details: Julien Baptiste rushes to Hungary to find the British Ambassador’s family.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Baptiste 202
episodes.details: Julien and Zsofia track down the tattooed man but he gives little away. Things escalate when the police receive a hostage video, and Emma takes drastic action for her family.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Baptiste 203
episodes.details: As Julien and Zsofia investigate Far Right politician Kamilla Agoston, Emma finds a lead on Alex’s computer that takes her and Julien to a shocking and bloody discovery.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - Baptiste 204
episodes.details: With Alex dead Emma’s only hope is to find her other son Will. And when Julien and Zsofia look to Kamilla and her husband, a new lead is uncovered and a dramatic discovery is made.

episodes.title: Ep 2001 - S2 Trailer
episodes.details: Get ready for Baptiste season 2. Season Premiere January 2

series.title: Baptiste
series.details: The mercurial detective, Julien Baptiste, on holiday in Amsterdam with his wife, assists in an investigation for his former girlfriend, the Amsterdam Chief of Police.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Perpetratin'
episodes.details: Autumn Night, a mysterious beauty with a harrowing past, washes up on the shores of the Pynk — Mississippi’s hottest “shake junt” — seeking employment. Mercedes Sundayz, a night headlined by the club’s OG, brings unexpected trouble from a number of patrons.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Scars
episodes.details: The Pynk’s annual carwash receives a visit from a surprising guest while Autumn’s past comes back to haunt her. Back at the club, souls are bared, and deals are negotiated in the private booths.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Higher Ground
episodes.details: Autumn dons a bold new look and learns the rules of working a “regular” from “The Trinity,” each of whom receives a visit from her favorite repeat customer. Uncle Clifford learns about big changes coming to Chucalissa.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - The Trap
episodes.details: Mercedes and Autumn make major moves toward building new lives for themselves. At the Pynk, gossip spreads like wildfire, and patrons flood in for a big night.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Belly
episodes.details: Two foes find themselves trapped together for a weekend under unlikely circumstances. Keyshawn reaches new heights, and Lil’ Murda glows up big time.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Legacy
episodes.details: All throughout the Pynk, surprising new bonds are formed as everyone fights to secure their bag and their future. Andre faces pushback on his deal with the warring Kyle brothers.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Last Call For Alcohol
episodes.details: Uncle Clifford goes to war for the hearts and minds of Chucalissa. Back at the club, the Pynk family comes together to prepare for its biggest night yet.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Murda Night
episodes.details: Season Finale. Folks from Biloxi to Atlanta pack out the Pynk to see two shining stars ascend to the heavens on a truly unforgettable night. Meanwhile, Autumn’s past finally catches up with her.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: Down deep in the Mississippi Delta lies an oasis of grit and glitter in a rough patch of human existence where beauty can be hard to find. This Southern-fried, hour-long drama tells the kaleidoscopic story of a “little strip club that could” and the big characters who come through its doors — the hopeful, the lost, the broken, the ballers, the beautiful and the damned.

series.title: P-Valley
series.details: Down deep in the Mississippi Delta lies an oasis of grit and glitter in a rough patch of human existence where beauty can be hard to find.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - The Great
episodes.details: Catherine travels to Russia to marry the Emperor. After becoming Empress, she realizes Peter is a selfish brat. She feels hopeless until her servant, Marial, suggests they overthrow him.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - The Beard
episodes.details: Catherine takes her first steps toward a coup. Taking advice from Marial, she attempts to seduce and recruit palace intellectual Count Orlo. It's a disaster, but he is ultimately convinced

episodes.title: Ep 103 - And You Sir, Are No Peter the Great
episodes.details: Catherine, Orlo and Marial continue their coup planning. Peter, noting Catherine’s unhappiness, gifts Catherine a sterile lover, Leo. She’s hesitant at first, but Leo manages to charm her.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Moscow Mule
episodes.details: Catherine tries to manage her reputation at court and her relationship with Leo. An influential Patriarch of the church dies. Orlo tries to influence Peter's decision for a replacement.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - War and Vomit
episodes.details: As the war with Sweden continues to rage, Catherine and Aunt Elizabeth visit the military at the Russian front. Grigor struggles with Peter and Georgina’s relationship and poisons Peter.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Parachute
episodes.details: After his near-death experience, Peter is now open to Catherine’s progressive ideas and wants to focus on an heir. Orlo tries to figure out who poisoned Peter and faces demons of his own.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - A Pox on Hope
episodes.details: Catherine is feeling optimistic, until a smallpox breakout causes Peter to revert back to his old ways. Meanwhile, Leo and Catherine’s relationship suffers and Georgina misses Peter.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Meatballs at the Dacha
episodes.details: Catherine’s political abilities are tested when she’s given an opportunity to travel abroad. Leo wants to leave court. Marial tries to keep him there by telling him about the coup.

episodes.title: Ep 109 - Love Hurts
episodes.details: A body is discovered. Peter decides to torture everyone at the palace to find the murderous traitors. Marial confides in Archie about Catherine’s plans. Catherine realizes she is pregnant.

episodes.title: Ep 110 - The Beaver's Nose
episodes.details: Catherine moves forward with the coup. Marial betrays her by telling Peter that Catherine is pregnant. Catherine realizes that the only chance for a greater Russia is to fight, without Leo.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: A satirical, comedic drama about the rise of Catherine the Great as she outwits her husband to take crown and country. Premieres June 18th exclusively on STARZPLAY.

episodes.title: Ep 201 - Heads It's Me
episodes.details: 4 months after she launched a coup against her husband, a pregnant Catherine is gaining the upper hand in her war against Peter.

episodes.title: Ep 202 - Dickhead
episodes.details: Catherine, Orlo and Velementov begin their rule of Russia and unexpected obstacles appear.

episodes.title: Ep 203 - Alone At Last
episodes.details: Catherine’s grief over the loss of Leo during the coup finally catches up with her.

episodes.title: Ep 204 - The Devil's Lunch
episodes.details: The Ottoman Ambassador pays Catherine a visit as tensions between the regions run high.

episodes.title: Ep 205 - Animal Instincts
episodes.details: A crocodile roams the court, and Archie sends everyone into uproar by suggesting it might be an omen against Catherine’s leadership.

episodes.title: Ep 206 - A Simple Jape
episodes.details: Catherine is frustrated by the lack of meaningful change in her rule of Russia. Seeking to shake the court out of its complacency, she plays a joke on them involving a serf to prove a point.

episodes.title: Ep 2001 - S2 Trailer
episodes.details: Get ready for The Great season 2. Season Premiere 19 December

series.title: The Great
series.details: The Great is a satirical, comedic drama - based on the occasional historical fact - about the rise of Catherine the Great from outsider to the longest reigning female ruler in Russia's history. A very modern story about the past.

episodes.title: Christine: Entry
episodes.details: Law student Christine Reade lands an internship at a prestigious Chicago firm but when a classmate introduces her to the world of transactional relationships, her focus begins to shift.

episodes.title: Christine: A Friend
episodes.details: Christine begins living a double life -- working as a GFE, while pursuing her legal career.

episodes.title: Christine: Retention
episodes.details: Christine becomes concerned by the level of Jacqueline's control and confronts her, while David enlists Erin's help, in an attempt to retain one of the firm's top clients.

episodes.title: Christine: Crossing The Line
episodes.details: Christine juggles the demands of her internship, law school and a growing roster of GFE clients. Christine observes tension and conflict amongst the partners at David's annual party.

episodes.title: Christine: Insurance
episodes.details: Christine's secret identity is threatened by a client's death.

episodes.title: Christine: Boundaries
episodes.details: Christine and a new client grow increasingly intimate and start to cross the provider/client boundary. Back at the law firm, David is confirmed as managing partner.

episodes.title: Christine: Access
episodes.details: Christine takes precautions against any further intrusions from Jack, but is soon faced with another problem from an unexpected source.

episodes.title: Christine: Provocation
episodes.details: Intent on revenge, Christine goes on the attack at the law firm.

episodes.title: Christine: Blindsided
episodes.details: Christine's worlds collide and she is forced to find a way to come out on top.

episodes.title: Christine: Available
episodes.details: After her humiliating experience at the law firm, Christine embraces her career as a GFE provider.

episodes.title: Christine: Fabrication
episodes.details: Christine goes on the counter-attack, in an attempt to force a settlement with the law firm, while exploring more anonymous ways to service her GFE clients.

episodes.title: Christine: Home
episodes.details: Christine travels home for her parent's 30th wedding anniversary party. They are partially happy to see her.

episodes.title: Christine: Separation
episodes.details: Christine is in complete control.

episodes.title: Erica & Anna: Leverage
episodes.details: Erica Myles, the finance director at Right To Action, a Republican super PAC, enlists the help of an escort, Anna Garner, in an attempt to gain access to a secret, dark money donor network.

episodes.title: Erica & Anna: The List
episodes.details: Anna delivers a piece of incriminating evidence against Novak, while her relationship with Erica becomes personal. Erica is contacted by a powerful financier.

episodes.title: Erica & Anna: Solicitation
episodes.details: Erica lands her biggest donor yet while Anna and Erica's relationship intensifies.

episodes.title: Erica & Anna: Donors
episodes.details: Erica gets a suspicious call from a representative of a secretive potential donor. Anna subjugates herself to Erica's sexual desires and makes a startling decision to solidify their personal relationship.

episodes.title: Erica & Anna: Family
episodes.details: Anna breaks some big news to Erica and Erica begins to feel increasing pressure at work.

episodes.title: Erica & Anna: Citizens First
episodes.details: After her rejection from Erica, Anna looks for answers while Erica's life takes unexpected turns, with potentially devastating consequences.

episodes.title: Erica & Anna: Free Fall
episodes.details: With knowledge of the illegality of the Koscielny donation surfacing, Erica scrambles to find out the extent of her exposure as Novak leaks the information to the FBI. Meanwhile, Anna rids herself of Erica completely. She settles back into her professional life, at the top of her game.

episodes.title: Bria: Admitting
episodes.details: Bria Jones, a former GFE, enters the witness protection program in order to escape an abusive relationship. After being uprooted from her lavish lifestyle, Bria and her estranged step-daughter are relocated to a small town in New Mexico where they are overseen by US Marshal, Ian Olsen. As the mundane reality of her new identity sets on her, Bria finds the GFE world beckoning her once again.

episodes.title: Bria: Eggshells
episodes.details: Despite orders to lay low, Bria meets with a new client, Paul, who invites her to his place of work. Ian’s suspicions that Bria has returned to the GFE lifestyle cause him to break protocol, putting Bria, Kayla and himself in a precarious position.

episodes.title: Bria: Negotiation
episodes.details: Bria expands the boundaries of the GFE when she brings Kayla along on a date with Paul. When Paul still refuses to have sex with Bria, she finds herself expanding her client base in order to meet her needs. Meanwhile, Ian continues to probe for the truth as the trial date looms.

episodes.title: Bria: Moral Inventory
episodes.details: Desperate to reign Bria in, Ian bugs her apartment and begins following her as she meets with clients. Bria is informed that Donald is no longer in police custody; Ian pledges to protect her as she fears for her safety.

episodes.title: Bria: Living Like a Tornado
episodes.details: Bria reveals everything to Paul in hopes of gaining his protection. When Paul rebuffs her, Bria begins to formulate a plan to find sanctuary by other means. Meanwhile, Kayla ditches school to meet up with her new boyfriend, only to be put on a condition collision with Bria’s new plan.

episodes.title: Bria: Making Amends
episodes.details: An out-of-control and unstable Ian forces Bria to prepare for her day in court. Handcuffed and blindfolded en route to the courthouse, Bria recalls her traumatic and criminal history with Donald as she prepares to face him head-on.

episodes.title: Bria: Relapse
episodes.details: Pursued by both the law and Donald, Bria is forced to fend for herself. She manipulates one of her clients, Stuart, in order to take a final stand against her enemies.

episodes.title: Ep 301 - Mirrors
episodes.details: Iris relocates to London for a radical reboot. Leaving behind her family and a half-finished degree at a top tier university, she begins a double life: working as a neuro researcher at elusive tech startup, NGM while providing the girlfriend experience for clients at night.

episodes.title: Ep 302 - Everyone's Got a Price
episodes.details: Iris and her co-worker Hiram start working on an AI project that mirrors human emotion. Meanwhile, new clients provided by The V, a high-end escort agency, leave Iris with a wealth of intriguing behavioral data.

episodes.title: Ep 303 - Deepfake
episodes.details: Iris, under the identity of "Cassie", gets better at simulating the perfect girlfriend experience for her clients. Simultaneously at NGM, Iris and her co-workers start training the AI model with new simulated sets. More than one line gets crossed in the process and Iris' two worlds begin to collide.

episodes.title: Ep 304 - Shuffle
episodes.details: Iris' client relationships seem increasingly uncanny, and advice from Tawny isn't what Iris was hoping for. Her father's illness catches up with Iris in undeniable ways. Efforts to escape this new reality leave Iris feeling progressively exposed.

episodes.title: Ep 305 - Control Shift
episodes.details: Iris can't keep her two worlds separate anymore, which comes with unwanted consequences. Her boss at NGM, Christophe, urges Iris to see their AI work in a different light. The neural net still has a long way to go. Iris realizes she's in a position of power, while simultaneously having lost all control.

episodes.title: Ep 306 - The Embrace
episodes.details: Buying herself time, Iris escapes the messy leftovers of her double life and spends some time off-grid. Georges, a former client, takes Iris into his world. And so, does Rupert, who takes Iris to an event where sexuality and tech have merged. Reality, however, has a way of catching up.

episodes.title: Ep 307 - Black Box
episodes.details: "Cassie" is back with a vengeance, taking her work to the next level. Iris' secrecy around the experimental project puts a dent in her relationship with co-worker Hiram and their collaboration around Emcee. The people in Iris' life have been keeping things from her, too.

episodes.title: Ep 308 - A Set of Lies Agreed Upon
episodes.details: Having her family in town brings up complicated feelings for Iris. Tawny feels bad about how things played out with The V. Iris' interactions with the test subjects become more and more technical. Afraid to confront her own truth, Iris realizes she needs to switch gears with the AI work.

episodes.title: Ep 309 - State of Mind
episodes.details: Having lost all sense of perspective, Iris confides in Christophe. He in turn opens up a part of his world, wanting her to see the vast possibilities. Little does Iris know; the encounter will leave her shaken to the core.

episodes.title: Ep 310 - Integration
episodes.details: Struggling to recover from a sense of utter betrayal, Iris is willing to take a radical leap once again. Bidding farewell to her family, and reconnecting with co-worker Hiram, Iris needs to confront one more person before making a fateful decision: Emcee...

episodes.title: Ep 3001 - Official Trailer 3001
episodes.details: The third installment of The Girlfriend Experience is set amidst the London tech scene and focuses on Iris, a neuroscience major, as she begins to explore the transactional world of The Girlfriend Experience.

series.title: The Girlfriend Experience
series.details: STARZ Limited series “The Girlfriend Experience” is a reimagining of Steven Soderbergh’s 2009 critically acclaimed movie of the same name and explores the relationships between exclusive escorts and their clients, for whom they provide far more than just sex. Known as GFEs, they are women who provide “The Girlfriend Experience”—emotional and sexual relationships at a very high price.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 101
episodes.details: In the summer of 2006, Rob Reilly, a smart-suited homicide detective, and his partner Cassie are dispatched to investigate a child’s murder, and they find a community caught between old and new Ireland.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 102
episodes.details: Rob and Cassie make a dark bargain to keep the secret and solve the cases.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 103
episodes.details: All of Knocknaree mourns as Katy Devlin is laid to rest. The pressures on Rob and Cassie mount as there are still no arrests in the case.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 104
episodes.details: As Cassie struggles to make sense of Lexie’s life and death, we delve into her own difficult past. Meanwhile, Rob’s past finally yields some results in the Katy investigation.

episodes.title: Ep 105 - Episode 105
episodes.details: Cassie prepares for the most challenging investigation of her lifetime, and Rob hits rock bottom.

episodes.title: Ep 106 - Episode 106
episodes.details: When Cassie embeds herself in Whitethorn House, threats both known and unexpected haunt her every living breath.

episodes.title: Ep 107 - Episode 107
episodes.details: Everything comes to a head as Cassie confronts Lexie’s killer and Rob has a breakthrough about Katy’s murder.

episodes.title: Ep 108 - Episode 108
episodes.details: The finale finds Rob and Cassie forced into a face-to-face reunion.

episodes.title: Ep 1001 - Official Trailer
episodes.details: “Dublin Murders” is an eight-part mystery series with a taproot that drops deep down into Ireland’s past, foreshadows the present and brings insight to its future.

series.title: Dublin Murders
series.details: “Dublin Murders” is an eight-part mystery series with a taproot that drops deep down into Ireland’s past, foreshadows the present and brings insight to its future.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - Episode 1
episodes.details: 1939, and in the run up to war, hedonistic, philandering, failing stockbroker Ian Fleming lands a job in Naval Intelligence, where his wild imagination and arrogance finally find a home. And as Ian starts a relationship with sweet debutante Muriel, he also meets the mysterious, alluring, dangerous Ann O'Neill.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Episode 2
episodes.details: War is raging, but despite the excitement of juggling a relationship with Muriel and a blossoming affair with Ann O'Neill, Ian feels increasingly trapped behind his Admiralty desk. Eventually he lands a mission to France but when it spins out of control and he returns home to news of a tragic death, it's finally clear that war is far from a game.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Episode 3
episodes.details: Ian loses himself in a tempestuous affair, and becomes riddled with self doubt.

episodes.title: Ep 104 - Episode 4
episodes.details: 1945 and as war in Europe draws to an end, so too does Ian's relationship with Ann O'Neill. It's clear that if he won't marry her, he'll lose her. Still battling his self-doubt, Ian finally gets his chance for action out in the field, chasing down secret German nuclear documents before they fall into Russian hands. Will he return home a hero, ready to become a husband?

series.title: Fleming: The Man Who Would Be Bond
series.details: Action-packed drama based on the life story of Ian Fleming, the creator of James Bond.

episodes.title: Ep 101 - The Stranger
episodes.details: As Tariq St. Patrick begins his new life at Stansfield University, he’s torn between two worlds: doing as his mother said, living his life as a normal college kid; or doing what she taught him, hustling product, to save what family he has left.

episodes.title: Ep 102 - Exceeding Expectations
episodes.details: Haunted by the legacy of his father, Tariq tries to understand who James St. Patrick was to the people in his life, how it’s shaped Tariq’s own life, and how the memories of James St. Patrick and Ghost define the man Tariq wants to become.

episodes.title: Ep 103 - Play The Game
